Spinning Tops

One method for inducting children into a dissociative state is to have them
look at a large spinning top as the colors whirl around *end* Carousel rides
have also been popular to induce trances *end*

A good sampling of optical illusions can be found in Katherine Joyce’s
book Astounding Optical Illusions *end* NY Sterling Pub *end* Co *end*  *end* The
illusion The Temple makes one feel they are in a passageway leading to a
small door *end* The Escalator makes one feel they are going up and down and
could be used for building in an internal elevator *end*

We know that optical illusions have been
used but we are not saying that these
particular ones have been *end* For a programmer
to use an optical illusion he would first
submerge the victim into a drugged state with
the appropriate mind altering music and
sounds and then flash the illusion onto the
wall that the victim was facing *end* With virtual
reality the child can really be immersed into a
weird head trip *end*


The Hypnotic Voice of the Programmer

Programmers will adopt either an authoritarian voice which is
commanding and direct or a permissive soft tone *end* Bear in mind the slave
who has the authoritarian voice used on it sees the programmer as God
with the authority of life or death over its his or her body and soul *end* The
heightened expectation from the commanding tone will increase the
suggestions chance for success *end* However a softer tone will relax the
victim and the hypnotist and the programming victim become partners in
the hypnotic process *end* The advantage of the softer tone is that the creativity
of the victim is enhanced and participates more in the process *end* The
hypnotic induction becomes more real when the victim participates more
in the process *end*

The Monarch programmer will either use a monotone voice or a rhythmic
voice *end* Remember the professor who could lull his students to sleep *end* He
had a hypnotic voice without knowing it *end* A singsong or rhythmic voice is
comforting *end* It can also be used by the Programmer *end* One continuous thread
of words strung together are used to close out distractions *end*

After a suggestion or command is given a pause is made by the
programmer in talking so that the suggestion is taken into the mind *end*
Otherwise anxiety is experienced by the victim’s mind and the suggestion
will not be accepted as well *end* Cisco the co-author provides an example of
how a hypnotic script can go with music

"Close your eyes for your eyes will only tell the truth *end* And the
truth isn’t what you want to see *end* In the dark it is easy to
pretend that the truth is what it ought to be *end* "Softly deftly
music shall caress you *end* Hear it feel it secretly possess you *end*
Open up your mind let your fantasies unwind in this darkness
which you know you cannot fight *end* The darkness of the music
of the night *end* "Close your eyes start a journey through a
strange new world *end* Leave all thoughts of the world you knew
before *end* Close your eyes and let music set you free *end* Only then
can you belong to me *end* "Floating falling sweet intoxication *end*
Touch me trust me savor each sensation *end* Let the dream
begin let your darker side give in to the power of the music I
write *end* You alone can make my song take flight *end* Help me make

the music of the night *end* "Helpless to resist the notes I write For
I compose the music of the night *end* Hearing is believing music
is deceiving *end* Hot as lightening soft as candle light *end* Dare you
trust the music of the night?"

When the authors have bumped into men who are programmers and
handlers for the CIA they have noticed that many of these men have warm
personalities and have a certain trained hypnotic voice which they use even
when not programming *end* During rituals the various magical languages used
in witchcraft employ repetition alliteration nonsense syllables newly
coined words and ancient words that are chanted or sung in a limited-
range that makes the sounds become hypnotic *end* Sounds like the mantra "a-u-
u-in-in" are chanted *end*

Gestures during rituals are also made which intensify the effects *end* Rituals
can not be classified as having nothing to do with programming *end* There is
such a great attempt to secularize and make clinical what the victim
experiences and the idea that witchcraft is part of the programming is an
unpopular notion with some *end* Combining witchcraft with hypnotic
language can be powerful with group dynamics *end* Repetitive sounds such as
a drum beating influences the locus coeruleus part of the brain *end* Drums can
help induce trance *end*
D *end* Keeping the Mind Dissaciative

Illuminati parents as well as other adults who care for a Monarch child
are given special instructions on how to raise the child to be dissociative *end*
The parents are admonished that their child will have a successful future
and so will they if they follow the instructions *end* if they don’t follow the
instructions they are minded their child’s life could be forfeited *end* here are
some of the types of instructions that are given

 *end*  Spend  minutes/day teaching the child to write backwards to

develop the brain in a particular fashion *end*
 *end*  Giving daily doses of prolonged isolation such as dark closets dark

cellars the corners of dark rooms *end* During the prolonged isolation
the child cannot turn on the lights go to the bathroom make a noise

or anything else *end* The child will learn to dissociate *end* The child is also
trauma bonded to the abuser because each time the child is let out it
is grateful to the abuser *end* The child can be drowned in a pool and
then resuscitated--and the exact amount of time to keep the child
under will be given *end* The child can be placed in a freezer and again
the exact amount of time can be given to the parent *end* The child is not
to roam about the house freely *end* The adults’ area is off-limits *end* The
child must move with permission *end*
 *end*  Systematic punishment without provocation with the message--keep

secrets *end* Hear no evil see no evil do no evil *end* This needs to be done
several times a week to reinforce the codes of silence and the
programming for silence *end*
 *end*  A needle which is gripped halfway up is stuck into the child a

quarter inch deep on the child’s muscles buttocks or thigh to help
continue dissociative behavior *end* On special occasions birthdays
holidays the hands and feet which are most sensitive to pain are
stuck *end* When the feet or hands are stuck they will often stick the
needles under the nails *end* The ears are also on occasion stuck with
needles *end* It also conditions the child to obey the commands of her
handlers who will use needles to access the minds various
personalities *end* Various spots on the body when stuck with needles
along with certain codes become access points for certain alters *end*
 *end*  Anytime a child argues has a temper tantrum or gets angry the child

is to be slapped in the face *end* This is a quick trauma *end* It is to be
followed with a lighted cigarette applied to the child to burn the skin
the second the child gets submissive from the slap *end* If a cigarette
can’t be found a stove top or some other hot item is to be found *end* At
four years of age the child begins programming to burn itself *end* If
there are any bruises showing the child can be kept home for a day
or two *end*
 *end*  Anytime the child becomes willful it is to have its mouth washed out

with soap *end* The child should be made to chew off a piece and
swallow the foam *end*
 *end*  The child should be raped daily and then tortured *end* This helps with

the sexual programming later and begins a reversal in the mind that
pain is love and pain is pleasure *end*
Some of the first memories that female Monarchs recover are their
memories of their fathers raping them *end* This is because the programmers
allow these memories to be less dissociated than the later ones where the
slave may be sexually servicing an important Monarch slave handler like
the Rev *end* Billy Graham *end* Graham is covered in full in chapter  *end* In later
situations like that the kitten alters which do the sexual servicing will be
electro-shocked to block their memory as well as given hypnotic cues *end* The
fathers or step-fathers are often not the person who will be their master
when they grow up *end* The abuse of this person will serve as a cover for the
programming *end* If the person’s front alters discover they are MPD they will
initially blame their multiplicity on the first abuser they remember which
then serves as a cover *end*
E *end* Keeping the Mind in Alpha State

The entire alter system of a Monarch slave has their sleep patterns
controlled *end* Many alters are programmed not to sleep *end* They stay awake
hours a day internally *end* Someone has to take the body and sleep--but
whichever alters are set up to do it they are hypnotically commanded to
only sleep three hours to insure that the mind stays in an alpha state easy
to program *end* Because alters which do not hold the body "rest" mentally in a
sense--when they take the body they are fresh *end*

In this way a multiple can function without as much sleep as a normal
person but the price they pay is that their mind stays in an easy-to-
program easy-to-hypnotize state *end* REM sleep allows the person to
harmonize the mind’s inner world with its outer environment *end* The periods
of REM sleep lengthen as the hours of sleep progress *end* By preventing long
periods of sleep long periods of REM sleep are prevented from occurring
and the victim remains in a more controllable state of mind *end*
F *end* Hypnotic Codes Cutes and Triggers

When a Programmer creates something it will be a reflection of himself to
some degree *end* Just like handwriting and art are a reflection of the person
who makes them *end* Understanding the connections between a Programmer
and his creation could take a book in itself *end* The following is extracted

from the history of an ancient occult sect still functioning today *end* It is the
type of thing that the programmers feed their minds on which in turn
provides them the patterns which show up in programming *end* Here it is

In the ancient occult world at the gates of palaces the doorkeeper had to be
shown "the seals"--the secret names of God or pictures with magical
power and the words "R Akiva" *end* When the person passed this entrance he
comes to the palace of pure marble stones do not say "water water."
Then the person will enter into the world or the celestial Garden of Eden or
the Realm of the Heavenly Palaces *end* The Story of Sinbad the golden lamp
and genie would be another example of an occult story that could be used *end*
Within the Illuminati Gematria which is the cabalistic teachings about
numbers is very important for knowing the codes of the deep darker
alters *end* There are several reasons for why Monarch slaves have lots of
codes and structures which come from witchcraft

a *end* their programmers are witches and witchcraft is the world
view on the mind of the programmer

their cult whenever they hear their codes

magick

underworld life and doctrine

A rather remarkable book is Aleister Crowley’s book  and Other
Qabalistic Writings of Aleister Crowley *end* It is remarkable for the
deprogrammer to understand many of the programming code links that the
programmers may have used *end* In ’s forward *end* Aleister Crowley wrote

" is a qabalistic dictionary of ceremonial magic oriental mysticism
comparative religion and symbology *end* It is also a handbook for ceremonial
invocation and for checking the validity of dreams and visions *end* It is
indispensable to those who wish to correlate these apparently diverse
studies." Crowley  p *end* vii Later he writes "The book  has for its
primary object the construction of a magical alphabet." p *end* xvii For
instance Crowley gives the Officers in the Masonic Lodges and the
hebrew passwords of their grades *end* In another example of the book
Crowley gives a list of the Hindu chakra points which is well known
with the Buddhist names and their ancient Egyptian names *end* This is the
type of occult knowledge that is hard to come by *end*

Crowley’s List of Correspondences are perhaps the best one will find
printed in the occult world *end* They show the correspondences that occultists
make between things *end* For instance if we want to know what corresponds
to the Hebrew letter Dalath *end* The letter means door *end* Door corresponds to
the letter  the Cabalistic Tree of Life pathway between the two top
circles on each side of "the crown" sky blue on the Queen scale of color
Aphrodite Venus and Freya and the gems Emerald and Turquoise and
the perfume sandlewood *end* All these things correspond within Cabalistic
magic *end*

For someone trying to understand why a particular color and name is
given to a deep darkside alter Crowley’s book is helpful in some Monarch
systems *end* The Mother-of-Darkness alters and Supreme Master alters in
males of the Illuminati must do pathworking rituals when they hold the

provides the mystic number that goes to each part plane or circle of the
Tree of Life and its Snake positional number *end* The mystic number of the
Sephiroth that corresponds to the number to each of the  paths that must
be worked is also given *end* The occult concept is that to achieve divinity one
must go on the Tree of Life from being Malkuth to become Kether *end*

The word FOX is an example of a significant occult code word *end* F-o-x
consists of the   + & the  +  letters of the alphabet
which yield  *end* The reader needs to bear several things in mind *end* First the
programmers generally have intelligent well sounding codes that do form
patterns *end* For instance a woman’s name from the Bible will be used as a
code with subparts or subcodes having other female names from the Bible *end*
Deeper Illuminati parts will have goddess and god names and king and
queen names for cult alters *end* These are the names the handler or cult uses--
NOT their access codes *end*

The codes for slaves follow patterns *end* There are standard and unique codes *end*
The internal programming alters have the power to change codes if they
need to protect the programming *end* They will have to hypnotically work
with alters when they trance out at night *end* In other words most of their
programming of front alters will be done when a System lies down for
"sleep"--more accurately described as "for trance." If the internal alters
change many codes in their efforts to protect the system they will even
make it difficult for the handler/programmer to get into the system *end*

Ciphers developed rotors that require lines to line up *end* Some simple
schemes using this principle appear in some Monarch systems *end* This is part
of the science of structuring *end* Intelligence codes often come from the Bible
or popular fiction books *end* The deeper codes are occult words often in
foreign languages such as Arabic which is an important language in the
upper occult world *end* Slaves will be given COVER NAMES for ops and
often males receive female names and vice versa *end*

Very shortly we will provide the Monarch hypnotic cues codes for the
multitude of functions that a Monarch’s mind must carry out *end* The type of
programming which is placed in a slave varies *end* For intelligence operations

people to meet *end* All slaves are given CONTROL SIGNS which allow them
to indicate via a code that they are in trouble *end* A RECOGNITION signal
allows two people to make contact *end* For instance the handler might fly his
distinctive sounding plane over a slave’s house in a pre-arranged signal *end* It
might also be a particular colored scarf and a particular set of phrases *end* A
GO-AWAY code is a prearranged signal that means it is unwise to make
contact *end* The go-away signal may be simply placing one’s hands in one’s
pocket or turning the porch lights off *end* A "GO TO GROUND" signal means
to go into hiding *end* A MAYDAY BOOK exists for Illuminati and
Intelligence slaves which allows them to call if they are about to be
arrested *end* A telephone number is left open for just this purpose *end*

Also common universal Illuminati codes can be used by the slave to get set
free from police and judges *end* Within the Jehovah’s Witnesses especially

Hebrew is used *end* Other languages are also used *end* An Illuminati System can

P *end* Sample Codes for Alters of a Hypothetical System Named Mary

These codes are purely a representative model-not any particular real system *end* The overall

of generations family was in the Illuminati *end*

For our hypothetical system Mary we have the hypothetical system code of ---  --
 *end* In order to give the codes for a hypothetical alter system we will have to explain some
things as we go *end*

The Programmers have for each slave both medical programming files and a grey or black
binder with the programmed access trigger codes & cues & structure *end* A typical Illuminati
system will be a cube although spheres and pyramids are also used *end*

The principle alters will be the "a" alters *end* A typical section of alters will consist of a
grid of alters *end* These are alters who live in a world together and must function together *end* A   section will have  families of "a" through "in" alters *end* The "a" alters will be the primary
alters that the Programmers will interact with *end*

The Programmer may call up an "a" alter and ask it to go get the "c" alter in its family rather
than directly asking for it *end* This initial page of alter codes will be the primary or "a" alters *end* If
we are dealing with a  cube of alters then the initial page has  "a" alters of
each section *end*
Each of these alters will have an access code which will often include the following
components An Assigned Color + An Alpha Numeric Code + A Personalized Magical
Name *end* This will equal / their access code *end*

These code words must be repeated three times to pull the alter up *end* However if an alter is
trained well and hears his master’s voice an alpha-numeric code can pull the alter up *end*

For many of the alters the reversal of their access code puts them back to sleep *end* This is an
important point because some alters would be dangerous to leave in control of the body *end* The
"a" alters are regular alters *end* Many of them have been hypnotically age advanced to see
themselves as teenagers or adults *end* Sometimes "b" and "c" alters are also aged *end* The "d"
through "n" alters are generally left as they were split and most of them are infantile with
little concept of how old they are *end*

The little ones will be the ones who often remember the programming very well and know
things about the system *end* The top alters will also sometimes receive personal names from their
handler *end* This is in addition to all their codes *end* If the alter is responsive to its master the
personal name might pull the alter up too *end* Do all of the alters get charted *end*

There are several groups of alters which get charted separate from the rest or don’t get
charted at all *end* Because of the competition and distrust between the different programmers
they often place in secret back doors into the person’s mind that only they know about *end*
Worlds of secret alters loyal and devoted to the programmer may be built into the system and
not appear on the regular charts *end* The core and some of the primal splits from the core will
not appear on the regular grids *end* They will be placed on a separate sheet and their codes will
be in some magical language *end*

The Illuminati commonly employs  magical languages and Hebrew Latin and Greek are
also often used for charting the core and its primal splits *end* Enochian is a good example of a
magical language used by the Illuminati *end*

Some alters will be created solely by the slave in order to cope with life *end* For instance say the
slave is travelling with someone who is not a handler but who is a dangerous person *end* This
dangerous person murders several people and forces the slave to help *end* The slave is likely
going to have front alters out and they are simply going to have to create new alters to meet
the demands of the situation *end* These alters made to deal with one-time emergency will just slip
into cracks in the system *end*

Lots of odds and ends alters end up in the nooks and crannies within a system just detached
and floating *end* The programmers and the victim work hard at structuring and cleaning up
things--but the honest truth is that trauma-based mind-control is messy *end* Any time you shatter
someone’s mind into thousands of pieces with horrendous torture you have a shattered mess
in spite of the good fronts that the programmers are able to construct *end*

Some of the more elaborate access methods are for alters that are not on the "a" chart *end* Hour
glass alters have entire sentence access codes *end* Deaf & blind alters need their access code
signed on their hands by moving their fingers up and down etc *end* End time alters may have
access codes that may entail reading an entire page *end* Reporting alters are often small children

house" *end* The codes for this was given in the Beta section codes *end*

Life "Over The Rainbow"- After indexing & rereading this book the co-authors realized
that we had not explained "over the rainbow." Some alters live "over the rainbow" and some
do not *end* Both types will use the term "over the rainbow" but with different meanings attached *end*

For those who live "over the rainbow" they serve their masters in such a deep hypnotic
trance that they perceive reality like it’s a dream *end* When their memories surface they are so
unlike normal memories that a system in therapy may not know what to do with them *end* They
have been described as similar to the pictures in the old T.V.s when the vertical hold would
go out of control *end*

Deeper alters who live "over the rainbow" experience memories/life in the following fashion
faces & porn cameras are airbrushed out of their memory distinctive marks in the
perpetrators such as scars & wrinkles are airbrushed out colors & lights are very bright due
to the total dilation of the pupils while in deep trance and there is no sense of time for these
alters *end* These alters are trained to "TRANCE SEND FORWARD THROUGH TIME" *end* By
understanding the programming the codes & triggers those alters who lived "over the
rainbow" can recover from the mind the full memory without the distortions created by
dissociation *end*

digraph can indicate a type of operation or even a location *end* An operation may have CODES *end*

called Cryptonyms which are two-letter digraphs such as the "MK" of MK-ULTRA *end* The
digraph can indicate a type of operation or even a location *end* An operation may have its
cryptonym changed in the middle of its operation *end*

G *end* Hypnosis in Programs and Other Uses

The programmers will begin their programming by extreme torture *end* After a certain amount of
torture the victim is willing to say or believe anything to stop the torture *end* At this point a
thought will be planted into the victim’s mind *end* This thought will be linked to a false memory
put in via hypnosis or movies or other method and it will be linked to a command put in by
hypnosis etc *end* and the original thought the command the false memory will be linked by a
single emotion which will link them all together *end*

The result will be something like this it is two weeks before Halloween thought I must get

ready for Halloween rituals command because I have always had a habit of going to
Halloween rituals false memory *end* If I don’t I will have a heart attack and die memory of
torture linked to thoughts *end* Programming is layered in *end* Layer after layer of programming is
put in *end* Each alter personality of the victim is used as if it is a component of a large system *end*
The result is that no alter personality is the whole but only a cog in a great machine *end* Can a
single cog rebel against the whole machine *end* It is very difficult for a single component of
thousands of components to rebel against the abusers *end*


Alice In Wonderland Programming as it Pertains to an Alter Going Down in Trance for
Internal Programming

Alice In Wonderland Programming going down the tree going through the mirror going
underneath something or growing tall *end*
The internal programmers and some other alters have the ability to send other alters into
deep trances *end* One of the programs for doing this is based on the Alice In Wonderland Theme
and it was experienced like this for a level  alter who managed to stay in communication
with her deprogrammer

When the alter went down in her mind she went down on the inside of the trunk of a tree like
Alice In Wonderland *end* At the bottom she saw a keyhole a table and on the table was love
potion # *end* She automatically drank the love potion which shrinks her to a dot and then she
goes through the keyhole *end* So normally this process means she goes through the keyhole *end* She
managed to stay in contact with her deprogrammer during this deep trance *end* After the key hole
she saw thousands of looking glass mirrors *end* Everything got smaller as she went down the
tree *end* She became a dot *end* She drinks love potion no *end*  and comes back with it *end* A tree comes
and wraps itself around her and loves her *end* As she ascends comes up in trance she stretches
up and enlarges *end* In coming up out of trance she gets stuck at level  due to some interference
from deeper alters *end* She in accord with her programming senses her Master’s love *end*
Normally she would have simply tranced out and another alter would have taken her place
and she would have no recollection of the entire process *end*

The alter has been programmed to have backup amnesia *end* Backup amnesia means that one
doesn’t remember that one lost time one doesn’t remember that one forgot etc *end* In short it
means you don’t remember that you don’t remember *end* This is an example of hypnosis used
internally by the programming and the Programming alters to control other alters *end* The
deepening of the trance was given the imagery of Alice falling down the tree *end* In the various
stories used in programming there is some part of the story that can be used as the story line

for trance induction these include
    Wizard of Oz--going into the poppies    Star Wars--time warp riding the light    Star Trek--being beamed replicators etc *end*
Hypnosis is used to anchor suggestions about sleep patterns panic programs phobias health
healing programs and health problems programs pain control and pain programs motivation
programs a suicide program called "hypnosleep" an insanity program and countless other
uses *end*

Hypnosis is used to steer a person’s mind in the direction that they have been labeled *end* For
instance if they have been selected to become a doctor they will be programmed for success
as a doctor *end* New patterns of thought feeling and behavior are inserted to build confidence in
the goals of the Illuminati *end*

Positive experiences are used to help boost the person’s feelings and then the new messages
are anchored "imagine these messages taking root *end* Your new messages are growing stronger
and stronger." The Alice In Wonderland programming theme is used in air-water programs
and mirror programs which the Illuminati the CIA NASA the Jesuits and others like so well *end*
The idea is that there exists a mirror world which is a reversal *end* Along with it is attached the
idea that the slave can enter into a timeless dimension of time or as some refer to it
"interdimensional time travel."

Later the victim will be further brought under the spell of this mirror programming by going
to locations around the nation like the Magic Time Machine restaurants in San Antonio and
Dallas TX where mirrors are placed on doors ceilings walls and restrooms of the
establishment and programming themes are part of the everything at these restaurants *end* The
handler may tell the slave "LOSE YOURSELF IN THE INFINITY MIRRORS."

When hypnotically programming in programs the Programmers place in many types of
images and programs *end* Some examples would be having the concept of obedience equal the
fountain of youth *end* The fountain of youth flows in the victim’s mind unless they step out side
of their orders *end* This can be linked to the Shangri-la story where a woman ages as soon as she
leaves her place in Shangri-la *end*

Another example is the hypnotic imagery involving the formation of an island from a
volcano *end* The story is turned into a programming script to allow the System to be radically
restructured *end* This Volcano programming is a System’s turning program *end* A volcano erupts

from deep down and lava pours into the sea *end* Mountains are pushing up from deep in the
mind *end* To survive people must cross from the old to the new island on a bridge that naturally
forms *end* Fire births the new territory and destroys the old *end* The new mountains develop trees
which become safe places for the alters to roost upon *end*

Later in the book the art of building structures internally in the mind of the victim will be
covered *end* However since the process involves hypnotism it would be appropriate to discuss

programmer might begin

"You know those big trees in the park that look so big and straight and stretch
way up toward the sky *end* Stand up and be one of those trees *end* Stand up really
straight and tall as tall as you can be and stretch your arms out toward the sky
like branches on that big oak tree *end* Now those big trees have long deep roots that
keep them from falling over *end* Feel your feet go down down through the floor just
like roots on the big strong oak tree."

The Use of Fiction

The history behind the Wizard of Oz programming is interesting *end* It
suggests that the Wizard of Oz has had an important part in the occult
world all along *end* One of the secrets of the Mystery Religions especially the
Egyptian Isis mystery religion was the ability to use drugs and torture to
create multiple personalities *end* The word Oz is known to have been used by
its author as an abbreviation for Osirus *end* Monarch victims have the "golden
penis of Osirus" placed into them *end*

The Grimm brothers who were cabalistic jews gathered the folk occult
stories together *end* Their stories are full of spells trances and drugs *end* Sleeping
Beauty is put to sleep and the trigger to wake her is a kiss on the lips *end*
These are serious hints that the occult world didn't stop programming
people with dissociative states and triggers when the ancient Egyptian
empires fell *end* Instead of using modern lingo such as "hypnotize" they
would say "cast a spell." Later in Freemasonry the Right Worshipful
Master would "charge" meaning hypnotize an initiate *end*

The occultist Baum a member of the Theosophical Society was inspired
by some spirit who gave him the "magic key" to write the Wizard of Oz
book which came out in  *end* The book's story is full of satanic activity
and satanic thinking *end* The story was chosen in the late s to be the basis
for the Illuminati/Intelligence community's trauma-based total mind
control programming *end*

Rainbow...there's a land where the dreams that you dare to dream really
come true." These lyrics are a method to hypnotically confuse the brain to
perceive that the "over the Rainbow experience" which is usually horrible
abuse is a "dream" *end*

The dissociative mind is only too happy to call the trauma a dream which
is lived as a reality for a moment but is nevertheless recorded by the mind
as a fantasy *end* The term for this is cryptoamnesia which means the process
where the proper functioning of memory is hypnotically messed up *end* The
slave's internal world becomes "reality" and the external real world

becomes the Land of Oz which is perceived as make-believe *end*

Dwarfs are used in the internal programming *end* Hollywood hired a large
number of them for the movie's cast *end* They are called Munchkins in the
movie *end* Mengele known as the programmer Dr *end* Green was especially
interested in experimenting traumas on dwarfs *end*
For bona-fides & recognition signals the Monarch slaves wear diamonds
to signify they are presidential models rubies to signify their Oz
programming for prostitution and emeralds to signify their programming
to do drug business *end* Rings are also used to signify what activity the slave
is doing and what rank or level they are in the occult *end*

Monarch slaves are taught to "follow the yellow brick road." No matter
what fearful things lie ahead the Monarch slave must follow the Yellow
Brick Road which is set out before them by their master *end* For some slaves
used as track stars their Yellow Brick Road was the track they had to run *end*
The Yellow Brick Road is the runway in which alters were trained to fly
off from to exit their internal world and take the body *end*

The Yellow Brick Road also pertains to the assignment that an alter is
given *end* To follow the Yellow Brick Road is to go down the road that has
been assigned by command *end* The Yellow Brick Road programming is
placed into the child's mind via the Yellow Brick Road of the Wizard of
Oz story *end* Remember the key words "Follow the Yellow Brick Road."

To get someone onto the Yellow Brick Road you must know the access
code to get them through the poppy field *end* The color codes are important to
get an alter through the field of poppies *end*

"Fiddler" is important word to get to the yellow brick road it signifies the
programmer in the context of "the programmer is here go over the
rainbow" and then the alters eat what is variously called MUSIC or a
SCRIPT or A LETTER which are words meaning "instructions."

In the  edition of the book on page  - says programming cues are
in caps "She closed the door locked it and put the KEY carefully in the

pocket of her dress *end* And so with Toto trotting along soberly behind her
SHE STARTED ON HER JOURNEY *end* THERE WERE SEVERAL
ROADS NEAR BY BUT IT DID NOT TAKE HER LONG TO FIND
THE ONE PAVED WITH YELLOW BRICK *end* Within a short time she was
walking briskly toward the EMERALD CITY HER SILVER SHOES
tinkling merrily on the hard YELLOW ROADBED *end* The sun shone
BRIGHT AND THE BIRDS SANG SWEET and Dorothy did not feel
nearly as bad as you might think a little girl would who had been
SUDDENLY WHISKED AWAY FROM HER OWN COUNTRY AND
SET DOWN IN THE MIDST OF A STRANGE LAND....The houses of
the Munchkins were odd-looking dwellings...ALL WERE PAINTED
BLUE for in this country of the EAST BLUE WAS THE FAVORITE
COLOR.. *end* FIVE LITTLE FIDDLERS PLAYED AS LOUDLY AS
POSSIBLE AND THE PEOPLE WERE LAUGHING AND SINGING
while a big table nearby was loaded with DELICIOUS FRUITS the
programs and NUTS PIES and cakes and many OTHER GOOD
THINGS TO EAT scripts to ingest."

Monarch slaves are threatened with fire like the Scarecrow *end* They also see
people dismembered like the Scarecrow was dismembered *end* For them it is
not an idle threat *end* The front alters also have hearts full of pain like
Scarecrow *end*

Certain alters are not given courage and most have their hearts taken from
them *end* The alters who are programmed not to have hearts are hypnotically
told the same thing the Tin Man says "I could be human if I only had a
heart." See Chapter  where it discusses hypnosurgery *end*

Some alters are taught they are stupid and have no brain *end* Scarecrow is
asked the question "How can you talk without a brain *end* Scarecrow
answers "Some people without a brain can do a lot of talking."

Emerald City is used in programming *end* Emerald City in the programming
will be well guarded and hard to reach *end* Several important things will be
placed inside the Emerald City including the deeper Illuminati alters *end*

Castles are used in the programming *end* Lots of castles either in the mind's

imagery or purely demoniac are placed into the slave's mind *end*

Winged monkeys are able to watch in the movies somewhat as spy
satellites *end* Winged monkeys are used in the programming to create a fear of
always being watched *end*

The Flowers used in the movie and books are also used in the
programming *end* The witch uses poppy flowers to put the lion and Dorothy to
sleep *end* Opium and cocaine are used to tranquilize Monarch slaves *end* An alter
of a slave will get trancy when they enter the poppy field *end* Heroin and
cocaine come from poppies *end* In the film Dorothy says "What is
happening *end* I'm so sleepy." She and the lion get sleepy for no apparent
reason very quickly *end* Monarch slaves do the same thing *end* Waking up with
snow in the movie is nothing less than an allusion to cocaine which is a
common substance given to Monarch slaves to help make them dependent *end*
Dorothy states at one point in the movie that she "doesn't remember" *end* She
then follows this up with "I guess it doesn't matter."

Hour glasses appear in the movie in several spots and they also occur in
various contexts in people who have been programmed by the Monarch
programming *end* Some victims of the programming have hour glass
configurations each created around a separate axis *end* The hour glasses have
the ability to be rotated which causes certain alters to be brought forward *end*
Monarch slave masters have also used hour glasses to indicate to their
slaves that death was imminent and that time was running out *end* This is the
way the wicked witch used the hour glass on Dorothy who happens to be
saved just as the hour glass runs out *end*

Some Monarch slave masters actually have large hour glasses sometimes
' high like in the movie *end* In Cathy O'Brien's autobiography of her life as
a Monarch slave Transformation of America she has a photograph of Sec *end*
of Defense Cheney's hour glass on his desk with him seated *end* This hour
glass was used to threaten her as a slave *end*

When a Monarch slave sees an hour glass they may switch but basically it
is a reminder that the slave masters have the power to run a person's time

out *end* One slave was told "The sand that sifts through the hourglass is a
measure of your worthiness to live or die."

The hour glass shape is basically two triangles which touch at their peaks
or an X configuration with the tops of the X having lines *end* The child's mind
is to visualize this configuration as a compass as the four points N S E
W they are to see the X configuration also as an xaxis upon which a
city is structured upon *end*

The hour glass then is tied to several other concepts which integrate
themselves well with the basic X shape of the hour glass *end* Circles with X's
are stacked on top of each other to form the different worlds which contain
the alters *end* The two pie shaped pieces of the hour glass will hold one world
while the hour glass configuration made by the other two adjacent pieces
hold the looking glass mirror images of each alter *end* Each hour glass is
called  quadrants *end* To remove  quadrants would of course take both alters
and mirror images with it *end* In mathematics it could be stated that regular
alters are in quadrant xy and -x -y *end* And that the looking glass people--the
mirror images early splits made from each alter as a copy are in quadrants
-xand x -y *end* See the chapter on how to structure a System

"Click your heel together and be there in a snap" is both in the movie and
in the programming cues *end* Military Monarch slave models are especially
taught to click their heels together *end* Joseph Mengele Dr *end* Black Michael
Aquino and others also liked to click their Nazi boots together while they
programmed children *end*
"SILENCE!" is both in the movie and a command of the Oz Programming *end*
This word SILENCE stands for a code of "no talk" which runs deep in the
mind of the slave *end*
As in the movie certain slave alters will talk to their masters as Dorothy
did "If you please Sir..." The keys and triggers to control the switching
of personalities and to give orders are frequently based on Wizard of Oz
material *end* A Monarch slave owner might use cues based on the Wizard of
Oz such as "THERE'S A PAIR OF MAGIC SHOES TO WEAR WITH
YOUR DRESS...SOMETHING IN LIGHTENING...TO TRANSPORT

YOU FASTER THAN THE OL' RUBY SLIPPERS." Quote from
O'Brien Cathy *end* "Operation Carrier Pigeon" Monograph pg *end*  *end* A cryptic

the hypnotic command based on Wizard of Oz programming "I'LL GET
HER MY PRETTY *end*  *end* .YOUR LITTLE GIRL."

The programming that is related to the Tin Man produces a monarch slave
which is described as "A WELL OILED MACHINE" by the handlers *end* U.S *end*
Sen *end* Allen Simpson one of the perpetrators of the Monarch Program
referred to the Tin Man programming when he told a slave "THESE ARE
BUT EMPTY SHELLS OF THE LIFE THEY WERE ONCE
POSSESSED *end* LIKE YOU ARE--EMPTY AND VOID OF LIFE." Phrases
like "troubles melt" can be found in both the movie and in the
programming *end* Let's now cover what programming is based on the Oz
books that isn't found in the movie *end*

A great deal of the Oz programming comes from the books of which only
the first book was used for the movie *end* The public is familiar with the
movie which is based on the first one but in general doesn't know the
other books exist *end* We will not go through the scripts of all  books--there
isn't room for that but by going through a few of the books the reader will
begin to see the massive amount of material which was used for
programming scripts in the Oz books *end*

It is one thing to say the Wizard of Oz was used as a mind-control
programming script but that doesn't convey the extent of it *end* Large sections
of the  books are almost perfect for mind-control *end* If you take the trouble
to read these quotes you may find yourself startled at what you thought at
first glance was a nice child story *end*

and in the other an ivory wand that separated at the top into
two prongs the prongs being tipped by the letters '' and 'Z'
made of glistening diamonds set closely together."

Alice In Wonderland

Alice Through the Looking Glass 'I can't believe that!' said Alice *end* 'Can't
you?' the Queen said in a pitying tone *end* 'Try again draw a long breath and
shut your eyes.' Alice laughed *end* 'There's no use trying' she said *end* 'One can't
believe impossible things.' 'I dare say you haven't had much practice' said
the Queen *end* 'When I was your age I always did it for half an hour a day *end*
Why sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before
breakfast."

The chapter "Which Dreamed It" in Alice Through the Looking Glass has
sexual programming the Red Queen is purring *end* The story where Walruses
make believe it is oysters is used for programming *end* Other sexual
programming occurs in the chapter "It's my own invention" where the
Knight In Crimson & White Armor are prisoners which dual for her *end*

Tweedle Dee & Tweedle Dum is used for S&M programming which has a
hand signal involving rotating the thumbs of a clasp hand *end* Alters go
through the looking glass and fall down an oak tree by falling into a
deeper and deeper trance *end* Monarch programming is a reflection of how
Satan's mind works *end*

Lewis Carroll 's book with its inversion themes fits in with this type of
thinking *end* Lewis Carroll loved the humor of logical contradictions *end* In the
book Alice wonders if cats eat bats or bats eat cats and she is told that to
say what she means is not the same as meaning what she says *end* When she
eats the left side of the mushroom she grows large; the right side has the
reverse effect *end*

These changes in size are in themselves reversals *end* A large girl and small
puppy end up to be a large puppy and a small girl *end* In Sylvia and Bruno we
are presented with an antigravity wool that can be placed into a parcel to
make it weigh less than nothing a watch that reverses time a black light
and a projective plane with outside inside and inside outside *end*

The slave learns that E-V-I-L is simply L-I-V-E backwards *end* In the looking
glass world the Red Queen knows of a hill so large that compared to it the

hill in question is a valley *end* Also she knows of dry biscuits which quench
thirst a messenger who whispers by shouting and Alice who runs as fast
as she can to stay in one place *end* Sometimes it seems we really do have to
run fast to stay in place *end* The King of Hearts thinks its not unusual to write
letters to nobody and the White King compliments Alice on having keen
enough eyesight to see nobody at a great distance down the road *end*

Can you see why this book was so good to program us *end* In the book
Through the Looking Glass all asymmetrical objects that means all
objects which can't be superimposed on their mirrored image "go the
other way." There are left-right reversals *end* Tweedledee and Tweedledum
are mirror image twins *end* The White Knight sings about squeezing his right
foot into a left shoe and there are several mentions of corkscrews *end* A Helix
a corkscrew is an asymmetric structure with distinct left and right forms *end*

The book's type of thinking was extended beyond asymmetrical objects to
asymmetrical relations of all types *end* For example Alice walks backward in
the railway carriage the guard tells her she is traveling the wrong way *end* The
king has two messengers "one to come and one to go." The White Queen
explains the advantages of living backward in time the looking glass cake
is handed around first then sliced *end*

Odd and even numbers which are equivalent to left and right or on and off
are worked into the story at several points *end* For instance the White Queen
requests jam every other day *end* Going through the looking glass takes us to a
world where the ordinary world is turned upside down and backward *end*
Things go every which way except the way they are supposed to go *end* Anti-
matter is a mirror image *end* Anti-matter milk will explode Alice but an Anti-
matter Alice on the other side of the looking glass can drink the anti-matter
milk *end*

In Chapter  Alice captures the Red Queen *end* It results in a legitimate
checkmate of the Red King who has slept through the entire live size
chess game without moving *end* The checkmate ends the dream but leaves
open in the story the question of whether the dream was Alice's or the Red
King's *end* The programming has so often been only a dream to us *end* The
outside world was so often just an unreal dream to us *end* What was real and

what was not real *end* The real world for other people was full of
contradictions and the unreal world our internal world was consistent *end*
Everything was upside down forwards and backwards *end* In the Looking
Glass book one shuttles back and forth mysteriously between real and
dream worlds *end* "So either I've been dreaming about life or I only dream
that life is but a dream.''

As a slave breaks away from the programming life becomes a bewildering
confusion as the slave is pulled between two worlds *end* The internal world
has everything the alter needs the external world is a harsh cold reality
that doesn't have much to offer *end* People in the external world can help
make it real for a slave *end* The handlers will never do this *end*

Alters will need a reason to want to come out of the internal reality which
they are programmed to believe in *end* For so long much of life was seen as a
dream *end* It will be hard to get a grasp on what was real and what was the lie *end*
Many of the lies are more real than the truth *end* Life was sometimes like the
parallel dreams of the Red King and Alice like two mirrors facing each
other *end*

The Tall Book of Make-Believe

This book was published by Harper & Row in  and was indeed tall
the pages being " /" *end* On page  the programmer would read the
first paragraph of the poem and then say "sleep sleep sleep."

"Have you ever heard of the Sugar-Plum Tree *end* 'Tis a marvel
of great renown *end* It blooms on the shore of the Lollypop Sea in
the garden of Shut-Eye Town; The fruit that it bears is so
wondrously sweet As those who have tasted it say That good
little children have only to eat of that fruit to be happy next
day *end* Sleep Sleep Sleep."

On page - there is a story about how a child is dragged under the
kitchen door and becomes flat *end* There is a picture of a child being pulled
under a door and coming out flat on page  *end* This was used as part of the
script to make the ribbons for the slaves *end* The ribbons in a system can go

under doors and through the entire system *end* On page  Rosa the flat
person pancake person is shown again *end* This is ribbon *end* The top of the
page has a large cricket like creature that was said to the child to be the
programmer Dr *end* Mengele *end*

All of the stories in The Tall Book of Make Believe were used one way or
the other in programming *end* We will just touch on some notable points *end*

On page  is a poem about a Mr *end* Nobody *end* The programmers like to have
alters identify themselves as "nobody" *end*

On page  is a poem/story about "someone" who comes tapping...but it is
"only the cricket whistling" *end* This was used to help program in that the
taps were the cricket the cover image for the programmer *end*

On page  is the story of a girl who when she lays down becomes a
different person Mrs *end* Brown *end*

On page  is a poem Foreign Lands where the child sees "the sky's blue
looking glass" and then ends up "to where the roads on either hand lead
onward into fairyland. *end* .and all the playthings come alive." In other words
what is in effect being communicated is take the hypnotic image of flying
into the sky in Papa's silver plane as the plane goes up the trance goes
higher -deeper and then go into a fantasy land where all your wishes can
come true--so that you can escape the hell us programmers are giving you *end*

On page  is the story of a ghost named Georgie who would run home
and warn people at home when things were broken *end* This was part of the
"fix me" programming--so that ghost-like alters known as reporting alters
call "HOME" to "PAPA" if the programming is touched *end*

On page  is the story "How they bring back The Village of Cream Puffs
When the Wind Blows it away." This story has several programming
words in it these words and their meanings are as follows In
programming the "Village of Liver-and-Onions" is a code word for "the
coven *end* "Prairie" means "ceremony site" and in another story "picnic"
means "ritual" *end*

It's doubtful that most alters would remember these meanings but they
helped the abusers confuse the child *end* Imagine the victim trying to describe
a ritual and telling someone that a village of liver & onions had a picnic *end*

There are numerous scripts for the Alien programming *end* Recent novels and
Hollywood movies provide a non-ending pool of programming resources
for the Programmers *end* Visual reality headgear and other high-tech methods
can easily be incorporated into an alien abduction theme *end*

The following are samples of some of the people who the author Fritz has
spent time with who on one level knew they needed help but didnknow
just what they felt uneasy about *end*

Person  Had been abducted by aliens since she was a small child *end*
Different types of aliens took her *end* Her mother worked for the CIA at Area
 *end* Her mother was abusive to her *end* One of her best friends is a Monarch
slave *end* When the aliens come a bright light appears and then they abduct
her *end* The aliens she works with the most look exactly like people and in
their handwriting show severe abuse *end* These benevolent aliens have taken
her fetusus several times *end* She has time-travelled to their planet *end* She is
dissociative *end* The government authorities are constantly monitoring and
tracking her and have made an effort to besmudge her record so that it
appears like she is looney tunes *end* This is the type of cases that this book's
co-author has spent time working with *end* Doesnthis sound more like
human mind-control than real aliens *end*

Person  This person hears aliens within his head which when described
sounds like a case of MPD DID *end* The aliens would take him and force
him to have homosexual activities even though he didn't want to
participate *end* But that was O.K *end* to him because they were a superior race
and if these benevolent aliens which are so far advanced beyond us want
to have sex with him that is their perogative *end* This person has a lot of
depression *end* This person wonders why the authorities seem to keep track of
him *end*

Person  This person worked at Area  *end* Has a photographic memory
throughout his entire MPD system *end* He realizes that he is MPD *end* His best

to talk about trauma-based mind-control but loves to talk about aliens *end*

talking about Monarch mind-control as if it were something not important
but they all love to talk about aliens *end* And the list of interesting people like
this could go on *end*

When Mind-controlled slaves who have alien programming are being
abducted by the intelligence agencies for their use and for programming
here are some of the details of how and what occurs A bright light is
shined into their house *end* They have been hypnotically conditioned to view
this light as a Flying Saucer whether it is a helicopter or something else *end*
As the NWO does have Flying Saucers sometimes the real thing is used *end*

abductions *end* And the slaves frequently speak about "shadows in the mind."

The slaves are taken to rooms where examining tables with white sheets
and X-ray machines Headgear and medical equipment is in place *end* The
alien equipment has gotten more high-tech over the last  years *end* The
aliens wear suits that are full of occult symbology *end* The people are
restrained with clamps and electrical shock and energy is used on them *end*
They are told that they are receiving information *end* They are given tracking
implants and other implants *end*

All of the  above persons receive information from the aliens regularly *end*
Almost all of the elements of Monarch trauma-based mind-control appear
in these abduction accounts especially in the psychological features of the
victim *end* The victims of alien abduction programming feel suicidal after they

talk too much *end* They have headaches sleep difficulties nightmares
obsessive thoughts a fear of hypnosis trapped feelings and paranoia *end*

During their abductions the aliens use drugs thought transfers and painful
medical procedures *end* The aliens use language that parallels the messages
given to SRA victims just change the language from Satan is in charge to
the Aliens are in charge *end*

Cattle mutilations where the blood has been drain are associated with
abductions *end* There is documented accounts where cattle mutilations have
been connected to Satanic cults using helicopters *end* The victims of aliens are
forced to be impregnated and then the fetus is repeatedly taken *end* The aliens
are repeatedly telling these victims that a holocaust is soon to come *end*

Another strange phenomena that others and this author have noticed is
that these victims of alien abduction seen to know each other much in the
same way that victims of Illuminati mind-control seem to know each other *end*
And the aliens seem to know everything about the victims *end*

The victims have amnesia of their abductions *end* The memories of their
abductions are hidden in altered states of consciousness that hypnosis
sometimes can pull up *end* Most victims are afraid of hypnosis or canbe
hypnotized they have been hypnotized not to allow anyone else to
hypnotize them *end*

edition  has an excellent appendix with charts which compare SRA
mind-control victims and alien abduction victims *end* The charts reveal how
similar the two groups are *end* In preparing these paragraphs we have used his

match the findings of Bowart *end*

Do aliens from another planet exist *end* They may or may not *end* It is not a real
issue we have to face what is already on this planet *end* Fritz has several tapes
of aliens of different types talking which were obtained from abduction
survivors and their voices sound demonic and they are saying that they

have been alive on this planet for many years *end* One said something like he's
been here on earth  years *end* If an alien has lived on this planet for
/ million years when does he get residence status *end* My *end*

If that is true he is no alien--we are *end* But one thing is certain this planet
contains some very slimy evil creatures who are either real non-humans or
very deceptive dark humans *end* The Bible calls them demons and reprobate
men *end* The four most popular origins of supposed aliens on earth are all star
groups relatively close to our solar system *end* They are the Plieades known
as the  or  sisters because their are  stars of which  are visible; Sirius
the dog constellation; the Orion constellation; and the twin stars of Zeta
Reticuli which twin stars were amazingly charted by Chinese astrologers
in  B.C. *end*

Fritz the co-author of this book kept an open mind on the issue could
there be any benevolent aliens  *end* Some abductees believed that their aliens
were benevolent but when they are debriefed they admit that mind-control
and sexual molestation is carried out by the aliens *end* Fritz has concluded
with other investigators on this question there are no benevolent aliens  in
fact the only aliens that may be around are what have been known as
demons *end* People who have participated in high level Illuminati ceremonies
report the presence of creatures that look like the various aliens  *end* This
whole subject is dealt with in another book by Fritz Springmeier *end*
Some points might be briefly brought out *end* Fritz has amassed a great deal of
evidence that the elite have human-built Flying Saucers *end* Notice how the
controlled media always link aliens with Flying Saucers and UFOs *end* This is
an entire book in itself however the bottom line is that at least most if not
all of the alien abductions are simply part of the NWOmind-control *end* It
is obvious that for various reasons including the goals set down in the
secret Iron Mountain government report the government including
cooperating agencies like NASA decided to use an alien abduction theme
rather than a Satanic Ritual Abuse theme to their mind-control
programming *end*

The major differences in the programming methodology is that the blood
rituals of the SRA are no longer used *end* The reason why blood rituals are no

longer needed is that the high-tech harmonic machines which implant
thoughts-see chap *end*  and other high-tech methods eliminate the need for
the blood traumas *end* The victims of alien abductions are taken at random
where the Illuminati victims are abducted more frequently around ritual
dates *end*

Clarifying What Is Looked For In Proof

Too many people are considered guilty unless proven innocent--which
means that a legitimate search for truth has NOT taken place *end* On the flip
side we must bear in mind that hidden information that has laid dormant
for years may totally reverse our understanding of something *end* Exceptional

circumstances may surprise us *end* If some item does not lend itself to totally
irrefutable totally unqualified claims then knowing this the proper
investigator uses words like "almost certainly" and most likely" *end* If the
investigator feels strongly that everything is totally clear he may declare
that something is correct "without qualification." This is the nature of
proof *end*

We need to understand the qualifications and reservations that often are
attached to evidence or conclusions *end* But we certainly do want to press our
investigations as far as possible to get as many "unqualified" conclusions

The following three books were very helpful to me in terms of

Billy Graham A Parable of American Righteousness
by Marshall Frady *end*

Marshall Frady was a writer for Life and Newsweek *end* He has done an
incredible amount of research into Billy Graham's life *end* He doesn't touch on
the sinister side of Billy Graham but by giving an honest report about
Billy Graham he tears off the "Hollywood-type mask" so to speak that
everyone has seen and believed *end* Marshall Frady simply wanted to tell the
whole story of Billy Graham good bad or otherwise *end* He spent many hours
interviewing Billy Graham and many other people involved in Billy
Graham's life *end* When this book was read by a devout Christian it totally
devastated this person's media-built image of Billy Graham-- for instance
items like Billy Graham going to dinner with a prostitute and taking her
home Billy Graham walking past his wife and not recognizing her &
Billy Graham's New York Crusade refusing to allow street people into the
crusade because they were dirty *end*

at the book he didn't see anything wrong with Billy Graham in the book *end*
But then he just read portions of the book *end* Still unless one has spiritual
discernment the book is probably not going to "blast a person out of the
water" because it is a biography not an exposé *end* Until recently this was the
only really good biography that was available for Christians *end*

which the Illuminati/CIA have which cannot be traced even by the
telephone companies *end* When an Amish boy is activated and sent out on an

professional at what he has been trained and programmed to do *end* Amish

Amish multiple will have to give a detailed account of the finished

drug scopolamine a truth serum *end* And when the debriefing team which

trouble him at least in theory *end*

Trained assassins do have memory flashes as all Monarch slaves have but
they are only bits and pieces *end* People also do not realize that the Amish live
in many more states than Pennsylvania *end* They move all over the United
States *end* If an Amishman was travelling on a CIA mission there are

numerous of excuses that could be made for why he could be on the move *end*
There are far more Amish young people away from the Amish settlements
than people realize because they dress like the world *end* Many young people
leave with the knowledge that they can go back years later and be accepted
back into their community *end*

What are some of the mitigating factors in all of this *end* The Amish do their
own butchering *end* They are down-to-earth people who are not afraid of
blood *end* Essentially all Amish children grow up helping with butchering
and seeing life and death played out everyday on their farms *end* The Amish
do not embalm their dead and have their own cemeteries *end* The Satanic cult

afterward *end* Their cemeteries are small almost hidden sites with markers
hidden in grass *end* Some of these graveyards blend in with their rural
settings *end*

Elmo have travelled a great deal esp *end* to Central America *end* Joseph wrote a
book on Child Training which teaches parents how to break a child's will *end*
This author is supportive of discipline and respect *end* The book is pointed
out only because it is a paper trail to show that the Amish discipline and

External & Internal Deceptions

There are some stock tools of deception that are used both externally on
the world and internally on the slave when their system is programmed and
structured *end* Later in the book we will cover the structuring *end* Since this
chapter covers deceptions we will discuss them here but the reader needs
to bear in mind they will be employed in the structuring/programming
phases of the slave's life *end*

The tools are Deflection Blinds Slides Hegelian dialectics and
Deniability *end*

 *end*  Deflection is taking something good and deflecting its purpose *end* This

is a stock tool *end* For instance loyalty and obedience can be good
virtuous things if given to the correct authority *end* But deflected to the
false sadistic authority they are disastrous *end* They use Deflection to

redirect the power of truth which is opposed to them *end* Healthy foods
benevolence ecology love acceptance etc *end* are all part of the
Creator's Christian walk *end* These truths and other are deflected from
their original purpose of glorifying the Creator to glorifying their
own programs *end* Rather than publicly opposing Christianity they
rename their own movements Christian and then proceed to do very
little for Christ and everything for Lucifer *end* They are even deflecting
worship of Jesus Christ onto worship of a demon named Jesus *end*

 *end*  The next externally and internally used stock tool is called "Blinds"-

these are deliberate deceptions placed within their own writings to
confuse the uninitiated *end* H.P.B *end* gives a good description of the use of
these so do Masonic writers like Albert Pike *end* H.P.B *end* writing
describes the use of Blinds in The Secret Doctrine Vol *end*  Adyar
edition p *end*  *end* Blinds are used in CIA documents they are
incorporated into the scripts that the alters receive *end* For instance the
in fetro Moon Child ceremonies are not revealed to the non-
hierarchy alters but they are told that the Moon Children have to do
with the cage tortures *end*

 *end*  Slides are truth that has been warped just slightly to take an

investigative person into a dead end *end* An example of a slide is that
the New World Order is satanic but that only Nazis and stupid
people think that Jews are involved *end* This is a slide because then the
Rothschilds who hide behind their jewishness can not be mentioned
as suspects without people yelling "Antisemitism." In reality
exposing these abusers has nothing to do with Anti-semitism it's
simply that all abusers no matter what good front they have need to
be correctly identified as dangerous *end* Another example an alter who
pretends to be helpful is placed in the system who says that the door
to get to a castle internally is the fifth door on the right in such and
such hall *end* The answer is correct but the door must be opened using
the left side rather than the right side where the door knob is
located *end* Because the answer doesn't pan out then the idea that the
door is the correct door is discarded and the alter's knowledge is
suspect *end* Lots of psychiatrists are writing papers about MPD with
slides *end* They give some truth and then they give people a path to go
down that will dead end them from ever finding the truth *end*

 *end*  They use Hegelian Dialectics *end* This dialectic process doesn't happen

on its own so it often has to be forced into happening *end* The idea is
that each idea "ism" called a "thesis" like say Capitalism naturally
by definition has an opposite an "antithesis" *end* In Capitalism the
antithesis is Communism *end* The conflict between the two produces a
synthesis *end* By controlling both ends of the conflict one controls the
end product the synthesis *end* More than not the One-World-Power can
be seen working behind both sides of many conflicts *end* Indeed the
Secret Societies have been historically shown to be behind all the
revolutions and wars in Modern Europe since the American
Revolution *end* In religious conflict both sides are often being
manipulated *end* Some of the various groups openly admit their strategy
is designed to create a synthesis *end* You will find Hegelian Dialectics
has been introduced into the U.S *end* educational system by the Skull &
Bones Order an Illuminati group *end* It was adopted in Russia by the
Slavophiles in the  century *end* Communism Nazism Fabians
most New Age groups Liberation Theology and other parts of the
Power use Hegelian Dialectics *end* Hegel in turn based his system on
the ancient Greek atomists especially Democritus *end* Hegalian
dialectics is built into the conflicting scripts that alters are given *end*
Slaves who are twinned to another slave will find Hegelian dialectics
employed in their twinning programming *end* The Hegelian dialectics
can be worked in with the double-binds that the programmers love to
use *end*

common people *end* The best example is the term "Saturn."

Hearing Device

US Patent

Background of the Invention

 *end* Field at the Invention

This invention relates to devices for aiding at hearing in mammals *end* The
invention is based upon the perception at sounds which is experienced in
the brain when the brain is subjected to certain microwave radiation
signals *end*
 *end* Description ot the Prior Art

In prior art hearing devices for human beings it is well known to amplify
sounds to be heard and to apply the amplified sound signal to the ear at the
person wearing the hearing aid *end* Hearing devices of this type are however
limited to hearing disfunctions where there is no damage to the auditory
nerve or to the auditory cortex *end* In the prior art if there is damage to the
auditory cortex or the auditory nerve it cannot be corrected by the use ot a
hearing aid *end* During World War II individuals in the radiation path of
certain radar installations observed clicks and buzzing sounds in response
to the microwave radiation *end* It was through this early observation that it
became known to the art that microwaves could cause a direct perception
at sound within a human brain *end*

These buzzing or clicking sounds however were not meaningful and were
not perception of sounds which could otherwise be heard by the receiver *end*
This type of microwave radiation was not representative of any intelligible
sound to be perceived *end* In such radar installations there was never a sound
which was generated which resulted in subsequent generation of
microwave signals representative of that sound *end*

Since the early perception of buzzing and clicking *end* further research has
been conducted into the microwave reaction of the brain *end* In an article
entitled Possible Microwave Mechanisms of the Mammalian Nervous

System" by Philip L Stocklin and Brain F *end* Stocklin published in the TIT
Journal of Life Sciences *end* Tower International Technomedical Institute *end* Inc *end*
P.O *end* Box  Philadelphia *end* Pa *end*  there is disclosed a hypothesis
that the mammalian brain generates and uses electra magnetic waves in the
lower microwave frequency region as an integral part of the functioning of
the central and peripheral nervous systems *end* This analysis is based
primarily upon the potential energy of a protein integral in the neural
membrane *end* In an article by W *end* Bise entitled "Low Power Radio Frequency
and Microwave Effects On Human Electro-encephalogram and Behavior"
Physiol *end* Chemistry Phys *end*  *end*   it is reported that there are
significant effects upon the alert human EEG during radiation by low
intensity cw microwave electromagnetic energy *end* Bise observed significant
repeatable EEG effects tar a subject during radiation at specific microwave
frequencies *end*
Summary of the Invention

Results at theoretical analysis of the physics ot brain tissue and the brain/
skull cavity combined with experimentally-determined electromagnetic
properties at mammalian brain tissue indicate the physical necessity for
the existence of electromagnetic standing waves *end* called modes in the living
mammalian brain *end* The made characteristics rnay be determined by two
geometric properties at the brain these are the cephalic index at the brain
its shape in prolate spheroidal coordinates and the semifocal distance of
the brain a measure of its size *end* It was concluded that estimation ot brain
cephalic index and semifocal distance using external skull measurements
on subjects permits estimation of the subjects characteristic mode
frequencies which in turn will permit a mode by mode treatment at the
data to simulate hearing *end*
This invention provides for sound perception by individuals who have
impaired hearing resulting tram ear damage auditory nerve damage and
damage to the auditory cortex *end* This invention provides for simulation of
microwave radiation which is normally produced by the auditory cortex *end*
The simulated brain waves are introduced into the region at the auditory
cortex and provide for perceived sounds on the part at the subject *end*
