Boxes And Self-Abuse

We will now discuss one method of placing boxes into an alter system *end*
Between the age of  and  / an Illuminati child would be taken to
Scotty’s castle CA for programming *end* A cedar chest would be placed in
front of a table *end* Two Illuminati children well into their programming
would be assigned to guard the chest which would be called the Doctor’s
box *end* They would have "clean slate" alters who knew nothing but their
hypnotic commands to guard the doctor’s boxes *end* Expendable children
would be coached to come into the room and try to get into the box *end* The
Illuminati children would be given strict orders to kill them if they tried to

get into the box *end* If the children failed in their guard duty they either got
more programming or were in turn expended *end* The Illuminati children had
sharp swords with which to guard the box which had  seals on it *end*
Internally Mengele would then hypnotically program in countless boxes
with  seals *end*

Locked up in the boxes would be self-mutilation and body programs etc *end*
Therapists should know that these boxes are deadly *end* After reaching the
level of obedience where they would kill for the programmer the
Illuminati children would be placed in a deep well for a well-trauma and
then while deep in the well would be given various orders such as "cut
yourself" "probe yourself electroshock oneself" and other self-abusive
things *end* The well torture would usually work at teaching the "clean slate"
alters to abuse themselves *end*

During many programming sessions the victim is told "you must pass a
test will you pass the test?" There is something that is more motivating in
these words than if the truth were said "you must endure these traumas
for our enjoyment and to become a slave for And to quote a line from the
film When Rabbit Howls "The worse things got the more of us showed
up." The mind keeps protecting itself by dissociating the overwhelming
abuse *end*
Layering

Programming is layered in *end* Layer after layer of programming is put in *end*
Each alter or alter fragment is used as if it were a component of a large
system *end* The result is that no alter or fragment is the whole only a cog in a
great machine *end* Can a single cog rebel against the whole machine *end* It is
very difficult for a single component of thousands of components to rebel
against its abusers when it doesn’t even have the ability to realize they are
abusers and not the alter’s natural order giver *end*

Besides programs items are placed into the mind too *end* Examples include
vaults safes and doors which need combinations & keys *end* The Illuminati
Programmers see the layering in of programming as demonic *end* They feel
the scripts and movies are more "fronts" than the actual layering

mechanism *end* They believe as one ex-Programmer said

"This programming involves an organization system
established by horrendous trauma for the alter personalities
involving internal mental imagery which is driven by demons
who provide the power *end* Undoing it requires an understanding
of the mental processes involved the imagery or blueprint
used and the spiritual dynamics."

person isn’t but because this person wanted others to be set free *end* It's also

The Willow Tree Vs *end* Oak Tree As A Programming Hanger For
Moriah's Programming

Alters of an Illuminati System due to programming will perceive a tree
growing in them which has roots in their feet and its trunk and branches
extending throughout their body *end* Upon this tree fruit programs are
placed *end* Illuminati programs may be to cut a "tree" limb off which is
actually the victim’s arm or for a certain part of the body to get hot or for
a certain part of the body to physically change in some way *end* These are
attached via the tree imagery *end* Both oak and willows are trees are used *end*
Why might a programmer choose a willow tree rather than an oak tree in
the basic programming *end* The answer lies in why a tree is used in the first
place *end* A tree is used because of its imagery and because of its magical
powers according to Druidism *end* There are a number of images a tree
provides and there are a number of magical powers too *end* We will discuss
the contrasts to develop our answer *end* The oak is a well-known powerful
Druid item but the willow tree is also sacred *end* The oak is so well-connected
to the Druids that some of the other sacred trees of the Druids are not
quickly recognized as sacred *end* Let us look at the intrinsic imagery
advantages of the willow and then the magical properties it might
contribute *end* The combination of the two will then provide us with the
complete answer as to why a willow tree rather than an oak tree might be
used *end*
Imagery

The imagery of a tree is used because it has branches leaves and a root
system *end* These items are manipulated for programming purposes *end* For
instance in the Alice In Wonderland programming the girl jumps
hypnotically into the tree and falls hypnotically falling deeper and deeper
into the roots of the tree *end* The deep root system of the willow is an
advantage over the shallow root system of the oak *end* When a storm comes

the willow bends and doesn’t break while the oak is rather stiff and
breakable *end* Since these trees are programmed into a person a flexible tree
that can’t be broke is an advantage *end* The wrapping around imagery of the
branches gives a great deal of flexibility for programming and a stronger
imagery than the oak *end* The willow draws water from deep below *end* The tree
is "the tree of life" the programs are the life of the system and the Bible
is used to "validate" the programming *end* For instance the tree of life by the
river REV  is used *end*

There are some other images that are important too *end* During Illuminati
rituals the willow branches are used as whips to "cleanse" people the
victims of programming *end* The image of a willow branch could easily
trigger the memories of being punished whipped and being cleansed and
this in turn would help hold the programming in place *end* The fruit of the
trees are the programs--and some of the fruit can be eaten and some not *end*
Sometimes children’s stories about lunch pails hanging from trees or fruit
in the trees is used to create a place for the individual programs are hung--
or this could be a place for the front programs and the more important
programs are stored away somewhere more secret *end* Bear in mind the trees
in the programming sing and are able to wrap themselves around people if
they are going where they aren’t supposed to go *end* The willow has that
flexibility naturally so it is easier to imagine it wrapping itself around a
person *end*
Magical Properties

Most everything that is done programming-wise has a dark spiritual
significance to it too *end* The programmers will look for things that serve their
purpose both here and in the spiritual realm *end* The willow tree is used to
make witches wands and help to make witches brooms *end* Birch can also be
used *end* It is planted around Druid/Celt graves to protect them spiritually *end* It
is believed to also have magical sexual powers *end* It is possible that some of
the programmers might prefer the magical sexual powers of the willow
rather than those properties said to come from the mighty oak *end* This is not
all of the willow’s magical powers *end* It is connected with February and April
in different ways and magically connected with spring *end* It’s possible that
the person receiving a willow tree might be born in this time period *end* Is it

possible that what type of tree is selected could sometimes be related to
when a person is born *end* Some programmers might be into being time
appropriate--this would depend upon the beliefs of the programmers *end* The
imagery of the willow’s magical sexual properties could be worked into
the programming as certain alters might be asked to make certain brews
or taste of certain things hypnotically *end* This would be done at such a deep
level it might not be known *end* Just as in the case of the Alice In Wonderland
programming when the person drops clear to the bottom of the tree roots
they find themselves small and they go through a door *end* But when they
come back the alter is not going to remember the trip and what they ate on
the hypnotic trip down the tree *end*
Further considerations on the choice of Trees *end* It is possible that the we can
question the question *end* That is perhaps the question is not that the oak or the
willow tree was used to the exclusion of the other--but that BOTH trees
were used in the programming *end* Generally this seems to be the case *end* In one
particular case it is possible that in a double system with a dormant third
system as a final backup the oak tree being the more obvious Druidic
symbol and quite strong was used in the front system and the totally secret
second system has the willow utilized *end* When the one person attempted to
snap the oak tree at ground level in a crude attempt to deprogram
themselves the root system regenerated itself through the first mirror
image and what came back was more spirit and more deadly *end* Remember
the tree serves as an umbilical cord linking via its roots the person to their
spiritual life force which are the evil spirits which command and drive the
system *end* However when the oak tree and its mirror images and the
spiritual protectors hideous spirits were properly done away with and
then further deprogramming was done a crack seems to have developed
behind the pyramid crystal which allowed the person’s original set of alters
to experience a new or double system *end* Since that has happened it seems
there has been an increased drawing to willows *end* In other words for this
particular victim it is conjectured that the front system the fully
operational set of alters has an oak and the duplicate set of alters which
were each broken off of each of the original set have a system with a
willow tree *end* The trees roots of course are the umbilical cord to the source
the waters that spiritually feed it *end* These relate to the soul ties *end* These roots
have to be dealt with spiritually *end* They are so interwoven that they tie a

person completely up with their roots and programs that are interwoven
and wrapped around each other *end* Other high level Illuminati survivors also
have a front tree and a back tree *end*
Another consideration is that the trees have flowers planted around them *end*
Uprooting the trees are not sufficient for deprogramming because the
flowers are the deeper generational material and will regenerate the trees *end*
Touching Lilith’s box under the tree can release owls and monkeys and
other animals that are dangerous *end* A generic code often can be used to take
out the flowers *end*

The Mother or "A" Parts

The Mother part of the Goddess Trinity is the high point in all cycles *end*
Traditionally her color is red the color of life force *end* The Mother is
associated with adulthood and parenthood *end* The Mother is ripeness and
balance *end* Mothers actively work magick *end* She is a nurturer *end* She is confident
and has no indecision *end* The Mother knows what she is *end* She is the full
moon *end* Summer is the Mother’s time of the year the full moon is her
monthly point of power *end* She is honored by Beltane May  Summer
Solstice and Lunasa Aug *end*  *end* As stated before there are certain rituals
which call for Mothers rather than a maiden or a crone *end*
Maiden Or "B" Parts

The young maiden part of the mothers is the equivalent to the "apprentice"
level of the mystery schools and Freemasonry *end* The myth holds that the
maiden will be eternally youthful *end* Even with the aging process the
goddess can experience youthfulness in the mind *end* The maiden is the
creatress of new ideas *end* She also is the armed hunter of the Mother’s laws *end*
She is the Guardian of the Balance *end* She is aware of her sexuality *end* She is
independent and not controlled by men *end* She is the Way-Shower the
Keeper of the Keys *end* You will find the maiden in the following rituals
    New beginning rituals    Plans for conception    The birth of a child    The first menstruation for girls    Puberty rituals for boys

occult she is the elder of unlimited wisdom *end* There are certain rituals

wheel or cycle of existence of the Mothers of Darkness *end* She is most likely

Hathor when turned loose on the earth slew humans until blood ran in the
rivers *end* She is the avenging Mother *end* She is identified with the heavenly cow
who made the Milky Way and the Nile Goose who laid the Golden Egg *end*
ISHTAR Mother in the swamps--Ishtar is Lady of heaven goddess of the
moon *end* Istar had a lion throne and a double serpent scepter *end* Ishtar went
down through  gates into darkness and then returned in order to try to find
her lover Tammuz *end* Sometimes Istar is accompanied by dragons *end* She was
originally a Babylonian goddess *end*
KALI Crone--Kali or Kali Ma is the best known Crone goddess *end* She will
be deep in an System *end* One image of her in mythology is squatting over the
dead Shiva devouring his penis while physically eating his intestines *end* This
is an actual Satanic ritual that Mothers-of -Darkness participate in *end* Kali
has both creation-& destruction abilities *end* Kali’s necklace in Indian legend
consists of skulls with magical sanskrit letters *end* Kali was and is worshipped
by a great number of people especially the Hindus *end* One group of
worshippers has been the Thugs who relate to the Assassins and the
Knights Templars *end* Another group of Kali worshippers are the gypsies who
left India in the middle ages and over the next following hundreds of years
travelled all over the world *end* Originally blood sacrifices of male animals or
men were made to her *end* There is a reported decrease in India of such blood
sacrifices from what it was a century ago *end* The favorite view of Kali is the
black Kali named Dakshinakali *end* She is usually shown black and naked
full-breasted with dishevelled hair and a wild grimace *end*
KORE-PERSEPHONE Maiden--A great mother of Greek myth *end* Kore
means "maiden" in greek *end* In mythology she watched the grain grow
among the wildflowers especially red poppies *end* She became the mistress of
the underworld *end* She guards the chasm that goes into the earth *end* She marks
each spirit of the dead on their forehead with pomegranate juice *end*
Pomegranates are used in ritual *end* Kore returns in Spring to see her mother
Demeter *end* According to Greek legend Kore was raped in Hades *end* She is also
known as the Queen of the Dead *end* A similar Illuminati ceremony takes
place where a male wearing a mask acts like Satan *end* Kore makes the
journey to Hades by herself without her mother *end* The Greek mystery
schools which included many great Greek thinkers have had rituals
around Kore *end*
MAAT--Maat’s name means "She whose name is Truth" *end* Her symbol is a
red ostrich feather *end* A ritual vow is "by the Feather of Maat." Maat’s

presence might explain why a System is infatuated with feathers *end* Maat is

B *end* Carousel

The Carousel in real life is used as a device to teach dissociation and how
the alters are to go up and down in trance *end* Sometimes you will see parents
who seem to be so loving having their children ride for long periods on a
carousel *end* They might actually be programming them in dissociation *end*

An internal carousel is built into an internal system *end* Mirrors and shadows
are placed around and perhaps in it *end* The carousel spins and moves up and
down repeatedly *end* In the center of the carousel the Programmers often
place something or someone important *end* They will often put this at the
bottom of the DNA double helix and have the double helix elevator shaft
coming up the center of the carousel *end* The carousel’s bottom side will set
on top of the system’s switching mechanism *end* And the core will sometimes
be placed in the center of the carousel somewhat underneath it *end* The
switching mechanism is the main control for turning the system the
Grandfather clock so to speak *end* The carousel may have umbrella
programming immediately on top of it *end* This could be Illuminati Delta
alters which can be one of the deepest things put in *end*

The carousel must be approached from the back side *end* At times an internal
key which often looks like an old key is needed to enter the Carousel *end*
Many Illuminati systems are given a key or set of keys and at times when
they enter therapy the front alters give this to their therapist not knowing
what the key is but knowing it is important *end* The co-authors believe that
these keys are carousel keys *end* A false trinity will be assigned to guard this
which will consist of the False Prophet The Beast or Dragon and the
Hoofed One *end* The false prophet and the Beast dragon come out of the
book of Revelations *end*

The Hoofed One is a rare occult term for Satan not to be confused with
the popular usage of the Horned One in the occult *end* The two terms are
different *end* If several carousels are built into a system then they will have

other guards than the false trinity *end* In many Illuminati systems there are
silent splits made from the core called silences and at this time during the
splitting process guards are made to the Carousel/core *end* The method of
doing this is to place black covers over the eyes of the victim and then
probes are inserted into the base of the skull as well as electric shocks
being applied body-wide and in the subcortical part of the brain *end*

The victim has their mouth restrained from screaming *end* The pain from this
is about as excruciating as a human can stand *end* First the fear part of the
brain is activated *end* Then the logic part is activated and the victim is told
repeatedly "Be good obey." Next the fear is stimulated and then the pain *end*
The head will have excruciating pain and so will the body to the point of
nausea and sickness *end* An alter will be created to carry the pain and one to
carry the fear and one to carry the anger *end* These will be identified and used
to guard the carousel *end* Six alters will guard the carousel *end* They will be
identified and linked to the most important carousel which guards the
core *end* To attempt to think about the carousel on the part of an alter may
bring up these guards and the system will abreact in memories that are
almost unbelievably painful *end*

If a therapist accidently triggers this get the little child guard to back up or
go to sleep *end* Make sure the heart of the victim and lungs continue to
function *end*

The alters within the victim’s system may have "aged" slightly since their
primal trauma and may appear about  years of age *end* Most alters this
young do not know how old they really are *end* Therapists will attempt to
associate the memory and provide anchors from the early memory to the
present *end* Association strategies are worked out by the therapist to deal with
the particular trauma in relation to what alters are there to help and were
involved in the trauma *end* The association may be done in steps *end* Older
helping alters can help assess the age of the infant alter by answering
questions about size teeth physical abilities verbal abilities etc *end* Verbal
abilities of illuminati infants may be advanced beyond norms *end*

F *end* Double Helix

This is a very important system *end* The double helix pattern is used as an

programming sites where they have full medical facilities such as
Letterman Hospital Presideo CA *end* The codes up and down the elevator are
alpha-numeric with lots of numbers *end* Because the way the double helix

shape twists one can ride the elevator and get off a level      but
you have to ride it the other way to get off at       *end* Because the
double helix is the centerpiece of how the different physiological states of

physiological states and levels is very risky and by the time it is through it
involves lots of blood transfusions for the victim *end*

The Caduceus is a double helix with snakes at the top *end* The Caduceus is an
occult symbol used in ancient Babylon ancient Hindu India and by
Chinese occultists *end* Mercury in occult lore carries a staff called a caduceus *end*
Mercury’s staff is a cabalistic symbol *end* William Heller’s book on the
Kaballah on page  states "Mercury’s staff called Caduceus and made
of intertwined black-and-white twin serpents heralds more forthcoming
splits into duality *end* Once again it reflects the ambivalent mind its
conscious and subconscious states its waking thoughts and imaginative
dreams." So according to cabalistic doctrine the caduceus represents the
various states of the mind *end*

Defenses In Death

What would happen if a slave physically got away from its master or
handler *end* This has happened countless times and the mind-control is so
solid that the handlers don’t have too much to worry about *end* Mind-
controlled slaves have gone to therapists for years and never gotten free of
the mind-control *end* The therapeutic process that the establishment has
schooled them in and then requires them to adhere to prevents the
therapist from doing things that might really set the victim free *end* Therapists
are often loath to give any help in any thing that smacks of spirituality *end* The
spiritual issues in many of these slaves are the most crucial issues facing
them *end* If they don’t resolve these spiritual issues the deeper alters will
continue to adhere to their blood oaths of allegiance to their Satanic
abusers and their oaths to serve Satan loyally *end*
Each cult which programs makes sure that they place in lots of loyal
alters which therapists call persecutor alters because they torment the

alters who want freedom *end* If therapists try to eliminate these persecutor
alters they will fight back with the full tenacity and strength that the
survival instinct gives to anyone *end* Their persecutor role needs to be
validated and then redirected toward productive ends *end* Many persecutor
alters see life simply as following their instructions and that they are
protecting the system from greater harm by stopping therapy *end* During
programming that was the case but if their System has reached a good
therapist and has good support team of other people their fears no longer
apply *end* The cult will attempt to show them that their fears do still apply *end*
Hopefully the support team for the system of alters will work as hard at
protecting as the abusers do to reinforce the fear *end* Many of the
programmers have been associated with the military *end*

One of the tricks that the military learned is a defense in depth *end* The
Russians employed defenses in depth with great success in  in the big
battle of Kursk during W.W *end* II *end* The first defense is that the slave has no
awareness of the MPD DID or that they are being used as a slave *end* Some
of the alters will realize that something is wrong but the mind control is
too strong for them to see clearly *end* Essentially the System is in trance all the
time even the front alters they do not perceive reality like people who are
not in trance all the time *end*

The next line of defense is that the fronts of an alter System don’t have a
clue about the abuse or what their system has been designed for *end* The front
alters will have alters which are loyal to the master and alters who are full
of craziness and disinformation *end* If the victim keeps probing which many
don’t they will discover an occult involvement *end* Even if they discover that
the System is related to the occult world the programming is still intact *end* If
the person finds out he is MPD and finds out that the System was part of
the occult world then he still is captured by all the programming which is
intact *end* Walls fire walls mazes suicide programming internal armies
programmed craziness and many other tactics sap the strength of the front
alters if they try to deviate from the straight and narrow programmed way
of behaving *end* WHEN THE FINAL CALL BACK IS GIVEN--many
Monarch slaves are programmed to kill their therapists because the
Illuminati will be able to hide/protect them once they leave their place in
society and return for the final callback *end*

Reporting alters hidden well in the System observe and secretly report
back to the Network everything a therapist does *end* The alters have fix me
codes to call for help such as "FIX ME" "QUEEN OF HEART" "THREE
LITTLE KITTENS WHO LOST THEIR MITTENS" "THE COWS IN
THE CORN LITTLE JACKIE HORNER WON’T YOU PLEASE BLOW
YOUR HORN." The jokers and internal programmers will work night and
day to stop or reverse any work done toward freedom *end*

There are so many levels suicide programs and so many other defenses a
person’s body is not strong enough to attack the programming head on *end*
There are for instance Bells of Destruction programming The War in the
Heavens suicide programming the Gethsemane Suicide Programming the

story *end* Another is a water program but in with Scripture from Jer *end* about

Armageddon programming is activated in those who have Bible

task look harder *end* One of the primary protective programs is the JUDAS

ELEMENTS--fire wind water and air *end* When the programming is touched
by anyone the elements of the earth come alive *end* For instance if the
programming is touched the following programs based on the four
elements come alive

WATER--victim will freeze like ice will suffocate like inhaling water
will boil like being placed in boiling water will feel a drip drip drip on the

not like to swim *end*
FIRE--Victim will burn inside and outside *end* The victim will remember fire

reinforced with the warning "If you disobey us Satan will take your

buried alive in either hot sand or a casket *end* Earth means "life or death" *end* The

earth "swallows people up." The victim may feel dehydrated from

How does one place into a child these types of programs *end* Let’s say the
programmers want to put in the Tumbleweed Program where the child
feels like it has become a tumbleweed & can’t ground and get its bearings
on anything *end* Let’s say the programmer also wants the child to lose his
arms & legs while being blown away *end* The child is dehydrated so the mind
is overheated and hallucinating *end* Special drugs are also given to the child to
make it more delirious make it more suggestible etc *end* The little child by
this point has no mind of its own *end* Heavy fans with hot air are placed upon
the child *end* It is hypnotically told that it has no arms and no legs *end* The child
is too weak to think for itself *end* It is almost comatose *end* The child will be left
for perhaps  hours as a script which keeps repeating itself is played on a
voice box *end* The child will hallucinate the script or the video it is being
shown *end* When the child can give the script back to the programmer exactly
like it is meant to be then the programmers know they can stop *end* The child
alter is to take on the identity of the tumbleweed *end* If it responds like many
Main alters--it will pass this ability on to splits that it creates for this
purpose *end* These splits created for the tumbleweed script will be clean slates
for the programmers to manipulate *end* By the way smelling salts are used to
wake up child victims who are too comatose *end*

Overview Of The Princess Programming

The Omega programs prevent integrating the Multiple personalities and
they hold the body programs and run the computers *end* If major tampering is
done with the System which threatens to totally wipe out the Omega
programs then one of the backup programs is the Princess programming *end*

The princess programming is a back up program *end* It can be triggered
several ways *end* One method is by astral communication between loyal alters
and their Illuminati programmer *end* However the main triggering factor is
that the System has recognized that serious tampering has been done to the
System *end* If serious deprogramming occurs the Princess program with
"Sleeping Beauty" kicks in *end*

The programming is contained within a box which is opened up upon the
appropriate cues *end* The way it operates is that it kicks in when the handler
loses control over a system *end* The princess who is kept sleeping by spiders
which bite her in a coffin wakes up and looks for the prince to come *end*
Daddy demon and the dark princess are now ruling from the castle
dungeon *end* A System’s dwarfs and Thor continue to guard as well as the big
guard cats like Bast *end* Darkness sets in on all the top sections of alters and
thick walls and pain come then a webbing much like a body-suit-cocoon
will envelope all but alters loyal to the master *end* It becomes hard to breathe
and the alters who had sought freedom from the programming now find
themselves being tranced out *end*

Alters who are cold and in lots of pain are called up by code to torment the
body *end* The Outer Darkness of a System sometimes called the Rubicon
gets thicker *end*

If Gatekeeper and Kitten alters have porcelain face programming then
they will get their porcelain masks back as the Omega programming kicks
back in *end* The porcelain masks have cords back to the black princess *end* The
black princess’s coffin has cords to Papa *end*

The core will give her energy to the dark side and alters who want
freedom will receive very little energy *end* They will be very tired *end* Those

alters who liked the light side and freedom are now under attack *end* They will
be isolated by walls and then incapacitated by a cocoon which leads to
death *end*

The alters who do not want to be part of Satanism will be worked over
and they will continue to be worked over until they shatter *end* If need be they
can be taken to the castle dungeon and played movies of torture which
have been coded and entered into the mind via codes *end*
Internal voodoo will be carried out to scare alters into complying *end* The
worlds will reestablish their compasses *end* The internal BEAST computer
along with the dark princess run the show *end* The box which opens up sets
off the suicide programming *end*

The primary tool in fighting the suicide programming is the will to fight *end* If
the will to fight is strong a way to fight through the walls can be found *end* If
the walls are broken down then a strategy of isolating the castle’s
programming can be carried out and eventually the black princess can
even be retrieved *end* Since the princess and daddy demon are running things
via spiritual and demon processes the battle at this point involves spiritual
warfare although there are probably other methods to solve the situation *end*

The castle programming will be isolated by closing the portals and other
safeguards *end* The Black Princesses can be turned from their course *end* The
Black Princess can be retrieved *end* The castle’s power can be shut down *end* The
Princess programming can be beat but it takes hard work *end* A system must
make decisions to continue fighting the programming with all their
creativity strength and will power *end*

A rebirthing program will go off *end* This rebirthing program is controlled by
a System of clocks *end* The clocks are the stabilizing heartbeat and are tied to
the eternal life force *end* There are also clocks which control the steps to the
Princess Programming *end* These clocks bring about steps which will take the
System down the road to no-return *end* These clocks can be frozen and by
freezing them one can stop the next step from taking place *end* In the
rebirthing program umbilical cords and strings run from alters back to the
black princess *end* The black princess is in the torture chamber of the dungeon

and the strings carry the torture memories to alters in sections wanting
freedom especially those holding the body *end* If those alters want to stop the
intense pain to the body they need to freeze those strings and stop the
torture memories from coming up from the torture chamber *end*

The umbilical cords are "feeding" the alters from the black princess *end* The
Kittens alters most likely due to programming will want to protect the
core so they do not want to stop the process of control that the black
princess is exerting over them *end* In other words they will find it hard to save
themselves *end* Internal Voodoo will come from a dollhouse and only by
dealing with inside the doll house can it be stopped *end* One option is to create
shields to protect alters from the voodoo *end*

Christians have the shield of faith which really can function in real life
and an internal shield of faith has protected and shielded Christians from
Voodoo *end* The darkness and what people alters call "walls" can be flooded
with the blood of Jesus which often drives back the darkness and can give
freedom to work *end* The soul ties that are involved with the princess
programming and the masks need to be broken and bound *end* The System
may be able to find someone or some place to get wisdom or
understanding about their System *end* The System also needs to cut their soul
ties to their Illuminati programmers *end* The rebirthing program is also giving
directions to the dark princess *end* There is an umbilical cord which ties the
dark princess to the rebirthing program *end* The blood of Jesus can stop this
tie *end*
Backup Programming

One of the backup programs is designed to deal with someone who has a
good understanding of a system and tries to take a system out via spiritual
warfare *end* A camera is designed to reflect an image onto a mirror and the
deprogrammer works with the mirror images *end* The deprogrammer has great
success with the mirror images because the camera can merely shift its
view and the things the deprogrammer is trying to get rid of disappear *end*
However since the alters that are collaborating with the deprogrammer see
all the correct things happen they sincerely think they are being
deprogrammed *end* When the deprogrammer finishes the alters feel better see

their worlds come together but the work has only been a sham *end* Other
backup programs provide the deprogrammer with mirror images and sham
alters to talk with *end* The deprogrammer never talks to the real human
elements *end* If we try to give a summary of the different backup programs we
could include

a *end* each grid has programs attached to its grid no *end* and each section has a
computer as well as connecting computers between sections---both the
programming and the computers have the power to reprogram themselves *end*
b *end* the  elements of nature coming alive programs

c *end* the princess program based on Sleeping Beauty

d *end* a plutonium or atom bomb set up activated by lasers to protect the
internal hierarchy *end*
The Monarch programming creates very complex systems that are as
sophisticated as an Apollo spacecraft *end* There is no way all the possible in
and outs can be covered *end* However the reader can watch a movie
"Labyrinth" to get a good idea of what the end product is like for the mind
of the victim *end* The movie represents what the internal world is like for an
alter who is trying to understand its mind *end* It would be worthwhile to finish
this chapter on structuring by covering this movie which illustrates the end
product *end* The bizarre movie Labyrinth may be shown again on HBO and is
available from some video stores *end* In fact the video stores have a hard time
meeting customer demands for this popular video *end* One of the co-authors
knows a girl who has watched "Labyrinth" twenty times *end*
"Labyrinth" A View of a Monarch's Internal World

In  a movie called "Labyrinth" was produced by Cherry McFadden *end*
The movie was Monty Python’s "Terry Jones" scripted *end* The movie is a
portrayal of what the internal world inside a Monarch mind-controlled
slave looks like *end* The Monarch slave has an internal world built inside their
mind in which the hundreds and thousands of alters must live in *end* The alters
are given a psychotic world of fiction in which they must live in as reality *end*

An alter of a Monarch slave will have two worlds the external world of
reality and their own internal world which because of the programming
will seem more real than the real world *end* Hogel a gnome tells Sarah
"Things are not what they seem in this place." The internal worlds of the
slave can be shifted and rearranged by the internal programmers *end* The
internal programmers can change codes eliminate alters and carry out
extensive deception to other parts of the System *end* As in the Monarch
programming the movie's castle reminds one of Emerald City *end* The movie
Labyrinth seems weird and occultic *end* Gargoyle elves similar to coven
demons dance magic and a sweet girl played by Jennifer Connelly moves
from one weird scene to another while an occasional shot gives us the
hideous ruler of the Castle played by David Bowie *end* These demons also
guard the baby that represents the innocent core *end*

Monarch slaves very frequently have castles built into their internal world *end*
Some slaves will have a whole series of castles some are King’s castles
some are Queen’s castles and some are castle’s shaped liked pyramids
with all-seeing eyes in them *end* The story line of the movie Labyrinth is that
the girl Sarah searches for her baby brother Toby who is captive in a
castle in a dream world *end* Actually this represents an alter searching for the
innocent core from which it split off from *end* Often the core the original
innocent child personality which split off personalities in order to remain
innocent is locked up in the castle by the programmer who serves as
Master of the castle *end* Often in deprogramming the core is taken to a castle
dungeon in a terrible backup program called the princess program which
was just described on a previous page *end*

The princess programming which is a back up program functions when
the regular programming goes down which is rare *end* When the Princess
back-up program kicks in the toad is kissed the princess core is woke up
etc *end* etc *end* Parts of the Princess program seem portrayed towards the end of
the movie *end* In the movie David Bowie who in real life was a satanist & a
rock star who committed suicide plays the part of the Master of the Castle *end*
The girl soon goes into the dream world internal world of her mind *end* She
must go through a labyrinth if she wants to get to the castle *end*

Although the movie is fiction it is close enough to how a Monarch’s mind

thinks that an adult Monarch slave might well have his or her
programming reinforced if they saw this film *end* It also would trigger many
Monarch slaves and create fear in them *end* Monarch slaves have many clocks
built into their systems *end* They have internal clock makers and internal clock
keepers *end* In the movie clocks pop up everywhere just like in a Monarch’s
mind *end*

Some Monarch slaves are programmed to see their internal world and
others are programmed not to be able to see their internal world *end* In other
words many Monarchs may not have the ability to see a great deal at first
of this programming due to further programming and yet these images
work in the deep recesses of their minds to keep their minds within the
confines of the programming *end* David Bowie has the magical ability to
rearrange time on the clocks *end* The handlers often mess with the internal and
external clocks of a slave so that the slave is disoriented about what time it
is *end*

Alters within a Monarch system are not allowed to stray from the path
assigned to them *end* If they try to move out of their assigned spot in the mind
then they encounter traps mazes tunnels and demons just like in the
movie Labyrinth *end* An internal world of a Monarch’s mind will have brick
walls doors and vortex tunnels just like in the movie *end* When the girl falls
into a vortex she has magician hands all over her *end* Monarch victims speak
of what vortexes are like and they often describe hands coming out of
nowhere *end* The movie begins with an oak tree *end*

The oak tree is an important part of the Illuminati programming *end* The
Master programmer in the castle wearing a triangle medallion around his
neck and looking veracious David Bowie sings "Voodoo *end* ..Babes with
the power. *end* .magic spells...dance magic...slap that baby and make him
pay....dance magic dance magic." Cobwebs are built into the Monarch
minds and when an alter goes where it shouldn’t they often get
cobwebbing over them *end* The tunnels in the movie are full of cobwebs *end*

As the girl moves forward toward the magic demon-invested Castle she
comes across many things--all of which relate to internal items built into a
Monarch slave’s mind *end* Some of the things are slightly different in the

movie than in a slave’s mind--but the concepts are the same *end* For instance
the actual Thor figure looks like the Iron Man of the Wizard of Oz series
rather than the iron robot that they portray *end* But the match is close enough
for the imagery to portray what it is meant to represent *end*

During programming bracelets with pieces will be given to the child to
teach them how the alters are to revolve *end* A bracelet like this is owned by
the girl *end* The girl encounters a dwarf *end* The dwarfs in the internal world
"mine the jewels" that is the programming *end* The Jewels are the particular
programs that run a Monarch system of alters of an MPD DID mind *end* The
dwarf in the movie is told by David Bowie the Programmer that he has
"lost his Jewels"--that is that he has lost his programming *end* The dwarf in
the movie decides to help the girl *end* In Monarch programming the dwarf
helps an alter by bringing it programming *end* Some help *end* The goblin demon
is asked by the girl to find a portal *end* The goblin opens a door and it appears
to be a broom closet *end* He opens it again and it appears as a door *end* This is the
exact way the programming is *end* Portals and doors in the internal world have
cover stories *end* At first they look like one thing--but if the mind can get by
the first look--they will turn out in reality to be something else *end*

There is cover programming over everything--so that the slave doesn’t
trust his own mind *end* For instance besides lots of clocks undisguised clocks
are disguised in a System as any object but they can be recognized by the
trained observer because they are gold colored *end* In the movie objects are
constantly changing *end*
Many monarch’s fear the rocks coming alive--just as they do in the movie
Labyrinth *end* In the bottom of the slave’s mind--put in at the deepest hypnotic
levels possible are the hell pits *end* The movie shows the hell pit and even
calls it the "hell pit." Notice that as she goes into this strange world that the
clocks can be turned around *end* This is true in the programming *end* The clocks
can be turned by the programmer so that the slave can be told it is January
when it is December *end*
A cover program can be entered so that the slave has memory of what he
was supposed to have done in December *end* These false memories are laid in
with real torture memories and tied to emotions *end* The false memories lack

certain characteristics of real memories--and yet still they can at times be
difficult to separate from the true memories especially if the mind-
controlled slave is in programming *end*

The following is the story line of the movie as it happens in this bizarre
movie *end* Early in the movie we see a witch with an hour glass *end* When the girl
gets to the castle it is guarded by a mechanical monster that resembles in
some ways Thor of the programming *end* Notice that portals and holes open
up *end* When they open up another level protectors attack them and they must
run back down their tunnel to save themselves *end* The Monarch slave will get
feelings of being crushed if an alter ventures where it shouldn’t in the
mind *end* When the girl asks the dwarf "How can I believe anything you say?"
She is told "What choice do you have?" Fire demons come out dancing *end*
They take out their eyeballs and eat them *end* They say "Bad luck down the
path." What the fire demons represent are the Gamma programming and
the threats that the Gamma programming has upon the victim *end*

The programming tells an alter that it will lose its head or other horrible
threat if it doesn’t comply with the programming *end* "Let’s take off her head"
the fire demons say as they act out the various programs--decapitation
delimbing etc *end* They also want to throw her into the pit of eternal flames *end*
They go down a chute into the eternal hell pit *end* It is even called the eternal
pit in the movie *end* The hell pits of a slave will generally smell like sulfur--
which is exactly what the movie’s hell pit does *end* A guardian of the pit
looking like a dog comes out *end* Guardians within the Monarch’s mind are
generally far more horrifying than this dog *end* The guardian must give
permission for passage *end* Another trap appears--as the slave’s internal world
is filled with booby traps *end* The name of the dog the guardian rides on is
Ambrosius similar to Ambrosia *end* A peach with poison is given to the
dwarf *end* The slave is programmed to fear poisoned fruit *end* This is another
fairy tale turned into programming *end*

David Bowie is called an "adept" who creates dream bubbles *end* The slave’s
mind will have adepts who are the programmers *end* The movieadept puts a
princess in a bubble *end* Then she goes by memory back to when she was at a
Satanic ball where people wear masks of birds goats and pigs *end*

Illuminati ceremonies include balls like this with masks *end* This Love story is
reliving programming of the girl that she is a Queen that she is married to
Satan and that this is a bonding ceremony *end* Everyone is grabbing her *end*
People who have been to this Illuminati ceremony will recognize it *end* Next
she sees mirrors *end* When she shatters the mirrors a no-no in the
programming she begins falling *end* Generally if a slave shatters the mirrors
in their mind--they fall into suicide programming *end* She falls into a
junkyard *end* Then a satanic seed comes alive from her fruit *end* It is a worm *end* An
old hag gives her a teddy bear *end* The programmers and parents of slaves
frequently give stuffed animals *end* The teddy bear without hands represents
to the victim their helplessness *end* The old hag says "like a little bunny
rabbit...Don’t you...Bitsy Boob" All this is Monarch programming stuff *end*
Then she sees a book about the labyrinth *end* The Monarch’s mind has
libraries and diagrams of their own system but these are kept guarded by
the mirrors the demons and programming *end* The girl Sarah finds a book
the files of how the labyrinth is built *end* Actually you can too *end*

If the original programming was Wizard of Oz programming--then when
you looked at the front of the Wizard of Oz series books you would find a
map that helped build the internal world *end* Some of the items on that map
will likely be found in your Monarch system but not all *end* If your Monarch
system has Star Trek programming it is possible they will have an internal
world similar to the diagrams shown in this book where Star Trek
programming is covered *end* In other words there are books which do show
the labyrinth just as the movie Labyrinth has Sarah find a book showing
the internal world *end* But if an alter finds a map this does not mean the alter
can travel freely in its system’s mind *end*

In working with a mind-controlled slave we discovered one of the
methods to get over the Wizard of Oz mazes was to fly with the Orks *end*
However an alter caught in the mazes was frightened to stay put by the
demons that surrounded it *end* This is so well portrayed in Labyrinth *end*

This happens in real life to Monarch alters which stray into the mazes *end*
They are lost and then they can’t come out and take the body *end* They are
simply lost in the mind *end* The old hag gives her slippers *end* Slippers are

important triggers or cues to go places internally *end* She is given a horsey and
told she loves it *end* "Take back the child you have stolen." A ferris wheel is
shown *end* Carrousels were used greatly in programming *end* Then she breaks
an hour glass *end* Hour glasses are internal clocks *end* Then she encounters levels
doors and tunnels *end* An Iron robot representing Thor comes out and bangs
bangs bangs *end*

The banging is the split brain headaches that the internal Thor causes the
victim’s mind to experience *end* A child is placed into the robot *end* Often during
the programming child alters are programmed to put on a robot like suit
and serve with other children as clone solders in a clone army *end* The sea
divers of the Walt Disney movie " Leagues Under the Sea" were
used to program child alters into how they were to get into robot suits *end*
These child alters form armies that attack if an alter tries to fight the
programming *end* These children alters are like children screaming--it is
impossible to reason or talk to them *end* Armies of these alters are difficult to
stop in the mind *end*
In the programming the brave are told they are brave and vice-versa *end* The
character says "I have no courage." But is told "You are a man of
courage." More clocks and a bell appears *end* A red and blue guardian appear *end*
Perhaps these colors represent the color programming *end* Rocks and cannons
represent the protectors and the earthquakes they cause internally in a
Monarch’s mind *end* When she enters the castle it is a carbon copy of Esher’s
drawing entitled "Relativity." See The Graphic Work of MC *end* Esher figure
 *end* She runs up stairs and gets nowhere *end* Escher’s drawing according to
ex-programmers are used for programming *end* The Master sings
"Everything I’ve done I’ve done for you." David appears everywhere from
every angle *end* This is how the internal programmers which are clones of the
real programmers appear everywhere in the mind of the slave *end* He sings
"Just as I can be so cruel...look without your heart beat *end* ..I must live within
you."

She says "Give me the child the core" and the programmer says "I have
been generous *end* ..but I can be so cruel ... *end* I have reordered time...turned the
world upside down...all for you." The internal and external programmers
can be cruel *end* The victim is trauma bonded to them *end* They are cruel and kind

to the victim just like Mengele was to his thousands of victims *end*

The internal worlds can be turned in a Monarch system by turning the
hour glasses which are on X Y and Z axes *end* The hour glasses are turned
with hand signals and codes that are similar to what pilots use to tell their
degree positions in the sky *end* The programmer sings "I ask for so little just
let me rule you and you can have everything you want...just love me fear
me and do as I say." He tells her that her kingdom is great *end* Internally
alters are given great titles and are made queens etc *end* Their internal worlds
give them all they need and that the real external world will never
understand them *end* She is told repeatedly "Your kingdom is great." "Bow
down and worship me and you get everything." At this point she realizes
she has dominion over the demons *end*

When one listens to the programming it seems that it is powerful and in
control *end* The movie does a good job of showing how a slave’s mind has
both an internal and an external world *end* A hall appears with daisies *end* Daisies
were used in programming *end* When she leaves the internal world she finds
that the internal world is right there with her in her external world *end* She is
surrounded by internal cues *end* Then she embraces and accepts her internal
world toward the ending of the movie *end* Many systems have an owl in their
system which represents the master *end* In the movie an owl representing the
master appears at various times & then flies away at the end *end* Toward the
end the Master sings "Power of Voodoo..."

The internal world is full of goblins dwarfs worms a hat door knockers
Fury  and many other things *end* Ravens are in the movie *end* In real life
the programmers take alter fragments which are splits which are not
developed into full blown personalities and they program them to have a
single task for instance to think they are a raven and to bite the body when
ever they take the body *end*

Whole flocks of demons which take the form of ravens may wait inside the
mind waiting for their release to bite the body *end* When triggered by the
internal programmers when an alter crosses the boundaries set down by the
programming a flock of ravens may come forward and "take the body" as
they say in MPD of the slave and the Monarch slave will bite his or her

flesh and viciously tear it with its teeth *end*
By watching the movie Labyrinth and using this as a guide the viewer
will begin to understand the horror and control that the internal world
holds over the alters of a Monarch slave *end* Few Monarch slaves ever tell
other people what is going on in their minds now you have been
privileged to find out *end* To learn this much for a Monarch slave comes with
a high price *end* The price is paid by reliving for a second time what has been
done to them fighting off the suicide programs that click on when the
slave’s mind disobeys *end* The slave must also fight off torture memories that
recycle *end* These torture memories are activated by the programming when
an alter disobeys its programming *end* As one Monarch survivor described it
to me "This all can be wrapped up by defining it as the raping of the body
soul and spirit."

The Structuring Done in Monarch Star Trek and Star Wars
Programming

The original Monarch programming often used the Wizard of Oz books
and film as the basic programming *end* The Alice and Wonderland story then
was overlaid along with many other fictional fairy tales to complete the
Mind Control of a Monarch Mind-controlled slave *end* However in recent
years a superior story line has appeared *end* It has more flexibility and more
secrecy *end* This is the Star Trek series *end*
In recent years Star Trek is being used as a basis of programming *end* Those
who are programmed with Star Trek programming can attend annual Star
Trek Conventions which are held in New York City since  *end*

The child’s mind is tortured until the point they will accept anything *end* They
are told to build certain structures in their mind *end* These structures may be
castles or rivers or submarines or airfields etc *end* In the case of Star Trek
programming they have detailed maps and diagrams that have been created
to go along with the Star Trek program *end* The real reason or the ulterior
motive of these Star Trek maps was to create a blueprint for programming *end*
Some pages of these are included for you to look at *end*

Then particular alters are placed within these structures and they are
hypnotically given cues that will pull them to the front of the mind when
the alpha-numeric cue is said *end* Many of the more secret alters can only be
accessed by a combination of several different cues which go to different
senses--such as the person must be in a corner contacting  points a
certain ring must be turned & a certain code said for the alter to come
forth *end*

The advantages of the Star Trek story line is that

a *end* almost any type of scenario can be fit into the programming script
because the Star Trek characters in the series encounter about anything
imaginable

b *end* have holograms which can serve as substitutes for mirror images in the
programming

c *end* alien programming can be introduced in order to promote the mock alien
invasion being planned by the Illuminati and

d *end* the Star Trek series has its own language which can be used for trigger
codes which Monarch slaves can study and learn *end* The use of this klingon
language will make it very difficult for ordinary people to break into the
slave’s programming *end*

Michael Aquino Satanist and Colonel in the U.S *end* army has enjoyed using
Star Wars for programming *end* Aquino wrote his own version of the Star
Wars which he uses for programming *end* The programmer becomes Darth
Vader which then is reproduced as an alter within the victim *end* In the Star
Trek series Data was a dehumanized "person" who stored vast amounts of
information *end* Monarch slaves are always created with libraries and
volumes of information *end* This information is stored in various ways and
can be retrieved in a variety of ways *end* Data of Star Trek lends himself to
become the model for an alter of a Monarch system to copy *end* In other
words the child is shown Data and is steered in the right direction to create
an internal person named Data *end*

Any child if it is drugged tortured threatened with death if they don’t
follow directions with weakened and confused minds will get to the point
where the child will create a Data alter in its mind rather than die *end* Once in
place the Data alter will think of itself as the movie character *end* Every time
the child sees Star Trek or pictures of Data it will reinforce the
programming *end* The transformer room technique of beaming in Star Trek is
what magicians have tried to do for centuries and which has been called
"bi-location-physical projection" as well as other things *end* This is said in
magic to be mental control over the molecules of the body via demonic
power *end* Whether magicians have ever done this who knows some
certainly claim the power *end*

The Illuminist is a power structure placed into some Monarch slaves *end* It is
constructed from parts of numerous demons rather like a demonic
Frankenstein & is portrayed in Star Trek the Next Gener *end* as the
crystalline body *end* A cartoon series was created for Star Trek *end* In this series
children watch such things as Kirk in a magical universe of Megas-tu
which has a Guardian of Forever *end* Two other spin-out shows were Deep
Space Nine and S.T *end* Voyager *end* In other words a child could watch
different Star Trek series *end* If the child’s parents had cable T.V *end* the child be
virtually immersed into the various Star Trek shows *end* Unfortunately some
of the children who have been programmed with this are doing exactly that *end*
Fritz has personally worked with someone who has Star Trek

A *end* The Scarring of the Brain Stem

Early on it was discovered that the brain would overcompensate for
scarring on the brain stem *end* This is a principle similar to weight lifting *end* By
tearing down the muscle fiber by overexertion the body rebuilds the
muscle stronger *end* By scarring the brain stem it -was discovered that
geniuses who had photographic memories could be created *end*

B *end* Split Brain Work

The brain is "bicameral" or two-sided *end* The two-sides called hemispheres
communicate via a superpowerful connector called the corpus callosum *end*
The left hemisphere is specialized in verbal-linguistic transduction of
speech and analytical thinking logic math cause & effect language &
sequential thinking *end* The right side plays more of a role in holistic-
metaphorical information transduction such as imagery art dance
intuition subjective spontaneous holistic & dream imagery *end* The
primary role of creating imagery is carried out by the right side *end*

Roger Sperry a neuroscientist won a Nobel Prize for feeding information
to only one side of the brain and also for feeding simultaneously both
sides of the brain different information *end* His results showed that the two
hemispheres could operate separately at the same time *end* We hate to rewrite
history but the work that won Sperry a Nobel Prize was being done to
unwilling human victims before his publicly known experiments *end* Sperry’s
research left people wondering if it wasn’t possible to have one personality
located in one hemisphere and another person in the other *end*
Psychologist Julian Jaynes wrote a book arguing that mankind used to
have two personalities before the two hemispheres evolved an ability to
integrate *end* His book is The Origin of Consciousness in the Breakdown of
the Bicameral Mind *end* Before the public had heard about the ability of the
two hemispheres to work independently the Illuminati and MK-Ultra
programmers were carrying out split brain programming by two methods

 *end* shutting down one side and communicating only with one side of the
brain and  *end* by simultaneously feeding different information to each
hemisphere *end*

forced open and different movies shown simultaneously to both eyes *end* This
creates a form of split brain programming *end* High speed films will be shown
with one hemisphere receiving horror scenes and the other getting family
settings *end* This makes the two hemispheres work separately and the victim
feel crazy *end* The mind feels ripped apart *end* One hemisphere is trying to

dissociate and is having a miserable experience while the other side is
experiencing something just the opposite *end* When high speed films are
shown for split brain programming the films are shown in  minute
increments *end*

perfect world with a good family life *end* Right side satanic alters may receive
horror films shown via the left eye *end* The right side of the brain doesn’t
verbalize well so this is one reason slaves have emotions without the
ability to verbalize *end*

A possible third method is to use drugs that block the two hemispheres
from communicating *end* A fourth method in split brain work is to speak into
the left ear while giving the right ear confusing noise *end* This last method is
sometimes done to force alters to concentrate when learning scripts *end* The

injected at the base of the skull into one hemisphere of the brain to shut it
down while the other hemisphere is kept awake *end* Torture is then carried
out to split the mind *end* What this does is create programs and alters which
are associated with only half of the brain *end* The brain is being further
divided from itself *end*

one side of the brain to think differently from those of the other side *end* Split
brain programming is not just hypnosis as some have been led to believe *end*

left hand from knowing what the right hand is doing *end* It also gives them the
ability to put in body programs or memories which effect only half of the
victim’s body *end*
When one hemisphere is dominating in what the brain is doing the
opposite nostril will open and take in air *end* When the right hemisphere is
doing most of the thinking the left nostril will be doing most of the

lays on his side the downward side hemisphere will be activated because

C *end* Medical Technologies

visually look at brain cells on functioning brains *end*

Health have taken PET scans of the brains of people with multiple
personalities whose brain scans from one alter personality to another are
very different *end* This doesn’t occur in non-multiple people who pretend to
have different personalities *end* The brain scans have shown that brains with
multiple personalities are physically different than other people’s brains *end*
The different personalities are often in different neurophysiological states *end*

anyway *end* Medical science has identified glutamate which is an amino acid

completely how the brain stores memory *end* However the NWO’s Network
understands far more than they have let the public learn *end*

D *end* Histamines

Histamine is a chemical a particular molecule which the body uses to
defend against alien cells *end* It also has the ability to lower blood pressure
and to flare up the skin *end* The auditory sense can effect histamine production
via programming *end*

Histamine is a molecule which is part of the immune system *end* Changes in
histamine levels effect moles *end* It effects skin changes in scars *end* This is how
the abusers can magically make scars appear and disappear which makes
the programming seem even more real to alters *end* The abusers like to create
invisible scars that form patterns and pictures *end* The most popular is the
Baphomet head which stands for Satan *end* Upon command they can trigger
the skin to make these scars visible *end* If one pricks someone’s skin with a
needle having histamine on the tip it will cause the skin to flare up red *end*
Biofeedback has allowed people to mentally talk to their skin *end* Hypnosis
has controlled people’s immune system *end* States of mind effect the immune

system *end* Somehow a combination of these is used to allow the handler upon
command to trigger the correct state of mind within the victim to increase
histamine production within the skin area *end*

The bone marrow of the body produces stem cells *end* The stem cells are
capable of growing into many different types of cells *end* First the stem cells
grow into some basic different cells and those in turn grow some more and
further differentiate *end* For instance a stem cell can become a myeloid
which can become a polymorpho nuclear granulocyte which in turn can
become a basophil or mast cell *end* Both basophils and mast cells are
leukocytes and they are part of the body’s immune system *end* Both basophils
and mast cells are carriers of histamine *end*

Histamine does several things in the body *end* Histamine causes dilation of
blood vessels and it allows blood vessels to become permeable leaky so
to speak which allows other chemicals and fluid to go through the blood
vessels into the area between cells and tissues *end* All CNS Central Nervous
System cells of the body have receptors that the histamine can attach itself
to like a ship docking *end* When cells are damaged or alien cells enter the
body the basophils and mast cells release their histamine *end*

For the body to have more histamine it must increase the number of
basophils and mast cells *end* This can be accomplished by changing the ratio
of stem cells that develop into other types of cells *end* The core of the
histamine molecule is an ethylamine *end* Antihistamines are molecules that
resemble histamines enough that they can attach themselves to the
histamine receptors on regular cells and prevent the histamine molecules
from attaching *end* If the histamine molecules don’t attach the body disposes
of them *end* The point being that histamine remains in the skin only so long
before the body disposes of it *end* Histamine levels in the body can raise IF the
cells which carry the histamine are increased *end*
This is the Structure of a Histamine Molecule

It is believed that breast implants have some kind of effect on raising
histamine production levels in the body *end* Whether these breast implants are

relationship between the Network’s need to raise histamine production in

Physical Aspects of the Human Brain

Neurobiologists and chemists have learned a great deal about the physical
aspects of the brain *end* One has to be careful about simplification *end* The
concept of the split brain has been over simplified because the best
researchers on the two hemispheres know that there is constant interplay
between the brain’s two halves--unless the Illuminati have tampered with
someone’s brain *end* The split brain concept has been replaced with the Penta-
Brain something akin to a pentagram *end* The Penta-Brain takes the triune-
concept of the brain conceived by brain scientist Paul MacClean and adds
it to the split brain hemispheres and the duality of the frontal-posterior
dimension also *end* In this process "mammalian" & "reptilian" brains those
parts of our brains that mammals & reptiles also have are accessed and
worked on in people *end*
The best description read by co-author Fritz of the intricate chemical
changes that happen during Learning and Memory is a Special Report
entitled "The Chemistry of Learning and Memory" Chemical &
Engineering News Oct *end*   pp *end* -  by Karen J *end* Skinner Yale
Chemistry Ph.D *end* in ‘ Masters from Kennedy School of Govt *end* Harvard *end*
This is a very technical report *end* The programmers do not learn this material
but those who want to understand the nitty-gritty molecular-biology of
how the complex memory processes work in the mind might want to try to
study the report *end*

In very basic terms what it is communicating is Neurons nerve cells--of
which the brain has  billion meet each other at junctions gaps called
synapses *end* At the synapses gaps neurotransmitters allow them to
communicate *end* There are  trillion synapses *end* As a person gathers
information the brain changes the synapses in a sense rewires itself *end* Part
of memory is how the brain "rewires" itself to use a layman’s term *end*
Genetics have an important role in the initial hardwiring of the brain *end*
Genetics also determine receptor diversity at the synapses which relates
directly to learning & memory because it increases the ways neurons can
perceive process and recall information *end*

The Hippocampus has been found to play a role in long term memory
storage *end* The Hippocampus stores memory in the cortex to be encoded into
long term memory *end* Numerous areas of the brain are busy with processing

only one type of memory *end* In a macaque monkey around two dozen
distinct visual areas of the brain for memory storage have been discovered *end*
In other reports it has come out that memory is stored holographically *end*

German researchers have been trying to figure out at the Max Planck
Institute for Brain Research at Frankfurt Germany what mechanism is
used to bind the many various parts of information stored into a coherent
recollection *end* The point that should be made at this point is that an alter
does not exist in one spot in the mind *end* The mind perceives that an alter
does but an alter in terms of physical change in the brain is actually a
multitude of synaptic changes scattered throughout the brain *end* The brain's
concept/image of an alter and the dissociated state can be played with by
the programmers but they really don’t kill alters like they pretend to do
during programming *end*

neurons in harmony in phase called a "binding" process *end* Perceptions
which are not memories are initiated this way *end* It is these perceptions that
exist without memories that are so important to the programmers *end* Some
have called these perceptions "global unity" of the brain *end* These are in
phase frequencies from  to  Hz *end* NMDA receptors can perceive
patterned firings from nerve cells that are active at the same time which
allows the brain to strengthen some synapses and let others grow weaker *end*
Synaptic efficacy is called LTP *end* Interested readers can study LTP’s
molecular mechanism etc *end* in Karen Skinner’s Report *end* Changing subjects

able to make lots of comparisons - between various animals *end* Some animals

between various animals which can be compared so that the technical

feature which allows one animal to do something underwater that another
species can’t can be identified *end* Once the feature is identified then research
can begin on how to obtain this feature for human swimmers *end* For instance

air can under optimum conditions stay underwater indefinitely *end* Turtles
have an incredible tolerance for anoxia in comparison to other reptiles
which go underwater *end* And sea turtles have the best tolerance of all the
various turtles *end* This is the type of difference that lends itself to comparison
research *end*

when Paul Bert examined the differences between domestic chickens and
mallard ducks *end* Doing comparisons it is easy to find out that birds and
mammals which dive have greater storage in their bodies for  than

Kooyman Gerald L *end* Diverse Divers Physiology and Behavior *end* Berlin
Ger *end* Springer-Verlag  p *end*  states "Little further experimental work
was done on the subject of gas exchange in human breath-hold divers until
the early s." Can you believe that the British Germans and Americans
didn’t research such an important underwater subject for  years *end* Yes
they did continue frantic secret research and they eventually learned how
to solve a number of undersea problems facing humans *end*

First the regulation of respiration is carried out by what is called the
Chemoreceptors which are carotid and aortic bodies which detect the
changes in the partial pressures of oxygen and carbon dioxide in the blood *end*

The CO break point mechanism is sensitive to a number of phenomena

which can prevent it from protecting a person *end* When a person breaths he
has an ingassing and an outgassing of oxygen carbon dioxide nitrogen
and other gasses *end* The levels of each of these gasses and their nature are
important factors in how a person’s body underwater functions or dies *end* If

the level of CO gets too high the person can become unconscious *end* The

human circulatory system has to be changed to be able to adapt to the
ocean environment *end*
In dealing with men swimming underwater all the laws of gasses that
regular divers have to deal with still apply to Amphibious Man--such as
Amonoton’s law Boyle’s Law Charles Law Henry’s Law and
Haldanian’s Theory on gas absorption and elimination by body tissues *end*
Blood glucose is the only source for carbon when humans dive which
forces muscles to rely primarily on anaerobic glycolysis *end* This means that
oxygen depletion is not the only major problem for those who hold their
breath and swim *end* Blood glucose levels must be attained for underwater
swimmers that will sustain activity *end* Breathing water must assure the proper
functioning of the circulatory system *end* The high salinity of sea water causes
hypertonic reactions in the lungs *end* Fresh water has too little salt in relation
to the human blood & it causes hypotonic reactions *end* Either way the water
either fresh or salt causes the alveolar tissue to damage and the body
begins leaking proteins out of the mouth *end*

Secret naval intelligence researchers tied to the Illuminati studied what
happens underwater to the heart rate cardiac output and stroke volume
blood pressure and flow the various important organs and the human
brain the muscles and bones and venous circulation the hemoglobin
affinity for  the effect of being submersed on blood gases how oxygen
is stored and how hemoglobin concentrates in the body *end*

Observations of a Satanic Family
Carrying Out Monarch Conditioning on Their Children

The husband of the family was about  and the wife was about  *end* A
young man perhaps an uncle of the children about  also sat at the table
with them *end* The family had  children ranging from about  / years old
to about  years old *end* During the entire time we watched them which was
over an hour we never saw one act of love not one act of nurturing on the
part of the parents *end* Everything was programming programming and more
programming *end* The husband had an attitude of control over his children *end* He
was a young somewhat wild cock-sure type *end* From piecing together things
it was clear that he made a good salary and that he and his wife enjoyed
profanity *end* His wife had the most dead looking eyes we have ever seen in a
person *end* She looked every bit the part of a Satanic priestess of the worst
type *end*
The young man of about  had a very large knife hidden on his back that
we noticed only by close observation of his movements *end* Although it was
o’clock the adults were calling their meal "breakfast."

The main male child was about  years old *end* He had an older sister and two
younger sisters and they all had a baby brother *end* During the entire time that
the family was there the children ate almost nothing *end* The  yr *end* boy
munched on a watermelon rind trying to draw some sustenance from it *end*
Part of mind control is depriving the body of food *end* The poor children never
once asked for anything; that is a clue that something wasn’t normal *end*

boy *end* The questions were like

chart *end* What are the names of the first five presidents *end* What is the square
root of  *end* The boy would roboticly answer each question successfully *end*
