Handwriting Modification

Psychology developed over the years a number of projective objective and
subjective tests of personality *end* Ludwig Klages of Germany H.J *end* Eysenck
of England and M.N *end* Bunker of the U.S *end* are some of the notable
researchers who took handwriting analysis out of the occult realm and into
the scientific realm *end* The co-author Fritz happens to be a certified
Graphoanalyst through IGAS who has done Graphoanalysis
professionally *end* IGAS has strict standards not to allow members to do
anything associated with the occult but insists they keep their work on a
scientific basis *end*

When a person writes he will use about  separate muscles in the hand
arm and body *end* The mind coordinates all these muscle movements *end* A good
handwriting analyst has about  different things that he can look for in a
sample of handwriting such as how hard did the writer write with his
instrument how big where did he start on the paper how did he cross his
"t" etc *end* In other words the mind in order to write had to make hundreds of
decisions within seconds *end* There are too many decisions to make them all
the decisions consciously *end* This is why document examiners can

authenticate signatures *end* Most of the many decisions as one writes are done
subconsciously and the decisions are influenced by state of mind
personality the state of the physical body and the environment *end*

The good handwriting analyst is able to work backwards *end* Why was the
decision made to make the capital P look like an L *end* Why did the person
start their writing half-way into the paper and waste half the piece of
paper *end* Through scientific studies and observations a vast wealth of
understanding has developed by graphologists about why certain decisions
are made *end* Some graphologists use a wholistic method others like
graphoanalysts analyze each stroke *end* Both methods will give the same
results if the handwriting analyst is skilled at applying the principles of
graphology *end*

Handwriting analysis has not gotten the credibility it deserves in part
because it is such a powerful diagnostic tool the intelligence agencies
have wanted to keep it to themselves *end* However the nation of Israel uses
handwriting analysis to hire with and a high percentage of the businesses
use it in hiring also *end* The nation of Israel has had a high rate of success with
handwriting analysis *end*

How does handwriting analysis play a part in the mind control *end* Several
ways *end* A number of the programmers are skilled in handwriting analysis *end*
They are well aware that the abuse of their slaves will show in the
handwriting *end* Through behavior modification usually torture the front
alters are trained to write in a fashion that hides the abuse *end* The abuse will
show in the handwriting of most of the alters so many of them are
programmed not to read or write *end* This is why some of the child alters will
have older alters write for them *end*
The programmers were also aware of how the mind heals/changes itself
via handwriting therapy *end* If the mind will place enough energy into writing
a particular way--it will go ahead and put enough energy into becoming
what it writes *end* In other words if I am lazy but I get determined enough to
focus the brain so that it doesn’t make handwriting strokes that indicate
laziness then my brain will also change its lazy attitude in other ways *end* In
other words I can begin to change a personality trait by working on the

handwriting decisions that stem from that trait *end* The programmers can and
do help modify their slaves’ personalities this way *end* They of course will
employ a number of personality changing techniques as a group package *end*
The goal is to bring as much pressure to bear as possible to get the original
trait modified *end* This will be done in accordance with the programming
goals for the various alters within a system *end* Remember some alters need
to be outgoing and other reticent some melancholic and others sanguine
or choleric *end* The programmers know what they want and how to modify
what they have to get the temperament and personality traits they want *end*

Behavior Mod Modification

Behavior modification comes in various packages *end* One package has been
called ELT Electrolytic Trtmt developed by H.C *end* Tien *end* One simple
version of behavior mod is to find out what someone has done which is
good and praise and reinforce that behavior *end* Then state the goal *end* And then
continue to reinforce promptly the good things the person is doing *end* The
goal in mind must be measurable *end* An example of this might be for a
handler to praise his kitten and to purchase it nice things if a client is
satisfied with the sexual service he got *end* The reinforcement needs to be
soon and appropriate *end* ‘‘Thinking behavior’’ is a term that behavior mod
scientists use *end* "Adverse conditioning" is another *end*

Anectine which paralyzes the body and makes one think they are
suffocating can be used for aversion conditioning *end* The victim is told not
to do a particular behavior or else experience discomfort *end* When behavior
modification is done in programming you can be sure that there is paper
work done to chart the progress *end* Rather than worry about what a person is
thinking the behaviorist charts a person’s behavior and then gives
reinforcements of correct behavior or the opposite adverse rewards of
punishment to modify it *end*

Victims are conditioned to carry out certain behaviors *end* If an alter does
something wrong there is an immediate consequence set up for it *end* Soon it
is conditioned not to do what the programmer doesn’t want *end* The behavior
mod scientists believe that creativity can be controllable *end* When a child
creates a new form he is rewarded *end* Soon the child learns to create *end*

Illuminati Delta-Beta alters will be trained in espionage *end* They will be
trained to recognize a person’s physical identity instantly *end* One method of
training which has been used is to teach people to remember reflexively
rather than analytically *end* Thousands of faces or thousands of license plates
or whatever are flashed on a screen and when a repeat is shown the person
must press a button *end* If a mistake is made the slave is treated to a nasty
little shock *end* After a while a person develops the correct reflexes *end*

Slaves are being trained in recognition from the time they are small
children this is important so that they can build their internal worlds with
mirror images and other confusing things *end* The following "deeper"
programming is an example of classical conditioning *end* The child’s hand is
cut so that the child goes into a trance of shock and then each time they
use the word "deeper" they cut deeper to enhance the shock/trance state *end*
By pairing the word with this trauma when they are through the word
"deeper- asleep" will throw some alters instantly into a very deep trance *end*

Anchors

NLP researchers have noticed that people have emotional states in which
the entire body will take up a posture in carrying it out *end* Memories can
come into a person that causes the body to take up the negative states
again *end* The NLP practitioners have developed language which includes
such terms as Anchors emotional states and triggers *end* These words are
used to describe ideas that have long been in use *end*
For instance let’s say that when you heard a particular song at some point
in your life you were having a good time emotional state *end* Now that every
time you receive a trigger to that memory such as the song you regain
that good feeling that is attached to the memory of the song *end* Every time
you hear the song you feel good which then in turn continues to act as

reinforcement of the association of a good feeling to the song *end*

A stimulus that is linked to and triggers a physiological state or emotional
state is called an anchor *end* Our lives are filled with naturally occurring
anchors such as our favorite childhood smells or the alarm clock *end* One of
the Illuminati kingpins in Germany a Krupp liked the smell of manure
and built his house so he could smell horse manure all day *end* NLP is the art
of building associations with an anchor *end* A past emotion can be linked to
something today *end* If a person is afraid of public speaking then a good
feeling can be linked to giving talks *end* The skilled programmer will anchor
an emotion with several sense cues--including auditory visual and touch *end*
The person visualizes an emotional state from the past *end* When the state is
reaching its peak the anchor is placed in *end* The anchor needs to be unique
distinctive & easy to repeat in the exact form that it was done *end*

Much of the trauma-based programming is actually setting anchors using
extreme trauma *end* When the anchors are tested fired if the emotional state
is pulled up then the anchors have worked *end* Firing two separate anchors at
once is called collapsing anchors *end* Two separate states can be fired at once *end*
There is a methodology for collapsing anchors together *end*
Future Pacing

Future pacing can be used to help program a person toward his
occupational objective which was charted for the victim when they were
small *end* Future pacing is a mental rehearsal that is practiced in the
imagination so that the person can deal with some future challenge *end*
Expectations can often become self-fulfilling prophecies *end* NLP also is used
to teach people how to learn *end* It teaches people to learn a variety of
methods for a single skill *end* However this type of self-help info is not freely
given to the slave *end* It might be used if the programmers needed to develop
the person hypnotically in a certain direction *end*
Pacing For Hypnosis

Because Milton Erickson stands out as a genius among those who have
used hypnosis and people are still trying to figure out fully what he did it

is appropriate to mention his work *end* We don’t know how these ideas of
Milton Erickson’s are used by the Programmers *end* We do know that the CIA
has paid close attention to his ideas and that some of the Programmers
have some of the smoothest tongues *end* If there is some way to utilize
Erickson’s work to help control Mind-controlled slaves then the
Intelligence agencies have no doubt found it *end*

On the flip side several deprogrammers used Ericksonian methods to
unlock the programming of the people they want to help *end* What we
describe in this section is just a small sampling of Erickson’s methods *end*

Another type of NLP pacing besides the one just previously mentioned
was developed by Milton Erickson *end* He would gain rapport with anyone by
describing to them what they were feeling hearing and seeing *end* He would
induce a peaceful state by speaking slowly using a soft tonality and
pacing his speech to the person’s breath *end* Gradually hypnotic suggestions
are introduced to lead them into what is called "downtime." He would
gently encourage people with gentle suggestions such as ‘It’s easy to close
your eyes whenever you wish to feel more comfortable..."

But you may wonder how can anyone know what someone else is
thinking *end* Erickson developed language that was vague enough for people
to match their own thinking to what he described *end* He would use smooth
transitional words such as "while" "and" and "as" *end* The type of vague
sentences he would say are "It is well known that people can read books
and make changes." Milton Erickson learned to distract the dominant brain
hemisphere and also speak in a complex way that all seven plus or minus
two parts of the conscious mind would get engaged in trying to figure out
what his ambiguous statements meant *end* Milton found that he could say
anything if he set it up in the context of someone else saying it *end* He also
found that the unconscious mind does not process the linguistic negative *end*
Rather than tell a child "Don’t fall" tell it "Be careful."

Reframing With Metaphors

Metaphors some from Druidism or from some other occult teachings are
used by the Programmers *end* For instance the seasonal changes that leaves

on trees make is an example of a programming metaphor *end*
For those readers who don’t know what refraining is the following in the
book Refraining Neuro-Linguistic Programming and the Transformation
of Meaning by Bandler and Grinder Moab UT Real People Press
is an excellent story to explain it

"A very old Chinese Taoist story describes a farmer in a poor
country village *end* He was considered very well-to-do because
he owned a horse which he used for plowing and for
transportation *end* One day his horse ran away *end* All his neighbors
exclaimed how terrible this was but the farmer simply said
‘Maybe.’ "A few days later the horse returned and brought
two wild horses with it *end* The neighbors all rejoiced at his good
fortune but the farmer just said ‘Maybe.’ "The next day the
farmer’s son tried to ride one of the wild horses; the horse
threw him and broke the leg *end* The neighbors all offered their
sympathy for his misfortune but the farmer again said
‘Maybe.’ "The next week the conscription officers came to the
village to take young men for the army *end* They rejected the
farmer’s son because of his broken leg *end* When the neighbors
told him how lucky he was the farmer replied ‘Maybe.’"

The meaning of an event depends upon the FRAME we place upon it *end*
Those frames are perceptions *end* Occult fairy tales are great for refraining
events *end* A frog turns into a prince *end* Rudolf's embarrassing red nose becomes
a guiding light to bring happiness to people *end* Many of the common things
in our everyday life are refrained by the Programmers to have hidden mind-
control meanings *end* The Teddy Bear the child is given by her Daddy is to
remind her how helpless she is to prevent him from raping her *end* The
carousel toy is to remind the child of dissociation and the internal carousel
built into the mind *end* Many of the things that parents who are intentionally
raising a programmed child do look nice on the outside unless one can
reframe what they are doing in the context of total-mind-control based on
trauma and fear *end* Refraining can be done by collapsing anchors *end* For
instance the sober part of an alcoholic and the drunk state of the alcoholic
are given the same anchor and then these are collapsed together to get the

drunk to stay sober *end* The two states are taken in a process of integration for
the refraining to occur *end* Refraining someone with MPD is almost
impossible without integration but refraining a particular alter with
metaphors is not out of reach *end* The programmers have much more chance
to reframe while they program than the therapist because the programmers
set in defensive programs to prevent other’s from reframing *end*
Power Words Reversals And Puns

In NLP  senses are taken into consideration *end* First we see then we hear
and finally we have the senses of internal kinetics and our emotions *end* The
Programmer also takes into consideration what are called "power words" *end*
Those are words which have specific meaning for the person *end* The
programmers also love to use reversals and puns for instance in Disney’s
Ducktales the character says "I stole ‘em fair and square." Other typical
reversals are "Life is death and death is life" "Pain is love and love is
pain." Another example is one used on Cathy O’Brien where the words
"Service Entrance" were used to mean "Serve us *end* En-Trance." Naming an
alter "Allison Wonderland" --a pun on Alice in Wonderland--is another
example of a programming pun *end* The programmers love to use these types
of things *end*
The Mind's Natural Alarm Clock

The programmer’s have made use of the mind’s natural ability to wake
itself up like an ‘alarm clock' if it wants *end* Slaves may be given the coded
message that the draconian enforcer will come by to pick them up at  a.m *end*
The slave will automatically wake up in the middle of the night and in a
trance like a sleep walking a deep LGP alter will take the slave out to the
street to be picked up *end* Many slaves are being used at night without their
families suspecting anything *end* Sleeping patterns are also related to
personality *end* REM sleep is believed to help restore the effectiveness of
certain brain pathways in which norepinephrine is a transmitter substance *end*
By programming different alters to have certain sleep patterns their
personalities can be adjusted *end* Of course this is done in conjunction with
many other aspects of mind control *end*
The Right Brain And The Unconscious

The Programmers are also aware that right-handed people use their left
brain hemisphere for highly conscious processess which require good
attention focus and intentional decisions; while their right brain will tend
to work on the unconscious and automatic chores *end* Split brain programming
takes this contrast into account *end*

Part A *end*

The Use Of Spiritual Principles To Isolate The System From God

In the course of deprogramming Monarchs and rubbing shoulders with programmers it became
clear that the programmers of the Monarch program are fully aware of the spiritual principles
which are in operation for everyone *end* In  a leader of one of the groups which today carries
out trauma-based mind-control wrote that the occult masters are not interested in uplifting the
souls of men but that "These Masters *end* . *end* have in reality no interest in soul or astral development
except as a means of forming passive illuminized tools completely controlled in mind and
actions."

The Monarch victims of today are the tail end of centuries of efforts by the Kaballists
Freemasons and the Illuminati adepts to completely control other human beings *end*
The following quote comes from a communist manual on how to brainwash a nation *end* It could just
have well been written by Monarch Mind-Control Programmers *end*

"The first thing to be degraded in any nation is the state of Man himself *end* Nations
which have high ethical tone are difficult to conquer *end* Their loyalties are hard to
shake their allegiance to their leaders is fanatical and what they usually call their
spiritual integrity cannot be violated by duress *end* It is not efficient to attack a nation in
such a frame of mind *end* It is the basic purpose of mind-control to reduce that state of
mind to a point where it can be ordered and enslaved *end* Thus the first target is Man
himself *end* He must be degraded from a spiritual being to an animalistic reaction
pattern *end* He must think of himself as an animal capable only of animalistic reactions *end*
He must no longer think of himself or of his fellows as capable of ‘spiritual
endurance’ or nobility.. *end* "

As it seems in foreign nations that the church is the most ennobling influence each and every
branch and activity of each and every church must one way or another be discredited *end* Religion
must become unfashionable by demonstrating broadly through pyschopolitical indoctrination
that the soul is non-existent and that Man is an animal." Later this chapter will describe how a
person is dehumanized *end*
One spiritual principle is that if you can get a person angry at God you can get that person to
commit any sin *end* Great effort is taken via staged events to make the victim being programmed
certain that God has rejected them *end* For instance some victims had someone play God and walk
away from them when they needed help in a life & death situation *end* The  Hollywood movie
Altered States which is about a university professor in the s who experiments with mind-
altering drugs and sensory deprivation tanks shows some scenes where God turns into a goat *end*
Some of the religious scenes in this movie match some of the anti-God/religious programming of
some Monarch slaves *end*

The Monarch slaves are repeatedly warned that God is cruel and judgmental and that He wants to
destroy them for the wicked things they have done *end* Bible verses that tell of the wrath of God &
God’s anger are read to the victim *end*

An example of how the slave is programmed to hate God will now be given *end*

A hypnotic drug will be given the victim when they are about  years of age *end* This
will relax the person and allow the programmers to take the child into the deepest
trance so that the programming will be sure to enter into the very fiber of the child’s
being *end* After several hours of being in a deep trance as the drug begins to wear off
the child will be strapped very secure into a tight fitting coffin *end* A man with long
white hair and a long robe with sandals staff and a white robe will present himself
before the child and announce that he is "God the great I AM" *end* Then "God" will
look in a big book and announce he cannot find the person’s name so he will have to
send the person to hell for being bad *end* The coffin will then be lowered into a deep
pit---like a mine shaft and the victim will be told that when they can no longer hear
God’s voice that they will be a cat and not human *end* God can’t find them in the book
because they have no soul and are a cat *end* Deeper and deeper the child is lowered *end*
They are told this is the penalty for having tried to pray to God *end*
The programmers make sure that the slave is implicated in many gross sins such as the murder of
innocent children in order to insure that the person is sure that God hates them *end* Then the victim
is told that God is a consuming wrath who hates them *end* The injustice of God creating a world of
suffering is also taught to the slave *end* All this is to insure that the victim hates God *end* That hatred
toward God will express itself in the victim’s system’s willingness to do any sin without
conscience *end*
Part B
The Monarch Programming Is A Miniturization Of What Was Being Done To Entire
Peoples Or Cities

Demons are attracted by the "scent" of people *end* We are made in the image of God and we are
attractive prey to those who hate God Almighty *end* Cities are magnets for demons *end* When demons
target a person or people a common tactic is to make trouble for the person *end* When a person’s
problems reach a crescendo they will be in a state of mind to grab any solution that is passing by *end*
People then make pacts with demonic forces *end* They sell their souls hoping for relief from their
problems *end*

All this is clear as a bell to the spiritually enlightened but the demonic forces are able to dull the
senses of their victims to the point they no longer have the slightest realization that they have sold
their souls *end* People make a choice to accept the falsehood offered by the demons for their relief

rather than stick with the truth which seems to hurt *end* The demonic lies may be that colds and flues
are caused by evil spirits--when in reality they are caused by viruses and bacteria *end* Or the opposite
type of lie may be given--that demonic forces have no influence over disease that only viruses
and bacteria exist *end*
In Africa modern medicine is often viewed as White Man’s magic because they fight disease
with incantations which the demons have taught them to use to cure their problems *end* Authority to
demons is transferred to them by festivals ceremonies and pilgrimages *end*

Strong demonic manifestations usually occur around festivals ceremonies rituals and
pilgrimages which are being done everyday around the world *end* These ceremonies and rituals are
welcome mats for demonic forces giving them the right to rule *end* Every area of the world has them *end*
And often demonic signs and wonders occur at these rituals and ceremonies *end* The power of a lie
has to be preserved and fueled by tradition which is manifested via rituals *end* Without tradition the
power of the lie would die out *end* If the tradition is being rejected by a people the demons often
augment it with "new" deceptions *end* The first lie doesn’t stand a chance *end*

The pre-existing bondage then is strengthened by new deceptions that seem more appropriate *end* If
you were asked now "HOW DOES SATAN ENSLAVE PEOPLE?" you should know the answer
because it was just given it to you *end* The answer is Satan’s control is trauma-based *end* A trauma is
applied to the lives of people *end* They reach out for some type of answer to the trauma and the
demons offer some type of answer--so many Hail Marys or so many sacrificed cats or pray to
some idol which is a disguised demon *end* The lies are turned into myths which the people believe *end*
The myths are a blurring of reality which the people on one level may know are false but their
minds can’t break loose of the power of the lie *end* The power of the myths are fueled by tradition
and demonic manifestations and demonic attacks *end*

Anyone who steps outside of the demonic lie is attacked *end* The people feel they are being
personally attacked when their traditions are ignored *end* Because a people has willingly sacrificed
the truth for the falsehood in their need for relief from their trauma they have chosen to be
deceived *end* This choice to be deceived has a great deal of spiritual power to it *end* They are no longer
truth-lovers *end* It is not enough to come to these people with the truth *end* They have rejected the truth *end*
They must at some point will to seek the truth again *end* These people can have all the proof shown
to them about the truth and they will continue to reject it *end* Their demonic bondage needs to be
broken somehow *end*
This bondage can be broken in a number of ways *end* Pointing out the inadequacies of the lies is
sometimes sufficient to break the demonic spell over people *end* But after the lies are broken they
need to be followed by the truth--and the love of truth *end* The Monarch Mind Control programming
is simply the sophisticated application of what has been done to humanity on a large scale being
scaled down and applied to a single human body *end*

Trauma and lies are used in the same way *end* The different alters sell their souls to the lies in return
for their safety *end* A basic ingredient to the programming of a group of people or a group of alters
is the same--trauma and fear *end* The Land of Oz was ruled by a shadow-leader the Wizard of Oz *end*

Most countries are ruled by unseen people and unseen powers *end* The Wizard of Oz story is so
representative of how life is for Satan’s world *end* No wonder it is the programming base for so
many Monarch mind-controlled slaves *end* The solution to Satan’s control was that the disciples of
Christ would be so united in love that the world would see the solution *end* "That they all may be
one. *end* .that the world may believe."

For the Monarch slaves the therapists have wanted integration *end* For the world Christ wanted
integration *end* But there are formidable spiritual strongholds which divide us *end* These spiritual
strongholds are far stronger than most Christians can imagine *end*

The heartbeat of the Body of Christ is to bring all humanity to their Creator God *end* This can be
done by breaking down all the lies and programming that separate the parts of the Body of Christ
so that those of Christ are so well integrated in love and spirit that the world believes on the
power of Christ *end* Each of the programming acts has a spiritual mental and physical side to it *end*

The slave has his or her will stripped from them so it becomes unnecessary to think in terms of
their guilt--they are slaves who no longer have the freedom of choice *end* If they kill or steal or tell
an untruth lie they have not done it intentionally *end* Still the Programmers know that there are
spirits involved to spiritually prepare the slave to do these acts *end* For instance they implant Spirits
of Greed and lust into the victim *end*

An Illuminati value system is drilled into the victim *end* Any person who is not taught to dedicate
personal rights and possessions to God will end up with all types of surface forces such as
insecurity worry anger envy jealousy and tension *end* This goes for multiples or non-multiples *end*
These surface forces will in turn cause all types of surface weaknesses such as lying stealing
cheating and arguing *end* If these surface weaknesses are displayed by anyone they are evidence
that a deeper spiritual problem exists *end* However the slave is not being set up to display these
vulnerabilities as they will but ONLY as they are programmed *end* An Illuminati Beta model can
have sex only with who her master allows her to have sex with *end* Nor is she granted the privilege
of refusing to sexually service someone *end*
If the slave is allowed free will they often will reject the life style programmed into them *end* The
reason they can reject the Spirits of Seduction & Lust that have been layered in to insure that
these moral weaknesses exist is because the will of the alter being programmed was being
coerced *end* There was duress involved *end* Satan has some claim but not the stronghold that comes
from those whose active will is involved in a sin *end* That doesn’t mean that some slaves don’t
develop a taste for their perversion *end* The point is that the ability to have these personality

weaknesses should the programmers want them can be spiritually set into the slave by teaching
the slave to resist the grace and love of God *end* It may be shocking to realize that the slaves are
specifically programmed to resist God’s grace and love and to hate Him *end* This is not left to
chance and is accomplished by a number of events in the slave’s life *end*

Another spiritual area that is tampered with is the self-image of the person *end* They are not allowed
to think of themselves as made in the image of God unless they are front alters created or
allowed to be Christian *end* Instead of allowing the victim to learn about Jesus the victim is
consistently belittled and compared to others *end* This is in violation of a spiritual principle found in
 Corinthians  "For we dare not make ourselves of the number or compare ourselves with
some that commend themselves; but they measuring themselves by themselves and comparing
themselves among themselves are not wise."

John  and  Cor *end*  teach how it is to be done correctly *end* Fritz co-author knows of one
programmer who is still programming who is fully aware of these scriptures and how they apply
spiritually *end* When people are not allowed to accept themselves they end up resisting the will of
God *end* The wrong attitudes are built into the slave so that they will always resist the will of God *end*

Again if the programmers want a Christian front they may program the correct thinking into the
front alter *end* To do this doesn’t threaten their hold on the system in the least *end* To have Satanic alters
and Christian alters which are diametrically opposed to each other’s thinking only insures that if
they would discover each other in the mind that they would reject wanting to learn about the
other part and would go into denial of the part’s existence *end* The programming and mind-control is
being linked to a belief system *end*

Taking this one step further we can also say that the programming is also a conflict between two
faiths the faith that the alters place when they visualize and create their occult-system that is
their faith in demonism and magic versus the faith of those who follow the God of the Bible *end* The
method of creating hard-core Satanic alters from traumatized Christian alters is an obvious
example of this *end* Some secular therapists have been slow to admit this conflict *end*

If we look at the Illuminati’s brand of Druidism we will notice that the Book of Pheryllt which is
a Druidic book for rituals gives four symbols which can be made to evoke the four elemental
forces also called the four basic portals *end* Visualization is said to be the key to the occult and to
opening portals with these four signs *end* As the deeper parts of a slave are drawn into such activity
they are in reality placing their faith in that belief system *end* How can you take something away
without giving something in return *end* An alternative faith in a God and belief system that is not
connected to mind-control is an important therapeutic aid *end*
You can not hate something passionately if you are unaware of it *end* When two groups are very
similar in order to high light their individual identity they will have a high level of animosity

toward each other *end* In order to create strong Satanic alters who hate God the Illuminati actually
encourage the young two year old victim to understand and accept the love of God *end* Upon this
faith in a loving God will be built the rejection and trauma to create wounded alters who hate
God because they feel rejected *end*

Rejection is a tool of Satan across the board in the world *end* Rejection creates a sine wave of hills
and valleys *end* The way of the Lord is made straight leveling these hills and valleys *end* When a
person or nation is rejected they will often shift to one of two extremes either they try to
perform to meet up to expectations or they will retaliate against rejection *end* Both are extremes the
hills and valleys of the shadow of death of the what resembles a sine way *end*
Both rejection and retaliation are tools of bondage *end* The enemy will work a person to get them to
feel either rejected or angry *end* If either side of the sine wave is latched onto by a person or nation
they will set in motion a dynamic where they will end up with the other side of the curve *end* This is
because the human mind has an inbred desire to balance things out *end* If we feel rejection then we
may retaliate or try extra hard to perform *end* This sets up a BONDAGE LOOP *end*

The Cabalistic Tree of Life is the knowledge of good and evil--performance *end* The programmer by
repeatedly REJECTING the slave build into the slave a high level of performance *end* The slave is
not allowed to get angry at the programmer--which is the opposite peak of the sine wave *end* The
human mind will naturally try to balance the performance peak with increasing the anger/
retaliation peak to match it in opposite intensity *end*

Because the slave can not get angry at their programmer they turn this anger inward and upward
toward themselves and God *end* The performance of the slave for the master is a form of false love *end*
Performance love is false love *end* "If you do this for me then I’ll love you."

Christ loved us when we were yet sinners and unlovable *end* This is the type of godly true love
described by Paul in  COR  which seeks not its own *end* Self-preservation is a tool of death *end* That
is one reason Christ did not preserve himself--even though he could have called angels--he
wanted to show the world true love *end*

Fear gets its root in death *end* The threat of death of a spouse of oneself of one’s dreams of one’s
identity or of one’s fleshly body creates fear *end* Death comes from Satan *end* Life from Yahweh God *end*
Fear is built on a threat of some kind of death *end* Self-preservation then is actually based upon fear
which is in turn based on death *end*

This is why Christ said one must lose their life to gain it *end* To escape the satanic bondage loop of
self-preservation built on fear we must reach out for the love of God *end* Self-justification is not
normally seen by people as a bondage loop but it often is *end* Only the sureness that Almighty God
loves us gives us the strength not to get caught in the self-preservation tactic of self-justification *end*

There is a place for defending the truth but it must be done in love *end* Christ and his disciples
taught that we are justified by faith in God--not by self-justification *end* Self-justification can easily
be related to the self-preservation bondage loop *end* We simply have to have an inner knowing that
we are made in the image of God and that He is working in each of our lives *end* Since we are His
work He will justify us *end* All of the Monarch slaves are a work of God *end* The cult has simply
refashioned what God created *end* The slave needs to recapture the loving view God has of what He
created *end* God doesn’t make mistakes *end* He has placed lots of beauty and value in each person *end* Each
person is His handiwork isn’t the human body fearfully and wonderfully made *end*

After someone has been made to participate in crimes against humanity the Programmers
intuitively have created a situation where the person may fall into self-justification for example
"They deserved to die." This is a subtle but dangerous tool of bondage *end* Much of the trauma-
based mind-control is based on simple fundamental spiritual life-spiritual death issues *end* The Spirit
of the Lord does not give fear *end* It comes from the enemy *end*

Abductees who claim to have met aliens claim that the aliens feed off of human fear *end* Fear brings
spiritual death *end* To show this dynamic in another way let’s describe a common thought for alters
of Monarch slaves *end* This thought is "If I stay with the programming I’m safe." This is the same
thought that society in general is taught via fear of self-preservation *end* "If I stay with the crowd if I
stay with the system then I will be safe." This is why peer pressure which seems safe can lead

All this fear of self-preservation by remaining in the programming whether individual or
societal will be transferred to loyalty of the AntiChrist--that is the plan *end* The Truth shall set you
free *end* Anytime we reject the truth for safety and peace because of our fear for self-preservation

enticing attractive front the lies are used as the enslaving bondage *end* This is why there is almost no
end to all the lies used to program Monarch-type trauma-based total Mind-controlled slaves *end*

An important mind-control programming dynamic is the creation of images *end* This will take some
explaining *end* One spiritual dimension of humans is that we like to behold our God *end* This was built

other image *end* In other words worship is image oriented *end* This is the power of images *end* One of the
most ignored commandments of God of which Fritz wrote a book about in  was the
commandment God gave

"thou shalt not...make any likeness of any thing that is heaven above or that is in the
earth beneath or that is in the water under the earth." EX

Students of God’s Word are warned to "examine everything carefully; hold fast to that which is
good."  THES   *end*

What is significant is that God’s commandments in Ex *end*  which were a distillation of His laws
could have simply stated "Thou shallt not make any graven image" but instead went on to make
a big issue in that same passage about any image of God’s creatures the word translated "things"

formed out of any material with a tool ax chisel or engraving tool and the "likeness of male or
female" and "similitude of any figure" are forbidden *end*

Next it again forbids the likenesses of living creatures *end* The word "image" occurs about  times
in the Bible and is usually accompanied by judgements such as "I will cut down *end* ..destroy...break
down...smote." In a number of verses EC  PS   the scriptures speak about how
man is always seeking inventions that provoke God to anger *end*

image *end*

image *end* Again we must remember THE TRUTH SHALL SET US FREE *end* What is our real

purpose for us *end* These real questions which are so hard for so many of us are the reality that we

The word "duplicity" is based on the word duplicate *end* Machiavelli taught the elite how to rule
through duplicity--that is to rule via imitation images *end* This is nothing more than one of the

The Amish show that society’s penchant for technological progression does not improve life *end*
The Amish have a very successful life-style free from divorce and crime *end*

Missionaries to Africa have come back at times wondering if the primitive tribe they spent time
with didn’t have many things which our technologically advanced society had lost *end* This doesn’t

Technology must be understood in the entire context of life *end*

Part C
The Dehumanization Process

The dehumanizing of a multiple--that is of a fragmented personality--is done to most of the alters
but the front alters are allowed to be human *end* Because alters take on the characteristics of what
they were created from the front alters have to be some of the first splits so that they have a sense
of family and that they are human *end* That does not mean that the first series of splits can’t be
dehumanized later--they are they are turned into gems crystals *end*

How do you make an alter into an animal alter *end* It may not be quite as difficult as some may
imagine because they can create alters with "clean slates"--that is they are the plain tablets that
Dr *end* White Dr *end* D *end* Ewin Cameron prided himself that he was able to make out of adult minds *end*
When a part of the mind has no reality to reference and is tortured and told lies then it will
accept what the programmer says is real *end* When an alter is created via torture if you want a cat
alter they will have the child tortured in a cage surrounded by cats of some type *end* The new alters
will be told they are cats *end*

Their programmers will actually kill a little child in the worst way in front of these alters and tell
them that that is what happens to little girls and boys *end* Do they want to be a little girl *end* No *end* After
watching the horrible things that happen to little girls they do not want to be little girls or little
boys as the case may be *end* They want to be a cat because as a cat they will not be killed and
tortured like the children *end* The alters are forced to eat like cats with cats *end* They are repeatedly
shamed and degraded and repeatedly told they are cats *end* Lie detector Instruments are hooked up to

the child to determine if the alters actually believe they are cats *end* When the alter can actually state
"I’m a kitten." or "I’m a tiger." and pass the lie detector test then the programmers know they
have succeeded *end*
But what if the mind resists being told it is a cat *end* As long as the child is a girl it is given faeces to
eat *end* But the cats are fed wholesome meals in front of the victim *end* The little girls in the other cages
are dirty and tortured and ill fed *end* Do you want to be a little girl *end* A great deal of simple torture is
applied to make sure that the correct answers are given *end* If your life depended upon saying you
were a cat you’d be a cat too *end* Further children have a vivid imagination *end* Normal children can
easily role play and they can easily imagine they are something they aren’t because their
personalities and egos have not solidified *end*
Again nothing is left to chance *end* A fake blood transfusion of cat blood may be given the child *end*
Very often high speed films of kittens playing and having fun are shown in one eye while the
other eye is forced to few little girls having to undergo the worst of tortures *end* This viewing is
forced upon the child as its eyes are held open and the child is strapped into a viewing chair *end*

The dehumanization process will make alters into various types of birds cats dogs aliens
horses earth elements gemstones rocks and countless other items *end* They will then place in back
up programming to insure that the alters continue to believe they are not human *end* The ingenuity of
the back up programming to ensure that they continue to believe the lies are extensive and
ingenious *end* A great deal of hypnosis and drug induced states and drug-hypnosis is used to carry
out the dehumanization process *end* The programming will be reinforced by a cat alter’s
environment because the alter’s handlers will always refer to them as kittens or other types of
cats *end*
The painful rape of a child with its legs held in a butterfly configuration is used to get butterfly
alters *end* To get a puppet the body is given a drug which paralyzes the child *end* Then electro-shock is
applied to certain muscles upon the command of the programmer *end* The effect is that the child has
no control over his body and the programmer can make the child’s body parts jerk and move by
electro-shocking the muscles *end* The child actually becomes the puppet of the programmer *end* This is a
very powerful program *end*

One of the names connected with Monarch programming is Marionette Programming *end* The child
literally becomes a Marionette *end* This concept appears to have been cooked up by the Germans
under Hitler *end* An alter System as a child is physically shown that they are a marionette puppet *end*
Their muscles are electro-shocked in such a way as to take advantage of the natural reflexes *end*
When electro-shocked that way the victim’s body parts jerk out of our control at the whim of the
programmer to prove to the victim that they are a puppet *end* At this time the rules are given and rule
number  is that the alters are their puppet *end* Illuminati programmer Dr *end* Mengele used puppets in a
dollhouse as he programmed *end* He did skits with his puppets *end* "Dance Marionette dance" he’d say

in his thick german accent *end* Pinocho’s story was used to name the spirit guide Jimney Cricket *end*

etc *end*

alters which were used as alters who would guard things by scaring other alters with their fearful

Hearts Of Stone

The programmers leave no stone unturned when they strip the alters of a system of any vestige of
humanity they might have *end* The programmers make the alters believe that the programmers have
surgically removed their hearts & replaced them with a stone *end* To reinforce this programming the
victim is hypnotized to fall into a deep trance if at any time the victim’s deeper alters are hooked
up to anything monitoring the heart *end* If and when someone tried to prove that these alters have a
heart by taking their pulse they may be surprised when these alters trance deep enough that the
machine doesn’t even read *end* This is how the programming keeps the lies safe from exposure *end*

The Programmers will hypnotically take the hearts for a number of reasons *end* One is blackmail *end*
They will promise to return the hearts if the victim obeys returns home to the cult when needed
and is present when the Anti-Christ needs the victim *end* It is doubtful these alters would get their
hearts back by their cult considering all the false promises that are typically made *end*

The Programmers will give the hearts to a queen mother alter for safekeeping *end* They may be
hidden somewhere like in the Temple of Molech *end* The Temple of Molech in some survivors is
used as a depository for memories of child sacrifices *end* It is not a place any alter could or would
want to go in the internal world *end* In return the Programmers give the victim stones yes hearts of
stone *end* Stone-like protectors will stand guard in the background *end* Their voodoo doll appearance
reflects the voodoo images that are built into Monarch Internal Worlds *end* By removing the victim’s
hearts it removes any chance that dark alters would have a soft warm spot in their heart for
anyone *end* They will be told that they are incapable of having friends or of loving others *end*

This is quite effective in separating these alters from others *end* That isolation is a part of the mind
control *end* Because the alters believe they have no life source within themselves--that is no heart
they have to look to their master *end* If the master places his hand upon the victim’s chest they may
feel alive *end* Because people need a heart to feel alters are programmed to believe that they are
incapable of feeling and have no feelings *end* They can not cry during their own suffering and are
encouraged to feel incapable of caring for the suffering of others *end*
In spite of all the brutality and isolation of the programming the alter’s humanity will lay in the
background but whether alters will ever acknowledge that humanity is a big question *end* If people
ask these heartless alters to give their hearts to Jesus they may be told that they don’t have one *end*

In all covenants something is given to the cult *end* In this case the victim’s hearts are hypnotically
given to the satanic Master *end* There is a Keeper of the Seals who keeps the items given when a vow

Part D
Fear

The thing that stands out so vividly for those who have met victim’s who
are in therapy is the Spirits of Fear that control them *end* Waves of paranoia
roll back and forth through the alters *end* Everyone needs to bear in mind that
the programmers were sadists and they didn’t get satisfaction from their
programming until they could see raw terror in their victims *end*

The primary vehicle for programming was the raw terror that is repeatedly
instilled into the victim *end* To achieve total terror the sadist programmer
gains total control over every aspect of a person their thoughts their
bowel movements their life even the power to commit suicide is stripped
from the victim *end*

Nothing that originally belonged to the victim is left untouched *end* A realistic
fear of most victims is that they will never be believed *end* Indeed many
therapists are serving the final insult to these severely traumatized people
by denying the authenticity of things the victim experienced himself and
even wishes were not true *end* For a victim to overcome their fear to tell after
all the years of programming not to tell and threats not to tell is an
enormous feat *end* Very few victims ever get to this point *end* And yet when
they do overcome this enormous barrier they must face disbelief *end*

Traditionally the psychiatrists have treated these victims as if their abuse
is nothing but psychotic nonsense *end* How many fleeing victims have been
locked up and told they were Paranoid Schizophrenics *end*

The fear of losing one’s identity within a coven or religious group says the
Church of Scientology is balanced out by the structured framework that
these groups have *end* Members identify with each other because they
participate in the same rituals and have given their allegiance to the same
idealized master *end*


Part E

The Use Of Guilt Shame Ridicule And Anger

The Chinese and police agencies have been especially good at developing
methods to solicit confessions *end* This is done by a variety of punishment and
reward strategies and the Mutt & Jeff routine *end* Confession and self-
criticism have been used by religious groups esp *end* the Jesuits as a method
to convert persons to and then perpetuate a belief *end*

One of the things that the deeper alters will not be taught about is
forgiveness *end* Because forgiveness of oneself and others is such an
important spiritual dynamic to not know about forgiveness cripples many
deeper alters from healing from the deep spiritual wounds they have
received *end* Forgiveness is an act of the will *end* Forgiveness of oneself is
usually a major issue with deeper alters who generally don’t know how to
do this *end* However the handlers and abusers will be sure to heap lots of
guilt--whether deserved or not onto the poor mind-controlled victim *end* It is
natural for a person to focus on himself--after all if a person doesn’t think
for himself who will *end*

Often a person accepts their strengths but focuses on their weaknesses
hoping that that weakness will somehow be reduced by the focus that is
placed upon it *end* The programmers know how to take advantage of that *end*
They set impossible standards of perfection and then demean the victim
because they have failed to live up to the impossible standard of
perfection *end*

Black and white thinking develops in the slave’s mind *end* The programmers
will not allow the victim to display natural feelings of anger sadness or
doubt *end* To do so means that one is a failure and weak *end* Of course they are
natural feelings so the slave has to do a great deal of repression and self-
incrimination for having these natural feelings *end* The slave learns to turn his
or her anger inward *end* Many of the male slaves end up committing suicide *end*
They beat themselves up with subconscious & conscious guilt *end* Anything
and everything wrong or bad in the slave’s life is blamed upon him *end*

Of course not all things are meant to be remembered by the slave *end* Guilt
can play a natural role in the forgetting of memories too *end* If the Monarch

slave would remember something terrible the religious front alters can be
made to feel repentant for such terrible thoughts *end* Then the natural desire to
forget can be reinforced by suggesting that the evil memory be removed
from the mind *end* In other words memories are forgotten because they don’t
conform to a person’s moral code *end*
If good morals are programmed into the front alters they will take the
hypnotic suggestion not to remember what has really happened that they
had to participate in *end* The front alters will only remember a sanitized
version *end* The person may even want to think of the memory as "only a
dream" because the guilt associated with believing the reality of it *end* If a
person is hypnotized to have guilt about something that they didn’t
commit then they can be gotten to believe that they did it *end*

For instance a false implanted memory of the Monarch slave killing a
child may be implanted with the command if you do not obey we will kill
more children and you then will be guilty for not just this child but others *end*
People will tend to justify their abuse by saying "I was bad I was evil."
The programmers take advantage of this natural tendency *end* Nothing the
slave does is good enough or worthy of praise *end* After they sexually please a
customer they are called "bitch" and "whore" to make the slave feel guilty
when all they have done is follow orders *end*

The whole situation causes the slave to work harder for approval which of
course is very tentative and fleeting at best *end* The Master just keeps control
and sets the standards higher if the slave gets close to reaching perfection *end*

The Master must insure that the slave feels guilty and dirty *end* Many of the
slaves endure a guilt that is common among soldiers and concentration
camp survivors--the guilt of having survived when others died *end* "Why did I
live and they die *end* I was no better than them?" Any desire on the part of
deeper alters to want something for themselves is painted as "selfishness" *end*
They will be internally and externally punished for any pleasure *end* If a
sexual alter enjoys a sexual encounter she is programmed to internally feel
some type of severe punishment program *end*

One standard punishment for a female slave who appears to have actually

enjoyed a sexual act is to cut them from vagina to rectum and sew them
back up without anesthesia WHILE the slave is forced to watch her
punishment in silence without tears or screams *end*

One form of tormenting a slave is to ridicule the slave as they have to carry
out a wretched assignment *end* Many slaves lose their zest for humor because
they end up the brunt of so many bad jokes *end* Comedians because they are
skilled with puns and other words games have often served as handlers or
programmers *end*

Bob Hope is the best example of a Monarch slave handler who uses his
verbal skills as both a handler and comedian *end* Bob Hope has a side to him
that the public doesn’t see *end* Over the years Bob Hope has spent millions of
dollars on his team of gag writers to keep him well supplied with gags *end*
Anger

The use of anger is not haphazard *end* The spiritual ramifications of anger are
very well known to the programmers *end* They know that anger opens up
spiritual portals for demonic activity *end* Remember chapter  on structuring
explained how the programmer purposefully push the victim almost to its
breaking point to get angry alters *end*

The use of anger is seen in a number of different areas of programming *end*
The Gatekeeper alters will be depressed and angry alters to insure that they
remain good portals for demons *end* Gatekeeper alters function as Gatekeepers
in several different capacities *end* Gatekeeper alters will be found to the whole
system often on the second level section down *end* Gatekeeper alters will
also be found guarding important sections like the Carousel and Castle *end*

In review Anger toward God anger toward the outside world and anger
toward themselves are all built into a System *end* Where was God *end* Where was
the outside world when all these things were happening *end* Many if not all
of the victims of Monarch turn their anger on themselves which is the
only safe place to vent it *end* Most of the deeper alters of a Monarch system
will have very low self-esteem and will have lots of guilt and anger toward
themselves *end*

The slave is victimized so much that when their handlers give them the
chance to victimize someone else some victims find release in assaulting
others *end* Of course the entire process of transference further entraps the
victim and provides more guilt and more debilitating spiritual dynamics *end*
The slave may be given the power of life or death over others as well as
the power of deciding another person’s eternal fate *end*

Sometimes this power is addictive *end* This addiction can be a trap that binds
the slave to his source of power *end* The power that the Illuminati give their
slaves is one of the major barriers preventing deeper alters from moving
toward freedom when their systems have a chance *end* Slaves also turn a great
deal of anger in on themselves *end* The self-image of most alters in a System
is extremely low *end* The anger that alters have becomes a tool of the handler
to insure that the slave never thinks highly enough of themselves to do
anything about the control over them *end*

An example of this is Monarch slave Loretta Lynn *end* Loretta Lynn’s handler
is her husband Doolittle *end* Although Loretta has worked slaved very long
hard hours she credits Doolittle for all her success *end* Her programming
allows her only to give him credit for her successes *end* In her
"autobiography" Loretta Lynn A Coal Miners Daughter which was written
by a professional writer who sat down and worked with her Loretta says
on page  "In a lot of ways it was good for me to marry someone older
than me her husband Doo was a WW II vet/satanist who married her
when she was  because I could learn from him *end* But in another way it
wasn’t so good because I went directly from Daddy to Doolittle without
ever being on my own *end* Even today men are telling me what to do *end* My
husband my lawyer my accountant my personal manager Ken Riley her
road manager has been her mind-control handler and Alex Houston &
Reggie Maclaughlin have done some of her recent programming *end* In a
sense I still don’t have complete control over myself *end* Maybe I never will *end*
But if it wasn’t for Doo her nickname for her husband & handler we
wouldn’t have what we have today."

Anger within a System can be dangerous when one alter directs its anger
toward another alter *end* Sometimes one alter will try to kill another alter *end*
Actually this happens more often than one might imagine *end* If the alter

succeeds of course the body will be dead with the resulting consequence
that everyone dies *end*

The programmers enjoy seeing this type of drama but they don’t want it to
be carried out to its final conclusion so they generally if not always have
alters who can step in and take the body and stop this *end* If the alter system
can’t then alters who understand what is going on can call their master for
help and the master can once again show how dependent they are upon
him for life *end* This is the "divide and conquer" strategy *end* The divide and
conquer strategy is used repeatedly in constructing an alter system *end*

The Programmers and the Handlers are setting themselves up as gods or
Almighty God or as a being from a superior race of aliens such as
Koldasians or Pleiadians *end* Interestingly if one listens these different alien
races make conflicting claims for whatever good the earth has *end* However

Time-life Publishers owned by men in the Illuminati subtly gave this
away in their book The UFO Phenomenon  when they referred to UFO
abductions as "the Oz factor." They go on to say that its like Dorothy in the
Wizard of Oz on page  *end* Then they go so far as to reemphasize the point
by showing a picture of Dorothy in Oz *end* In the TV series on aliens & UFOs
called the "X-Files" they begin a show with an "I love you-I love you not"
Monarch programming script *end*

Often the Programmers tell the alters which they have created that they

Portals And Focal Points

Within the occult world the entire study of demonology is wrapped

demons are placed into the internal worlds of slaves *end*

the body *end* Torture attaches and layers in demons within the body *end* Sex and
blood sacrifices are used to attach powerful demons *end*

manipulated if there are blood sacrifices *end* This may seem strange however

have had demons placed in via blood sacrifices are definitely controlled by
more powerful demonic forces *end* All of the chahkra points and the orifices
to the human body serve as portals *end* Both the Illuminati and Christian
deliverance ministries agree that the mouth ears nose anus etc *end* are
portals *end*

burning sensation *end* The Mother of Darkness who is assigned to a child who
is being programmed has to oil the child periodically to protect it from this
burning *end*

consumed by the group *end* The child is then baptized in blood *end* A cut called

Foundation *end* The Priest reads out of the Book of Satan and the Book of
Names *end* The victim repeats after the Priest *end* In this fashion the Priest ritually
gives the person a new name *end* The Dance of Hod Glory-the sphere on the
bottom left of the C *end* Tree of Sephiroth is then begun in a circular motion

conjured *end* At times this ritual is done with a child sacrifice rather than an

All Hallow’s Eve *end*

Part I
Layering In Demons

The American Journal of Psychotherapy two noted psychiatrists and an M *end* D *end* from India wrote an article "Multiple Personality in India Comparison
with Hysterical Possession State" *end* The tenor of the article was that in
India the psychiatrists have to deal with demonic possession rather than
MPD which is found in the west *end* They made comparisons of demonic
possession in India to the MPD of the west which are similar but not the
same *end* Later other articles and letters were written about this article *end*

One of the criticisms was that these Indian psychiatrists were trying to
compare their demonic possession to the west’s MPD when it was obvious
that their cases of demonic possession did not meet all the criteria of MPD *end*
In the experience of the co-authors of this book demonic possession is not
MPD DID but it does have many of the same characteristics *end* If we
understand programming from the Programmers point of view they
believe in both MPD and Demonic possession *end* From the programmers
point of view they try to create the alters and demonize the alters *end* Several
ex-Programmers have told Fritz that if a person really wants to understand
the Monarch trauma-based mind-control they need to realize that it is
fundamentally demonic-based *end*

Both of the co-authors have had to sit through lectures by secular
therapists who dismissed Satanism and the occult as simply as an excuse
on the part the abusers to traumatize their victims *end* According to these
secular therapists demon possession and satanic rituals have nothing to do
with therapeutic issues but are merely games and charades put on by the
abusers *end* We beg to differ with this point of view *end* Programming and mind-
control can not be separated from demonology and occult ritual *end* Even the
"alien programming" uses lots of occult symbols rituals & spiritual
programming *end*

An example of how ritual & programming overlap is the sabbat ceremony
to insure that cult slaves keep silent no matter what even under torture *end* On
a full moon sabbat a large oak tree will be used to hold this night
ceremony *end* A Majic cake also known as a Red or Acacia Cake is made for
the ceremony *end* The demon seer is invoked using the name Shaddai one of
its  mystic names *end* An unbaptized child who has been taken from

Christian parents is in the middle of the Pentagram and a live altar
consisting of a woman is used *end* A magic square called Satar formula is
carved onto the child with an Eagle or Rooster claw *end* The child is turned to
the  directions and then turned face down toward the east *end* The child must
curse and blaspheme God Almighty *end* Then its mouth is gagged with a
purple cloth *end* Flesh is cut from the child and mixed with black millet and
given to Satan also called Sheitan *end* Prayers in Enochian are said *end* Incense
is lit *end* The child is now sacrificed to Satan using the ritual athame perhaps
a black handled dagger while the child is condemned by the cult to hell *end*
This type of ritual is to instill fear of talking and praying into the cult
members *end*

One of the secret ceremonies to invoke demons comes from The Book of
Beasts *end* It is an ancient ceremony to summon demons *end* The ceremony
begins with reading the Tetragrammaton Elohim the Creature of
Judgement is invoked as well as the  mystic names of the dead *end* A child is
skinned and sacrificed *end* The Book of the Old Faith is read from *end* And then
the demons are dismissed and a bell rung in the  directions *end* Monarch

invoked *end* To live through a horrifying experience like this does impact the
slave and therapists need to quit ignoring the various impacts that effect
the victim of occult ceremonies *end*

to achieve the wonders of the "one thing" where "that which is above is

like that which is below and that which is below is like that which is
above."

Focus  state by themselves but it is rare *end* The brain works off of waves that are less than

can’t influence the brain *end* However if one ear hears  hz *end* and the other ear hears  hz *end*

border of sleep and waking that can possibly launch an astral trip *end*

trip *end* When a person astral projects it is said to change the BEG pattern to a special pattern

a *end* The human nervous system is able to change the gravitational constant in a
field surrounding a person *end* If the sender had a low field and the receiving party
had a higher than normal field thoughts can flow from the sender to the
receiving party *end*

with two people who simultaneously hypnotize each other have found that they
enter a shared world in which they do not have to verbally speak to
communicate *end*

telepathic scores in experiments *end* When telepathy occurs researchers have noted
that the parasympathetic nervous system is activated & this occurs along with
an increased amount of acetyicholine in the brain *end*

The Philosopher's Stone

One of the major goals of Alchemy was "The preparation of aurum potabile liquid gold a
sovereign remedy because gold being itself perfect could produce peffection in the human
frame." -quoted from The History of Chemistry as quoted by Manly P *end* Hall in his The Secret
Teachings of All Ages p *end* CLV *end*

Gold has long been called the metal of wisdom by the Illuminati *end* The Illuminati are well
aware of the alchemical quest to create the correct type of gold which will bring enlightment
to the world *end* The Rabbi’s who know the Cabala have considered the secret of white
powdered gold the greatest secret of all times *end* Somehow the Egyptian Pharaoh’s had learned
the secret of how to make white powdered gold which when seen up close is transparent--
like the gold described in the Bible as making up the streets in heaven *end* This gold is
monotonic with molecules in a high spin state and looks like baking flour *end* It greatly
enhances the pineal gland and a similar substance of iridium greatly enhances the pituitary
gland *end* Regular yellow gold or gold salts will cause the hair of the subject to fall out but
white gold is safe to ingest *end*

If a master has to constantly spend time whipping and motivating his slave as
well as forever watching that the slave doesn’t escape or do shoddy work or

to be a full time job *end* When the master gets too much involved in the control
process he ceases to be master and becomes a slave to the control process *end*
The intelligence agencies knew that they would have to create mind control
slaves who could police themselves *end* If the master has to constantly guard his
slave the slave will be more trouble than he is worth *end*

Many successful people have gained their success because they knew how to
delegate *end* The most successful supervisor is the one who can delegate the best *end*
The programmers had to find ways to cut their supervisory requirements to
the bone if they were to make owning a Monarch slave worthwhile *end* The
method chosen was to build "computers" into the slave’s mind that would
internally regulate everything *end* They do this by taking hundreds of the alters
and dehumanizing them and turning them into parts of a computer *end*

For instance the shutter on the All-seeing eye of the computer which is seen
in the mind like a camera shutter is a child alter who's job is to open and shut *end*
Another primal part is inside the eye’s pupil *end* This shutter part knows what
goes on in all the system subconsciously but if discovered by a therapist and
pulled to the front of the mind will not be able to vocalize about the system *end*
The software for this "computer" could be programmed into it and all the
individual programming of every alter can then be tied back to the computer *end*
In other words each alter would be programmed on how to view life to act
to think and to function in their job *end* This programming would be linked to a
computer *end*

The programmers invented the perfect method to decentralize their control
over their slaves and yet still supervise with the tightest of control *end* Each alter
is linked to a computer internal-not an external one built from a foundation
of fear and trauma *end* Since each section of alters was to remain secret each
section of alters for a slave is given its own computer and then linking
computers were built to link the various sections and then finally a major
backup computer is built and then finally the internal Beast computer *end* Bear in
mind that this is all built internally in the mind of the victim *end* We are not
talking about actual physical computers built out of physical microchips

wires condensers etc *end*
If the programmer concentrates on a single point when giving instructions he
will get better results *end* Rather than complicating things for the slave you gain
power over the slave and any subordinate if you can give simple clear
instructions *end* For this reason a large share of the alters in an alter system are
given very clear straight forward jobs *end* Because their jobs are so
straightforward these alters will often remain fragments rather than alter
parts with full blown personalities *end* The programmers don’t cloud the issue *end*
An undeveloped alter will be given one single clear basic job *end* By stringing
’s of alters together with single tasks a highly sensitive system of alters
can be created *end*
Each piece of the System is separated by some degree of dissociation to make
it a separate piece *end* By dividing the mind so much it is incapable of fighting
what has been done to itself *end* Before we begin describing the technical details
of an internal computer bear in mind that every Monarch System is unique
and yet they all follow certain patterns & methodologies *end* Most of the models
for the first few decades follow these patterns some of the newer ones have
more updated imagery *end*

C *end* Internal Hierarchies

The programmers build chains of command within the groups of alters that
they create *end* They credit themselves with bringing order out of chaos *end* When a
system of multiple personalities thinks of rebelling they are in the similar
situation as a colony wanting freedom from its mother country *end*

Can we govern ourselves and what governing structures can we keep--since
the structure itself is colonial *end* Can the mind work together to help itself *end* The
concerns are legitimate questions *end* And yes the multiple’s mind can function
outside of the control of the programmer’s hierarchial arrangement but not
without alters taking on different job assignments *end* In the slave’s hierarchal
chain of command adult alters are assigned to insure that child alters don’t
get out unless the abusers want a child alter out *end* Likewise commander alters
are needed to keep the switching smooth and to keep things orderly *end*
Subordinate alters are taught to submit to their king or governor or queen
alter *end* Immense power and indoctrination is given to the key cult alters ruling a
system *end*

The internal hierarchial arrangement means that the host alter coming into
therapy often a Christian may not be as completely open as therapists think *end*
They must play an internal game of going toward health while not pushing the
buttons of deeper more powerful alters *end* A lot of internal politics may go on *end* A
front alter may promise a deeper alter secrecy in order to consult with it *end* This
makes for all kinds of triangulation and manipulation within the alter system

itself *end* The entire hierarchy of alters has a lot invested in protecting the core
from trauma which was why the core was split in the beginning *end* Trad *end*
therapy goes after the core & the multiplicity that protects it thus insuring
resistence from the entire hierarchy incl *end* front alters who in MPD systems
seeking help are often close to the core *end* The core self is best not directly
pursued by the therapist but gently encouraged on its own to reconnect *end*

The Science Of External Controls
Monitoring Asset Control

Every intelligence service since time began has sought methods of owning people and ensuring
they stayed loyal *end* Two of  Illuminati families who are known to have developed extremely
well-run bloodline intelligence groups are the Li family and the Rothschild family *end* The Li’s
family started its Chinese intelligence back in  A.D *end* They had already been an ancient
chinese aristocratic family for many centuries prior to this *end* Some of their techniques for their
agents were state of the art mind control techniques *end* The Rothschild’s personal spy network and
their own mail service was known to be superior to the national european governments during
the  century *end* Traditional spycraft has involved the ability to recruit and keep agents loyal *end*
The professional spook manipulates his recruits for a living *end* He becomes adept at controlling
people *end*

For thousands of years spy operations have honed their skills at controlling people *end* Because
they work secretly they generally have done whatever they wanted *end* When you combine the
resources and centuries of intelligence operations of the Illuminati along with the credibility of
government intelligence agencies supposedly guarding our national security the combination is
horrific *end* There are no moral or financial restraints on what is being done *end* If the intelligence
groups want to dabble in keeping a severed head alive apart from the body or a frozen body
with an active head which they have done there is no one to stop them *end* Handlers of slaves use
both natural and contrived cues to convey to the slave that they want obedience *end*

A natural non-verbal threat cue would be brusque movements and an innuendo in their voice *end* A
contrived cue would be placing both hands behind the head which is a code for "I AM YOUR
MASTER OBEY ME." Another cue for slaves to obey is when the master makes a fist with his
right hand and touches his forehead *end* This means "OBEY." Even children who were multiples
who were being taught to control their mother who wanted to leave the cult have been observed
using the fist to the forehead to try to get obedience from their mother *end* Staring is one method
that the Programmers use *end* Charles Manson who was both a slave and a handler is an example
of how a penetrating hypnotic stare is used by the Programmers *end*

One way to control people is to wear clothes of authority *end* Dr *end* Green Dr *end* Black Dr *end* Star
Michael Aquino and other programmers have worn Nazi uniforms while programming and at
other time have worn Satanic Priestly garb *end*

A beginning point to control people is understanding human needs and understanding the
individual to be controlled *end* A good case officer learns everything he can about the asset person
or slave he is to control *end* Case officers/handlers have been constantly working at improving their
skills of control *end* Monarch slaves who must function as intelligence officers who recruit spies
are trained in the art of listening and conversation *end*

Learning to listen without interrupting is a guarantee of success *end* CIA handlers/ programmers
have an extremely personable side to them--and a very deadly animalistic side to them too *end* They
will be trained to look anyone they want to recruit in the eyes and withstand their stare *end*

"Friendship begins with a smile; recruitment with a stare." This is a quote from the
book Suvorov Viktor *end* Inside The Aquarium *end* New York Macmillan p *end*  *end*

During training men in U.S *end* Army Intelligence are told to read this book to understand how U *end* S *end* intelligence works *end* The entire lives of Monarch slaves are kept on records *end* Zbigniew
Brezinski and the heads of the CIA and Sec *end* of Defense Cheney are just some of the men
known about who have access to the computer records that contain records on every active
Monarch slave *end*

Not everyone has a price but everyone will respond to their needs being met *end* James K *end* Van
Fleet an important military intelligence officer wrote about how to manage people *end* In military
intelligence they keep files on people where they identify which subconscious desires of people
are important to the person at the time *end*

All this information is kept in SOFT FILES--which are not official files so these files have
never officially existed and are not given up even to Congressional subpoenas *end* The Intelligence
agencies know that if they find out what the person wants above all else in life they can control
the person *end* The nine areas that are monitored to see if they are important at the moment are

 *end* emotional security
