 *end* new experiences

Once they monitor these areas and then they determine which needs are priority needs for the
person then they will use what they call "the depth approach" to subconsciously gratify those

needs in a way that they gain control over the person *end* Modern companies are doing this too *end*
Dough mix isn’t sold but making a family memory with the children is *end* Soap isn’t sold to get
dishes clean--but rather soft beautiful hands are sold *end* Cosmetic companies don’t sell an item--
they sell you hope or an image *end* Fruit dealers don’t sell fruit they sell health and vitality *end* Car
dealers don’t sell cars they sell prestige and images *end* Freezers aren’t sold emotional security
from having a full freezer is sold *end* They have learned to genuinely appeal to the  subconscious
desires *end*

In intelligence these desires are called "weaknesses" because intelligence case officers and
handlers will attempt to manipulate those desires for their own gain by sincerely helping the
person *end* They set up short-range & long term goals and plans on how to manage a person *end*
For instance if a Monarch slave’s day to day alters want ego-gratification a creative outlet and
reassurance of worth the Illuminati may promise the slave that if the alters comply they will
give them a singing contract in Las Vegas *end* If they need to appeal to their emotional security--
they can promise a big salary and a nice house *end* If they need to appeal to immortality they can
promise to award them a star on Hollywood Boulevard or whatever religious immortality they
can credibly offer *end* The slave will get the short end of any deal *end* Anything the slave gets is
going to come at a price *end* The slave will have to do something in return for the Network *end*
Illuminati alters are promised power honor glory and wealth *end* Considering the power and wealth
of the elite they do have the resources to make good on this if they want *end* However the price of
obedience might be to shave one’s head in submission and sacrifice a child *end*

Another important point is that the abusers want to get the active cooperation of the person being
used *end* This can be accomplished by lies or facts if they are convenient which appeal to the
person’s views of right and wrong *end* For instance a pedophile will talk to the child who they are
going to rape to get its cooperation *end* The CIA handlers will listen to what a Slave needs and
solve it for them *end*

Bear in mind they will only do this if the slave doesn’t live with the handler and is pulling in the
wrong direction *end* For instance the CIA has lots of sleepers who are dangerous people just
waiting to be set off *end* In these cases the CIA has to work with front alters who aren’t aware of
the mind control *end* Rather than force an issue with control sometimes a gentle manipulation will
work *end* Then again some slave alters are under such strong mind control that they simply need an
order and don’t need gentle manipulation *end*
The isolation that the handlers impose on their slave to prevent real relationships with outsiders
and the strong bonding of the slave to its master trauma bonding etc *end* that is administered via

Planning A Typical Intelligence Operation Or The Standard
Textbook Techniques Of A Modern Intelligence Agency

The following points are of a scenario which was developed as follows by
the author Fritz observed how the CIA were carrying out an operation to
recapture a Monarch slave who was trying to escape *end* These activities
follow standard spook textbook methods and for instance fit the same
patterns of an intelligence operation codenamed Operation Sphinx
described in detail in the book By Way of Deception *end* By exposing how an
operation is put together perhaps it will become clearer how the CIA
monitor an asset they fear is escaping *end*
POINT  *end* An event that looked like an accident was planned *end* The event
was impossible to miss *end* This can include car accidents people waving one
down to tell you that you have a flat tire etc *end*
POINT  *end* They studied their prey to determine his/her routine *end* They will
watch a residence intently to determine the person’s routine and take
advantage of this *end*
POINT  *end* Then an insignificant accidental event is planned *end* Repeatedly in
the many Monarch people the authors have known the tiniest insignificant
points in people’s lives are being manipulated *end* Bear in mind the
intelligence people are carried away and overdo much of what they do
even over planning some of their ops *end*
POINT  *end* The chief is given the order to "hit at convenience." They are
watching and probing to discover a weak point and when they find a weak
point they will strike at convenience *end*
POINT  *end* Listening devices are installed *end* The Illuminati’s intelligence
agencies are illegally monitoring the Jives of Americans with bugs that go
up to  Ghz *end* Companies like Tektronics which work with the CIA are
selling counters which won’t detect bugs at  Ghz *end* In other words what is
mainly sold the public is inadequate but BK Precision does sell a counter
which goes past  Ghz *end* for those who want to know when they are being
illegally spied upon *end* Since MI- & the CIA cooperate the CIA can simply

say that their American intelligence information is from MI- *end* It may be
illegal for the CIA to spy in the U.S.-ha *end* no one stops them but British MI-
 can legally spy on American citizens *end* The intell *end* groups themselves use
BABBLERS which are electronic devices that emit noise & chatter &
destroy the effectiveness of bugs *end*
POINT  *end* Teams of experts are brought in to brainstorm about the
operation *end* The people called in on a case will be coordinated by a team or
teams *end* One of these teams will consist of various experts whose combined
brains will give great ability to plan *end*
POINT  *end* The person will be watched by moving in an observer into a
nearby building *end*
POINT  *end* An intelligence woman or man will be sent door to door selling
perfume or something else--perhaps they will pose as Jehovah’s Witnesses *end*
POINT  *end* The door to door undercover intelligence person will be very
personable very nice to talk to *end*
POINT  *end* The team will take all the surveillance information and spend
hours going over every detail and they will debate and get tense as they
hash out the significance of certain intelligence pieces of information as
they work out a plan of action *end*
POINT  *end* The Intelligence people will take advantage of the social needs
of someone close to their prey *end* They might give his wife some
opportunities for fun things away from the house *end* They know how to take
advantage very quickly & smoothly of the social needs of people who are
around a Monarch slave *end* They put used car salesmen to shame *end*
POINT  *end* The intelligence people have the capability to enter without
keys *end*
POINT  *end* They practice "motionless following." That means they
followed people in shifts *end* They will follow by tag teams so to speak and
use car phones *end*
POINT  *end* They like to use "trade" occupations as a cover *end*
POINT  *end* The man will give a business card which had an actual office
etc *end* but which was a front *end* They will be willing to give a business card--
which is a real address but only a CIA front *end* The day they realize they are
exposed the phone will quit working *end* Handlers and men within the
Network often use business cards and other cards they carry in their
wallets as codes indicating various things *end* In intelligence operations the
agents will take their "intelligence--that is the info they have collected and
put it through  steps *end*  "direction" who is going to collect what where *end*
 "collection" the actual spying *end*  "processing" analyzing and
integrating what they have collected and  "dissemination" distributing
via reports talks charts the analyzed and rewritten reports to their
customers *end* Most of the intelligence groups have a reputation for distorting
the truth in the third stage to fit their agency’s "party line" *end* Count St.-
Germain ?- is a good example of an intelligence officer *end* He was
one of the leading Illuminati of his time *end* He did alchemy for Louis XV
and magic for the Masonic leader Karl prince of Hesse *end* He spied for the
Dutch and the French and who knows who else *end* His fundamental
allegiance was to the Mystery Religions of the Illuminati *end*
Modern day examples are Lord Victor Rothschild one of the leaders of
MI- Sir Dick Goldsmith White Jewish Mason & leader of MI- from
/- Sir John Rennie leader of MI- from - whose son Charles
Tatham Ogilvy Rennie was a known major drug runner Major General

Introductory Remarks

For any recipe you need a cook *end* So who has been cooking up the RECIPE
for making Monarch Slaves *end* The authors felt that after reading the recipe
that some readers would be interested in learning about the master chefs
who make human robots using trauma-based mind-control *end* According to
an ex-Programmer the Programmers for decades have been treated like
royalty whenever they step foot onto a military base or enter a hospital
that carries out mind control *end* They are always expected *end* Generally the
commanding general on a base would meet them and escort the
programmer in a limo *end* If the base commander couldn’t make it an
important physician might take his place *end* The programmers have keys and
codes to get into special areas *end* After many thousands of Americans died in
WW II fighting Nazism our government’s intelligence agencies incl *end* the
military intelligence groups in cooperation with the Illuminati and its
people in the Vatican smuggled  of the worst Nazi-fascist war
criminals into this country *end* This is on public record now *end* Part of this was
under Operation Paperclip *end*

The DoD Dept *end* of Defense also worked at smuggling Nazi mind control
programmers under Project  *end* Every W.W *end* II veteran who fought ought

to be angry that after putting his life on the line for "democracy" and
freedom and supposedly defeating the Nazis our government brought in
men like the S.S.’s infamous butcher Dr *end* Joseph Mengele to program
American children with trauma-based mind-control like he had in the
concentration camps *end* In fact Fritz has worked with an Illuminati victim of
Joseph Mengele who was programmed in Germany in a concentration
camp and then smuggled to the U.S *end* via Canada by Jesuits working with
the Illuminati *end* Once in the U.S *end* this person continued to be programmed
by Mengele who went by many names including Dr *end* Green *end* He is
described in detail in part d *end* of this Appendix *end* We must begin to get
beyond the fronts and covers that the programmers have for the world *end*

Jewish professor Ernst Bergmann of the infamous Leipzig University is
also surprisingly a strong advocate of Nazism *end* His main book is A
National Socialist Philosophy of Culture *end* He writes "A new type of
mankind is being developed." He is mentioned here so that people stop
looking at labels and start looking at what is really going on *end*

One of the principle goals of Nazism was to remake mankind *end* The
Ahnerbe of the Nazis was set up to do genetic research and experiments *end*
And one element of that was to be able to create the prefect obedient mind-
controlled slave *end* A first glance at the lies told us by our press will give one
the impression Nazism was anti-communist nationalistic & Christian *end*
However a close look at Hitler and today’s Nazi leadership will reveal
that Nazism is Socialism or Marxism exactly what communism is about
and that Nazism is not nationalistic but international in its view *end* Further it
is Satanic and based on the Nordic mystery beliefs Odin Thor etc. *end* It is
not based on Christianity *end*
The Vril Society was the mother of the Nazi party *end* "Vril" means the Light
Force *end* What Light force *end* Lucifer the light bearer’s light force *end* The true
nature of Nazism is being concealed *end* When Hitler came to plan he was
placed into power in accordance with the Illuminati plan which was
spelled out in writing *end* This plan said "Nowadays if any state raise a
protest against us it is only pro forma provided in advance at our
discretion and by our direction for their anti-semitism is indispensable to
us for the management of our lesser brethren."

Understanding The Programmers

Many men have contributed to the research of trauma-based mind control *end*
The men who learned how to torture during the ancient Babylonian days
during the Roman days and during the Medieval days passed their secrets
to the rulers of the secret Mystery Religions *end* Some of the  Illuminati
bloodlines trace their history back to the ancient times of Babylon *end*

Because the programmers are driven by the spirit-world they are very
jealous and competitive towards each other *end* It is a dog-eat-dog world
amongst them *end* The demonic forces within in them are in competition too *end*
Yes the programmers have had their friction their jealousies & power
struggles with each other *end* Some of these inner battles have been fought
with and over their mind-controlled slaves *end*

When two programmers work on a single slave they might both put in
their own secret back doors to insure that the slave remains loyal to
himself rather than other programmer *end* There has also been ongoing tension
between the half-blooded & full blooded Illuminati programmers *end* Because
each of the various programming centers specializes in perhaps a dozen
types of programming programmers go to different programming centers *end*

The props for the scripts are often kept at the programming centers *end* The
programmers will dress according to the script they are giving the victims
which might mean they may be dressed as the Wizard of Oz a Nazi a
doctor in a white coat a white rabbit costume a corrigan sweater as Mr *end*
Rogers or in the nude *end*

One of the most cruelest evil geniuses in recent times was Dr *end* Mengele *end*
Dr *end* Mengele used  twins during the time of - for research *end*
Most of these twins died *end* The twins were chosen out of the vast numbers

of people who were brought in to the German concentration camps *end* By the
time W.W *end* II ended Mengele knew a great deal about how to torture
children in order to get them to bond totally with him *end* Even today some of
the survivors of his horrible experiments believe that Mengele loved
children *end* They love him as their father *end*

Mengele also developed the ability to create artificial twinning between
two people *end* Mengele carried his violin with him when he came onto
military bases *end* His violin hid his color bands and probes for color
programming *end*

Other men worked with Dr *end* Mengele and soon became programmers in
their own right *end* Dr *end* Cameron of Canada became a Monarch mind-
controlled slave programmer known as Dr *end* White *end*

Another programmer who was not a full blooded generational Satanist was
Gog known as Dr *end* Blue *end* Heinrich Mueller is known as Dr *end* Blue *end* Dr *end* Blue
lived in the northwest area and has two sons--their programming and cult
nicknames are Teddy Bear Theodore and Robin Hood Michael *end*

Two programmers known successively as Dr *end* Black are L.W *end* and W.B *end* A
protege of L *end* W *end* is Ed Hummel who works in states such as Texas and
Oregon *end* Ed was originally from Texas and W *end* and B *end* were originally
from Oklahoma before they began working in the Northwest *end*

Lewis and Michael Aquino *end* These two men are as cold blooded as they
come ranking right beside Mengele in their ability to torture *end* Michael
Aquino DOB //  Leavenworth St *end* San Francisco plus other

Dr *end* Green Dr *end* Joseph Mengele

The most significant programmer perhaps one could give him the title of
the father of Monarch Programming was Joseph Mengele an ex-Nazi
Concentration Camp doctor *end* Thousands of Monarch mind-controlled
slaves in the U.S *end* had "Dr *end* Green" as their chief programmer *end*

Physically the doctor was ’" dark-brown hair greenish brown eyes and
gracefully handsome *end* He was a Dr *end* Jekyll-Mr *end* Hyde character who
disarmed people by his kindness *end* He was gentle and quiet and intelligent
while still having a very sadistic brutal side to him *end* Joseph Mengele was
born into a wealthy Satanic bloodline and became one of the most
powerful Satanists in the world *end* He was an expert on demonology and the
Cabala *end* He was at least a Grand Master in the Illuminati but how high he
went up the hierarchy ladder is unknown to this author *end* Because he was
part of the Illuminati and their bodies are not to have visible scars Joseph
Mengele did not take the SS tatoo on his body when he joined the Nazi SS *end*

Mengele became the camp doctor at the famous Auschwitz Concentration

Camp *end* Joseph Mengele was in a very key position as the camp doctor at
Auschwitz *end* He was able to use countless thousands of people as guinea
pigs for experiments *end* One of the chief items that had to be charted in detail
was how much torture various humans could take *end* The charts were worked
up so that the Illuminati would know exactly how much torture and how
much nurturing to carry out in creating trauma-based mind-controlled
slaves *end*

After Joseph grew up in Gunzberg with a family noted for their secrecy
and an abusive mother he studied at Frankfurt-am-Main which is a satanic
stronghold in Germany *end* He interned at Leipzig a town known for being
the site of modern leaming theories *end* Later he joined the SA and then later
the SS *end*

At the end of W.W *end* II the United States army took custody of Mengele
and the secret satanists of the satanic brotherhood got Mengele quietly
smuggled into the U.S *end* Mengele was given a higher profile in South
America to lead people to think that he spent his time in South America *end*
Actually Mengele spent a great deal of time travelling worldwide
especially to places like Tavistock and China Lake’s Naval Intelligence
base where Monarch slaves were created from innocent children *end* Although
Mengele did indeed live in Brazil Argentina and Paraguay a great deal of
misinformation and disinformation has been dumped on the world by the
CIA and other groups working for the Illuminati *end*

Mengele continued to love music and dancing throughout his life *end* He
became a human puppetmaster who used music to program with *end* He liked
both the violin and the piano *end* He did lots of musical key-tones
programming *end*
Some of his proteges also used music to program with *end* This bent toward
using music then contributed to the fact that the American country western
industry is an outgrowth of the Monarch program *end* The country western
industry is a cover for the drug running done via Monarch slaves *end*

Another bent of Mengele’s also contributed to a direction that the Monarch
program took *end* Mengele was fascinated by twins and twinning *end* Mengele

experimented on thousands of twins most of who died from the torture of
the experiments *end* Science experiments need two groups one of which is a
control group *end* Twins make research easy *end* Mengele used them extensively *end*
He was developing along with some German and Italian researchers the
capability to trauma bond people to their abuser to such an extent that the
victim would be totally loyal to their abuser *end* During episodes in the camps
when Mengele saved people from execution by the S.S *end* some of those
people remained loyal to him to this day in spite of an awareness of how
many people he cruelly tortured to death *end*

Monarch slaves are programmed to think they have a twin somewhere *end*
Many of them have been twinned into  person and  person teams also *end*
Mengele was known by people in the camps by his victims as the Angel of
Death Vater father Vaterchen daddy and Schoner Joseph beautiful
Joseph *end* Monarch mind-controlled slave victims who were programmed by
him know him by names such as Doctor Green Papa David and Fairchild *end*
Monarch slaves remember the cadence of his shiny black boots as he
marched back and forth while programming them *end*

Whether programming in a lab or experimenting on humans Dr *end* Mengele
enjoyed reducing people to the level of animals *end* However many times his
victims were restrained from crying tears *end* Mengele is well-known by his
Monarch victims for his daisy game programming *end* He would pull off a
daisy and say I love you." Then he would pull of one and say I love you
not." When the last daisy petal came out I love you not" he would then kill
a small child in front of the child he was programming *end*

Mengele was in Dallas during the killing of JFK which was achieved by
trained Monarch slaves *end* In fact the Beaumont TX Enterprise on Mon *end*
April  ’ in the Metro Sect *end* B on page B cont *end* to b reports that a
sworn affidavit exists where a man connects Joseph Mengele with
Kennedy’s death and to have seen Mengele at the Texas Book
Depository *end* Luis Angel Castillo was just one of the Monarch mind-
controlled slaves sent to kill JFK on Nov *end*  ’ *end* A woman from
Germany named Mrs *end* Krebs along with a host of other programmers
worked with Mengele on the Kennedy assassination *end* In  as part of the
ongoing deception and also showing the audacity of the Illuminati Joseph

Mengele applied and got an Argentinean foreign resident permit under his
own name *end* He even travelled to Europe to various countries in  using
his own name *end*
Dr *end* White Dr *end* D *end* Ewen Cameron

Dr *end* White was the cover name for D *end* Ewen Cameron b *end* Dec *end*   -
Sept *end*   *end* He was born in Scotland was tall imposing & blue eyed
liked whiskey and wore custom-made suits *end* He called women "Lassie."
His favorite book growing up was Frankenstein it is said that
Frankenstein inspired him to go into psychiatry *end*
Cameron was president of the powerful American Psychiatric Association
and later the president of the Canadian Psychiatric Association and then
later the first president of the World Association of Psychiatrists *end* He was
chairman of the Canadian Scientific Planning Committee *end* Dr *end* D *end* Ewen
Cameron of Montreal Canada was Dr *end* White when carrying out Monarch
programming *end*

Cameron tried to continue some of Mengele’s eye color research in
Canada *end* Mengele was trying to discover for the Nazi’s how to make brown
eyes blue *end* Cameron received funding from the Illuminati *end* Cameron also
got funding from the CIA *end* The Rockefeller Foundation gave him
in  to create the Allen Memorial Institute for psychiatry an Illuminati
front *end* He began doing programming early in the s *end* Cameron had
served on the gruesome western front in W.W.I *end*

As an Illuminati kingpin and programmer Cameron Dr *end* White was very
sadistic and cold blooded *end* He visited other programmers on the West
Coast periodically *end* One leading canadian doctor said that Cameron "was
not possessed of the necessary sense of humanity to be regarded as a good
doctor." The man was able to instill fear into people by looking at them *end*
He met frequently with Allen Dulles the head of the CIA *end* He travelled
frequently including making stops in Washington *end*

Many of the Monarch slaves on the east coast were victims of Cameron *end*
He worked long hours at his mind-control work like a driven man *end* In

just one of Cameron’s institutions administered under his supervision
 electrical shocks to patients *end* This is just what was recorded at one
institution for one year *end* Who knows how many victims got electrical
shocks and programming by this man *end*

He worked with the Jesuit part of the NWO in Canada *end* Leonard
Rubenstein was one of his trusted assistants *end* Cameron encouraged
dissension among his staff in divide and Conquer tactics to maintain his
power *end* Cameron had a big ego that allowed him to steal other people’s
work and give himself credit for it in his publications *end*

The Anti-Christ
Chief handler/programmer



 The AntiChrist will have both public and private lives *end* The two will
not be the same *end* Deep in the heart of the AntiChrist he will want to rob
kill and destroy *end*
 He will be a man of war but his public image will be that he is a man
of peace *end*
 He will be a winner *end* The public always likes a winner *end* This will be a
man with a hardened heart but a man of charisma *end*
 Charisma has been noted to develop when a person is a foreigner
novel and has some feature that causes people to feel sorry for the person
--some wound or physical defect like Gorbachev's red splotch on his
head *end* The AntiChrist will have the public appearance of being a genius
not only a wizard of words but a commercial genius a military genius a
diplomat of the highest order a leader and an intelligent good looking
man *end*
 However this is the public image *end* Some of this will be created by
madison avenue techniques *end* He will be fearless

 a skilled negotiator a poker face who is capable of crafty deception *end* In
fact deception characterizes the man *end*

He is Satan in human flesh

 who will use religion for evil *end* He will use good for evil *end*
 His lineage is from several directions *end* He may have Hittite blood

 blood from the Tribe of Dan

 and blood from Assyria *end*

 He may also claim to have Egyptian royal blood *end*

 He will be proclaimed the returning messiah for the Buddhists the
Islamic religion the New Agers the Christians etc *end* Inman Mahdi the
Messiah *end* etc *end* However the group of people who he will be most
connected to will be the Jews *end*
 His sphere of influence will not just be jews but he will reinstitute
blood sacrifices in the Temple in Jerusalem *end*

 This may well be the abomination of desolation that the Word of God
warns about *end*

 The AntiChrist will arise on the scene like a thief in the night

 and will surprise people by his rise to fame *end* He will come from
obscurity --

 but he will have all the correct credentials

 and bloodlines *end*

 All the correct occult signs will occur around this individual *end*
 Because of historical precedence we know that chaos and confusion
will set the stage for the grand entrance of this man onto the stage of public
attention *end*

Problems will be created so that this great man can pull mankind out
of the worst disasters *end* The world will be trauma-bonded with him *end*
 He will be a savior saving mankind from extinction and death *end*
However while he promises and provides a new life for humankind he is
actually a merchant of spiritual death *end*
 The eternal fate of individuals is determined by how they respond to
him *end*
 A remnant of true believers will endure to the end

 but many will succumb to the deception *end*
 The AntiChrist will not have to face a hostile church--the church will
be in apostasy and will accept him *end*
 The AntiChrist will have to face a few John the Baptist types who he
will use his guillotines on *end*
 In other words the AntiChrist will not be antagonistic toward the
church--but he will subtly destroy it and cause it to serve only him *end*
He will disregard the true law of God

--the spirit of the law but he will be a legalist who wants law and
order

 *end* He will have both a False Prophet and another close friend the Beast *end*
 The daily blood sacrifices will become the global correct view and
Christians who oppose these sacrifices will be in trouble *end*
 All the trappings of Rabbinic and Talmudic and Cabalistic Judaism
will be revived and flourish *end*
 He will pretend to be like Christ--he will be compared to Christ in the
media--but he will also be opposed in reality to everything Christ stands
for *end* As so many Satanic cult leaders do and as is standard within
Illuminati rituals--the AntiChrist will be killed and brought back to life *end*
 This simulated death will be done in front of the public and this will
give him the appearance of superhuman strength and divine favor--for
being able to receive a deadly wound and then to heal and revive so

quickly *end* Jerusalem will be the religious capital of the New World Order

--but there is reason to believe that there will also be both a political
and an economic capital and a computer and a police center *end*
 There will probably be  public capitals and many other centers

 Just as during the Roman Empire there were many religious centers
such as Ephesus was the spiritual center for Diana worship being one of
the  wonders of the Ancient world *end* Mt *end* Olympus in Greece was a sacred
mountain in ancient times with sites for consultations with the Oracles *end* In
modern AntiChrist times Glastonbury UK and Mt *end* Shasta CA may serve
as spiritual centers *end* The New Age pilgrimages to Mt *end* Shasta which are
covers for the mind control done there may well continue to serve that
same function in the AntiChrist's reign *end*
 Rome or London could become political capitals *end* An economic
capital could be established almost anywhere *end* The computers are already
being centered in Europe *end* Once he has taken power he can enter into
Jerusalem like a hero triumphantly *end*
 He will command universal worship via the technological advances
that have been made in communication *end* All the spirits of evil will collect
themselves in this one person of evil *end* He will be shrewd and will be able
to understand dark evil things *end* He will do things according to his own will *end*
At least some outside of the inner circle will know that he is homosexual
and bi-sexual *end*
 He will have the full force of the world's system behind him trying to
make him look better *end* He may be born in the Middle East --perhaps in
Pakistan like Lord Maitreya Rahmat Ahmad *end*
 Historically Satan's AntiChrist spirit has captured a number of men *end*
 For instance Antiochus IV Epiphanes Caligula Nero Ghulam
Alimad and Hitler *end* However these have been only partial manifestations *end*
Satan working through secret satanists such as Karl Marx set up

Communism *end* In Russia Marx Engels and Lenin were made into a Father

The man who built Scotty’s Castle was Walter Perry Scott -
 *end* Walter P *end* Scott was the son of an alcohol distiller and horse
breeder in Kentucky *end* Walter did not get any formal education *end* He
left home and went west where he worked as a mule driver and a
water boy *end* From there he became a horse wrangler *end* Because of his
talent with horses Buffalo Bill made him the feature rider along with
Annie Oakley in Buffalo Bill’s family show *end* The show travelled and
Scotty was with it eleven years *end* During this time Scotty made many
important friendships with men of power and wealth *end* In
Walter married and left the show *end* He got a loan from Julian Gerard
a NY banker to go prospecting for gold which he failed to pay back *end*
Julian Gerard was repeatedly sending people to hassle Scotty to get
his money back *end* In  Walter Scott "Scotty" scattered gold
nuggets and  bills from N.Y *end* to L.A *end* Where he got all this gold
and  bills is a mystery but it wasn’t from prospecting *end* The idea
of finding a secret mine was very obviously a cover for however
Scotty managed to get his money *end* Scotty is well-known for his
penchant to throw away  gold pieces as if they were candy
wherever he went *end*

Nobody believed he had a mine strangely the IRS never got
interested in Scotty *end* Why *end* The IRS went after Charles Caughlin
who was exposing the elite the bankers the Freemasons etc *end* in the
early ’s on his radio show *end* There was no reason to suspect
Caughlin of any cheating on his Income Tax and the audits found
the IRS actually owed Caughlin money *end* However the national
papers printed front page stories of the IRS investigation and
practically ignored that the man was exonerated *end* Yet the IRS left

Albert Mussey Johnson - a Chicago millionaire who
was v.p *end* from  to  of the National Life Insurance Co *end*

remained close friends *end*

In  construction secretly began on a castle in Death Valley *end* The
best of materials were used and the materials had to be hauled clear
out in the desert by truck to Grapevine Canyon where the castle sits *end*
Hundreds of workers were hired *end* The castle got its kitchen tiles from
Spain *end* Special rugs were made on the European island of Majorca
for the castle *end* Tiles for the incompleted pool came from the
Mediterranean *end* Many of the furnishing of the castle came from
cathedrals and palaces in Spain and Morocco *end* Draperies made for
the castle were hand-tooled in selected sheepskin leather *end* Sixty hand-
carved panels each of a different design were installed in the music-
room ceiling *end* A Welte Mignon organ reported to have cost
--the finest of its kind in Western United States was placed in the
music room even though Scotty could not play the organ *end* Twelve
bathrooms were installed *end* Several kitchens were installed *end* Tunnels
and secret rooms were built under the buildings *end* Around  million
dollars of that time period were spent on building the castle
supposedly from Scotty’s "gold mine." The castle became known as
Scotty’s Castle *end* It is ideal as a Satanic ritual site *end* It can
accommodate numerous people *end* It is remote *end* It has hidden rooms
and areas and tunnels *end*

William Frost of San Antonio TX was a good friend of a tall lean Texan
named David Hill *end* David Hill had been taken in by Mafia boss Joseph
Bonanno who was as a surrogate father to him *end* After David Hill became a
Christian he used his first hand knowledge of the Mafia the occult world
such as his Masonic experience to put the pieces together about the NWO *end*
He had just completed a very detailed manuscript for a book exposing the
NWO when he was murdered *end* After David’s murder William Frost was
able to retrieve David’s manuscript and sent me a copy *end* The death was not
ruled a murder by the authorities but men who have written lengthy
exposes on the New World Order do not commit suicide before they get
their books published *end*

It was keen-minded David Hill who warned Billy Graham for many hours
about the New World Order only to be told by Billy Graham that Billy
was ‘a captive’ Graham’s own words of the New World Order *end* The
information William Frost gave me about David Hill was later verified in
many ways by Joseph Bonanno’s surprising autobiography A Man of
Honor Simon & Schuster Rockefeller Center N.Y *end*  *end*

It’s somewhat unusual for Mafia chiefs to write autobiographies *end* In it
Joseph Bonanno says he looked up to Billy Graham and that David Hill
joined up with Billy Graham *end* In  Billy Graham came to Joseph
Bonanno’s house in Tuscon with David *end* Graham sent him a Christmas
card every year and called him soon after his wife died to offer
condolences *end* These things are mentioned on page  of his
autobiography *end* David Hill’s manuscript was encouraging to me Fritz
because he verified many of the same things that I’d found *end* His manuscript
was quoted in Vol *end*  concerning the top families *end*

Front dustjacket

The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Edited and Introduced by FRANCIS KING

In recent years there has been a remarkable
resurgence of interest in what is generally
referred to as the 'Occult' *end* Popular Sun-sign
astrology has become a subject for cocktail
party chatter; the 'Underground press'
displays an intensive although often ill-
informed interest in such subjects as
Glastonbury Ley Hunting and Flying
Saucers; and books — many of them owing
what little merit they possess to the skillful
employment of scissors and paste — on all
aspects of occultism pour from all the
presses *end*
In the shadow of such well-publicised
aspects of the Occult revival can be dimly
discerned the shape of an altogether more
important phenomenon — nothing less than
the rebirth of Magic *end* Magic that is in the
sense that it is defined by the extraordinary
occultist Dion Fortune 'The science and art
of causing changes in consciousness in
accordance with will.'

There is no doubt that the magical
techniques for which extraordinary
efficacy is claimed are almost exclusively
derived although sometimes indirectly
from those two extraordinary occult
sodalities the Hermetic Order of the Golden
Dawn and the Ordo Templi Orientis *end* The
rites and secret instructions of the former
organisation are easily available in Dr
Francis Regardie's Golden Dawn a work
which only now thirty-five years after its
first publication is beginning to receive the
appreciation it so undoubtedly deserves *end*
Those of the latter the Ordo Templi
Orientis have hitherto never been
published although grossly inaccurate and
incomplete typescript versions of them have
occasionally been sold for high prices *end*
Now at last this volume makes available to
the occult student not only the symbolic-
masonic riches of the initiate on rituals pf

Front dustjacket



Front dustjacket

the O.T.O *end* but the secret magical
instructions of the Order's seventh eighth
and ninth degrees the full details of the
techniques from which such occultists as
Theodor Reuss and Aleister Crowley
derived their mystic powers *end*
Here is a source book that has a place in the
library of every serious student of the

Occult *end*
