The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
PART TWO

The Rituals Themselves



SIXTH DEGREE

The Ceremony of

Illustrious Knights Templar of the Order of

KADOSCH

and of

Dame Companions of the Order of the Holy Grail

The Temple is that of Egypt octagonal with two pylons six mirrors *end* The Canopy is of blue embroidered
with golden stars *end* Above the mirrors are  lights with reflectors each mirror having  and the pylon
of the West  of larger size *end* Here hangs the Volume of the Sacred Law *end*
Of the Altar it is not written *end*
The Knights and Dames are clad in the black or white velvet or silk tunics and knee-breeches and silk
stockings of the IV° but instead of the mantle of green velvet is a mantle of black velvet *end* The garter is
black with gold lettering the shoes black with gold buckles *end* The collarette eagle and sash of ° are
worn *end* The tassels of the mantle are of gold cord *end* The cap is that of a Templar but black with the insignia
in gold *end*
Sword and belt are black and gold *end*
The Ante-room contains the Tomb of Jacobus Burgundus Molensis and is hung with black *end* The
Chamber of Reflections contains a small altar or table on which is a skull and the ever-burning lamp *end* In
the mouth of the skull is a green leaf *end*
When more than  companions are present they draw lots for the offices the loosers remaining without
on guard under the direction of the Knight Sentinel *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*


The Word *end* G.C *end* Babalon

C.B *end* Baphomet

Do

What

Thou

Wilt *end*


Opening

G.C *end* vvv vvv vvv



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Sir Knights and Dames assist me to open the Temple *end*
All give sign *end*
Sir Knight Sentinel guard the approaches of the Temple *end*
Sentinel goes out on guard after seeing that all give signs *end*
Lady of the Sword guard the portal of the Temple *end*
She salutes draws sword and goes to door *end*
Hail Babalon *end* Hail Bearer of the Holy Grail *end* Dips lance *end*
She gives the cup to each companion in turn then to G.C *end* and finishes it *end*
Let us form the Mystic Triangle *end*
The three companions facing outwards with hands joined surround G.C *end* and C.B *end* who exchange the
Greeting Mouth to Mouth *end* Right Hand to Knee *end* Left Hand to Anus *end* Change to EAGLE-
GRIP and exchange WORD *end* She changes to Babalon while he invokes in sign of °=° *end*
WE INVOKE THEE Three-in-One Sol-Om-On *end*
st companion SOL *end*
nd Comp *end* OM *end*
rd Comp *end* ON *end*
All SOL *end* OM *end* ON *end*
C.B *end* The Temple is open *end*
G.C *end* The God is in the shrine *end*
S.B *end* vvv vvv vvv

K.S *end* vvv vvv vvv



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
RECEPTION

FIRST POINT

G.C *end* Sir Knights and Dames Companions of the Graal our Brother R.C *end* Sir .. *end* offers to share our
burden Lady of the Sword instruct Sir Knight Sentinel to admit him *end*
She does so *end* G.C *end* and Companions proceed to anteroom where G.C *end* is then entombed *end* The Companions
stand with drawn swords at head of tomb *end* S.B *end* takes empty cup C.B *end* and advances to foot of tomb *end*
Candidate introduced *end* The Roll of the Bath in on the tomb *end*
S.B *end* Whom have you there *end*
K.S *end* A Sacred Prince of Rose Cross who offers to share the burden of the Illustrious

Knights Templar of the Order of Kadosch and the Dame Companions of the Holy Graal *end*
S.B *end* Who vouches that he is properly prepared *end*
The Knight or Dame who can do so replies *end*
Admit him in due form *end*
K.S *end* directs him to trample and spit on the cross *end*
S.B *end* Behold the tomb of your Grand Master Jacobus Burgundus Molensis *end* Swear to break the
bondage of vulgar error *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*
C.B *end* Swear unconditional and unswerving obedience to the Grand Master Baphomet *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*
S.B *end* Swear to serve the Order to the last moment of your time *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*
S.B *end* Swear to defend the Order with the last drop of your blood *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
S.B *end* stabs Cand *end*
S.B *end* Swear to aid the Order with the last penny of your purse *end*
K.S *end* takes any money and removes his insignia garters and shoes *end*
Swear to love the Order with Body and Soul in the person of any Dame or Knight who demands
it *end*
Note *end* A.C *end* altered the original ‘swear to love’ to ‘swear to exhibit charity to’ — this later alteration
being in pencil *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*
A Kt *end* or Dme *end* not his voucher takes and gives kiss *end*
S.B *end* Swear to devote your whole energies to the Will of the Order and the Dominion of The Sacred
Law *end*
Cand *end* I swear etc *end*
Kisses V.S.L *end*  times *end*
S.B *end* If you break this oath you will ever be pursued by the unsleeping vengeance of the Order; nay the
avenger shall arise even from the Tomb *end*
S.B *end* goes to Candidate’s left as G.C *end* starts up from the Tomb T *end* In his hand is the Roll of the Oath *end*
G.C *end* You will seal this oath with your heart’s blood *end*
K.S *end* draws C.’s blood with his stiletto cutting a St *end* Andrew’s Cross on right arm *end* S.B *end* receives it in
cup *end* Cand *end* dips his thumb in the blood and seals the Oath *end* K.S *end* binds up Cand.’s wound *end*
G.C *end* It is sworn *end* Follow me that I may offer up the blood to our lady Babalon *end*
G.C *end* goes to temple and enters *end* S.B *end* and K.S *end* remaining in their stations within and without *end* Temple is
lighted only by the Sanctuary lamp *end* The three companions form the triangle about the Candidate *end* G.C *end*
goes to C.B *end* and kneels offering Cup *end* C.B *end* drinks lifts her kirtle from which he takes the phial of oil *end*
G.C *end* Within triangle *end* Anoints crown of C.’s head *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
In the name of Nuit and of Babalon and of Isis

Anoints centre of forehead

In the name of Hadit and of Chaos and of Apophis

Anoints ball of thumb

In the name of Ra-Hoor-Khuit and of The Beast and of On and by the authority of the Grand Master
Baphomet and by virtue of the Powers vested in my person I create thee now and for ever a Knight
Templar of the Order of Kadosch and a Companion of the Holy Grail *end*
IAO SABAO *end*
Gives the accolade on b- c- a-s saltire *end*
All IAO SABAO *end*
G.C *end* You will now retire without the portal of the temple there to be invested with the insignia of your
rank *end*
All leave the temple and all assist in this *end* G.C *end* places the shoes upon C.’s feet kissing them in token of
humility *end*
I now proceed to entrust you with the secrets of this degree *end*
All retire and prepare for Second Point *end* K.S *end* wears crown a companion of the papal tiara while the
other companions wear the robes of familiars of the Inquisition *end* No Templar jewel or ensign must be
shown *end* C.B *end* is in Temple as Baphomet *end*
On the  day of October  the Grand Master of the Temple Jacobus Burgundus Molensis or
Jacques de Bourg Molay and many of his brethren were arrested through the treachery of two apostate
brethren They appear who inspired the Pope Clement V and Philip le Bel King of France to crush the
Order *end* These tyrants stripped him of all the signs of his high rank done by Pope and King and had him
bound hand and foot done by familiars and cast into prison on a charge of heresy and immorality; and
indeed our Master was sworn to bring Light and Freedom in to those ages of ignorance and slavery *end*
Here he was put to the torture Cord round Can.’s forehead until he screams but not all the ingenuity of
the tormentors could cause him to utter a cry of pain much less to recant *end*
On the  day of March  he was bound to a stake surrounded by combustible materials and the



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
torch of the executioner applied *end*
Done *end*
See Diagram *end*
With his last words he invoked vengeance on his murderers who died within a year and a day as you
shall do if you ally yourself with tyranny and superstition *end*
Can *end* released *end*
Sir Knight roll on the ground these emblems and cry ‘Down with tyranny *end* Down with superstition!’

Done *end*
The vengeance of the order was executed even sooner upon the traitors who were stabbed in the throat
within a fortnight of the murder of our master *end*
Lay your hand upon your heart the fingers apart in memory of the flames which curled about his noble
heart; grasp your right knee raising the foot as if ready to trample on tyranny; then take this dagger and



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
pierce the throats of traitors crying ‘Wekam Adonai!’ which means ‘Vengeance O my Lord!’ This
vengeance has been accomplished *end* Light and Freedom have slowly penetrated and today we are at
liberty to love the Light of Life *end*
All resume insignia in ante-room *end*
Noble Sir Knight I now re-invest you with the Insignia of Our Order *end* This Ring of Profession is always
to be worn on the right thumb *end* Its inscription V.D.C.A *end* stands for Vult Deus Sanctum Amorem and for
certain other words which will one day be communicated to you *end*
This Eagle is that of Frederick of Prussia who first shook the power of the Papacy *end* The insignia are
black particularly the mantle which though white within a symbol of our light and purity shews that
we must still walk in a cloak of darkness and secrecy; for Light and Freedom are not fully ours *end*
Yet in secret we may still worship as we will *end*
All officers resume places in temple *end* G.C *end* passes in giving sign grip and word *end* Cand *end* follows him *end*
Temple is now in light *end*
‘Behold our God Baphomet the unutterable one the bearer of the Holy Grail.’ Kneel Brother as a lover
kneels at the shrine of the Beloved *end*
Done *end* G.C *end* solemnly dips the lance-point in the cup *end* C.B *end* gives Cand *end* the Cup and he drinks *end* She then
raises him and greets him with the secret grip as in the Opening within the triangle of Companions or in
any case with the accolade *end*
‘Sir Knight you are now at liberty to retire *end* On your return you will partake with us of the Mystic Feast
of the Sabbath’ *end*
Companions conduct new Knight from the Temple *end*
THIRD POINT

The Knights assemble to the W *end* of the Tomb of J.B.M *end* The Temple is dark but for sanctuary lamp *end*
G.C *end* Brethren to Order *end* Let us celebrate the Mystic Feast of the Sabbath *end*
He leads procession *end* G.C *end* C.B *end*  Companions S.B *end* K.S *end* new Companion last *end* They go  times round
the Tomb widdershins; then all enter but K.S *end* who bars new Knight *end* K.S *end* directs him to knock short
long short short *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*

disrobe in the anteroom *end*

The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
PART THREE

The Secret Instructions of the

Seventh Eight and Ninth Degrees



OF THE NATURE OF THE GODS

A Secret Instruction of the Seventh Degree



DE NATURA DEORUM

Baphomet X° O.T.O *end* Rex Summus Sanctissimus from the Throne of Ireland Iona and all the Britains
that are in the Sanctuary of the Gnosis to all Members of the Supreme Grand Council of Very Illustrious
Sovereign Grand Inspectors General VII° Greeting and Peace *end*
Under the seal of the Obligation of the VII° *end*
I

From the Beginning of Years the Initiates of all peoples have held one central secret as a sure Bond of
Brotherhood as a unity whose truth is able to harmonize all men upon the Earth *end*
No fabrications of knavish priests no vain dreams of mystics can hide from the sane this one fact

Not only is the Earth but a chilled spark of the Sun a dropt petal of the Rose of Heaven but the source of
all Light and Life upon the planet is that same Sun *end* Not only is he creator but sustainer and it is He also
that destroyeth in due season and redeemeth when the time is come *end*
Therefore in the Macrocosm is one sole God the Sun *end*
Now in the Microcosm which is Man the viceregent of the Sun sole giver of life is the Phallus *end* He is
also sole giver of Light in a certain secret sense not fully declared in the VII° *end* This much may We hint
the Phallus is the physiological basis of the Oversoul see also Liber  The Book of Lies Caps *end* A H

IA IE IF IH LB And also of His own nature is He Liberty and Love *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Now of old our brethren hid this doctrine in tradition and in fable and in great buildings and in the
Rituals of Freemasonry *end* With this Key all these Rituals become intelligible luminous radiant; without it
they are dark the just scorn of the ignorant *end* Search and see *end*
In this book we have no need to speak of local and tribal Gods of animistic personifications of partial
phenomena and the like *end*
II

But of universal Gods as these

The Fire; an image of Sol and a fable of the Phallus *end*
The Moon; an image of Kteis only worshipped with Sol in his aspect as an extension of the Phallus *end*
The Mountain; reverenced as the home of the Gods the visible place of the rising of Sol and as by shape
symbolical of the Phallus *end* Some mountains are female from shape or tradition *end*
The Ancestor; revered as an incarnation of the Phallus *end*
The Yoni or Kteis; revered as the House of the Phallus and his complement *end*
The Snake; revered as giver of Death and as a symbol of the Spermatozoon *end* He has often the head of

The Lion; to indicate the mighty power of the Spermatozoon *end*
The Egg; revered as Solar and in itself as the vehicle of Phallic energy *end*
The Eagle; and many other winged creatures; also wings attached to the symbols *end* This represents the
flight of Life from one resting-place to another and is therefore a proper attribute of the Phallus *end*
The Tree; is but the flowering Phallus *end*
The Stars; these being the concourse of the Brethren of the Sun are venerable for the Wise even as He *end*
And the star-universe is as it were His Mother whence Nuit is the highest and holiest of all that may be *end*
And her mate is Hadit the secret and essential energy of Life whose raiment is the Phallus wherefore is
Hadit equal with Her the highest and holiest of all that may be *end* And Their Child Ra-Hoor-Khuit is the
visible Sol-Phallus upon earth *end* But this is a mystery of the Adepts of Thelema and the vulgar may not
attain to it *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
All other Gods should be referred to this synthesis in the Microcosmic Sun *end*
Thus Corn-goddesses conceal Mysteries of Germination Wine-gods are Phallic and Solar in the Ecstasy
of overflowing Life of which the proper use of wine makes even the common people conscious *end*
There are also gods invented to represent things useful to man; but these are by nature subservient to the
prime God whose use and beauty are fundamental *end*
III

In that Sanctuary of the Gnosis to which Very Illustrious Sir Knights your valour and chastity may one
day obtain your admission there is a certain deeper interpretation *end* Nor are ye wholly ignorant of how in
the Figure called Baphomet and Babalon is a Measure of Heaven and Earth *end*
Again those Initiates indeed who have penetrated in truth into the Sanctuaries of their own Being and
found That God Omnipotent Omniscient Omnipresent who is Light Life Love and Liberty beyond
Time and Space without quantity or quality One Eternal the very essence of the Sun and of the Phallus
alike will possess in their own consciousness illuminated by That a certain apprehension of the Truth
which is not in any way to be shared by those who have not attained to this Treasure *end*
These if they are wise will make no attempt to disclose this inner Truth to the profane but will be
content that they rest in the shadow of that external Truth which We have here declared unto you that
God is One and that His name is in the Macrocosm the Sun and in the Microcosm the Phallus *end*
For all attempts to initiate even the worthy before they initiate themselves are folly and fatality *end* The
Secrets of the Wise although known of them are not to be exprest in the language of common men *end*
Look you Sir Knights this Doctrine itself that We reveal to you in this Supreme Grand Council to which
ye have attained so hardly how will it sound think you even in a Consistory of Princes of the Royal
Secret prepared as they are for some such revelation *end* How then to mere Knights Kadosch to Sovereign
Princes of Rose Croix *end* And how to Master Masons *end* It is for this reason that our Council is thus
Sentinelled within and without and that our whole Ritual from Minerval upward is but a constant series
of hints of this One Truth *end*
What is the tent of Saladin but the Phallus *end* And the First Word as the last is ON the Sun *end*
But were the Minerval to suspect this truth would he not turn to flee in terror from the Camp and be cut
down by the Black Guard that wardeth even the outmost marches of the Kingdom of the Most Holy and
Most High Lord God Almighty *end*
Therefore reflect act wisely and with prudence Sir Knights not declaring openly the Arcanum to such
as understand not already of their own ripe wit *end* And in what time seemeth Him good shall the O.H.O *end*
gathering his forces declare this Truth privily unto the Kings and Princes of the Earth that they may take



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
counsel together and rule all men in peace and love by virtue of this Secret under the Shadow of the
Wings of the One ineffable Lord *end*
For this secret is not only a convenient manner of doing this a Pillar of Flame to disperse the Shadows of
Earth but is also a convenient veil — and the only veil worthy — of that further Light which We are not
able to reveal even to this Supreme Grand Council of the O.T.O *end*
IV

Of all our enemies those are most to be feared who make false gods of their imaginations *end*
For the heathen are turned easily from gods of clay; for truth strikes home sharply on their dark minds *end* It
is easy to prove that the Sun is indeed the source of Life and Light that the Phallus is indeed
PANGENETOR *end* But to those who have stultified themselves who have darkened their own eyes who
have betrayed their own reason in seeking out phantastic gods foul and tangled cobwebs of metaphysic
spun by emasculate spider-professors in sunless cloisters bubbles blown by idiots and madmen myths
misinterpreted fables taken for history lies pushed forward by every forgery fraud treachery and
murder to such the Truth seems false and the Light darkness *end*
Such Gods as Parabrahman merely bewilder the people and render them the prey of priestcraft while the
Christs of the Latin Lutheran and Anglican Churches alike are but the machine-gods of all fraud and
oppression being stolen and prostituted from that Christ in whom our Fathers in the Gnosis strove to
synthesize the warring gods of Syria Greece Chaldea Rome and Egypt at the time when the growth of
the Roman Empire first made travel and the intercommunication of the priests of Mithras Adonis Attis
Osiris Dionysius Isis Astarte Venus and many scores of others possible *end*
Traces of this recension are still visible in the Mass and in the Calendar of the Saints all gods and
goddesses of universal import receiving the same honour by the same rites as before while the local gods
were replaced by saints virgins martyrs or angels often of the same name always of the same
character *end*
Thus on the altar the Solar-phallic Crucifix is surrounded by six lights for the planets to use one example
only of a hundred at Our disposal; and Christmas is at the winter Solstice the birth of Christ put for the
birth of the Sun *end* All these points may be studied in

La Messe et ses Mysteres

Rome Pagan and Papal

The Two Babylons

Rivers of Life



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Two Essays on the Worship of Priapus

and many other books which may be studied in the library of the O.T.O *end* and elsewhere *end*
But in pure Free Masonry and especially in the O.T.O *end* this synthesis has been made with greater
accuracy and skill and with higher concentration with more lucidity with dramatic and poetic genius so
it is easier for ourselves to distinguish the Jewel from its setting and possibly in the event of the Rite and
its Tradition being lost in some universal Cataclysm for worthy successors inspired by Our Lord ‘to
retrieve our loss and recover the Word’ *end*
Now then let Us once again recall to you Very Illustrious Sir Knights of the Order of the Temple of the
East the history of our Religious and Military Monks and Knights how issuing from the West as
crusaders they met with initiates in the armies of Salah ‘ud Din and from them obtained the secret called
Baphomet being the Mystery of the Measure of Heaven and Earth that lieth behind this secret of the VII°
concerning the Unity of God *end* And ye have verily reason from the crowns of your heads to the soles of
your feet to remember how this is the origin of all our tragedy *end* Thus therefore Sir Knights valorous and
noble war constantly on all tyranny and superstition and mostly against bigotries such as ‘orthodox’
Christianity as interpreted in its material sense old wives’ tales and foolish fables the immoral doctrines
of original sin and vicarious atonement and the most hideous eschatology in the history of false religion *end*
Nor can much less be averred against all other orthodoxies with their fables equally absurd their
postulates equally immoral *end*
But also let there be war upon those who seek to refine upon these bigotries in any other way than that of
eclectic and syncretistic harmonizations; beware moreover of those who seek to ‘spiritualize’ their false
gods for their heads are even as vain pigs’ bladders of poisonous miasma *end*
But in your warfare honour brave antagonists; spare them and bring them to initiation; while the hag and
the eunuch — and such are well nigh all who support orthodoxies — must be shown the only mercy
possible that of swift destruction *end*
For those calling themselves orthodox who are yet men and women have in truth no faith in these
follies but only profess them as convenient means of dominating the vulgar *end* Such are already of us
although they know it not; such albeit unconsciously understand and live according to our Law of
THELEMA — DO WHAT THOU WILT *end* They are ripe for conversion; they are of the Blood and with
little pains may be brought to fight in our ranks *end* So mote it be *end*
V

Here declare We a certain secret method of worship of the One True God if haply ye may find Him *end*
Let every Knight appoint a privy Chapel in his castle and so far as may be let it resemble this order and



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
disposition of Our Supreme Grand Council having an ever-burning lamp as an image of the Sun to give
light to a Phallus carved or moulded in gold silver platinum or bronze by the fine art of the sculptor *end*
And let the Knight keep oft times vigil before it devotedly with his whole heart uttering hymns and
invocations as may be fitting and exalting himself in due commemoration of this Lord of Life in such
wise that the Image becomes consecrated by his will *end* Thus shall it be a storehouse of strength and a
focus or magnet drawing to itself all subtle forces and radiating benediction *end*
Let then the Knight keep secret this devotion and enjoy its fruits in quiet *end*
VI

Here also is a deeper worship and an inner that lieth nigher to the heart of God *end*
Let the good Knight devout appoint a secret shrine in his own body in the brain or in the throat or in the
heart or in the solar plexus or in that place called groin or in some other centre of force and there let
him establish firmly a mental image of the Phallus or of the Sun; and closing all avenues of sense as it
were tyling the lodge let him worship and cherish that image with unwearying care *end* Let him rehearse
before the Lord thus exalted his own deed of knightly devoir unto that Lord so that Memory and
Imagination dance about him as maids about the Maypole *end* And to these let him add Will consecrating
himself with oaths to the service of the Lord and vowing to make himself a worthy priest unto Him *end*
Thus then the whole thought being closely knit together and ranged about the Image as soldiers that
rally to a Standard let him turn devoutly and intensely his mind to the sole contemplation of that Image
figuring to himself that all other thoughts are but as cowans and eavesdroppers *end* Now then for a season
shall it be difficult rightly to tyle that Lodge and the mind shall turn ever from the Image *end* So therefore
let the good Knight with fortitude redouble zeal until it be that on a sudden all that turmoil cease and the
thought flow evenly up to the image *end* Then shall the God appear in all His glory assuming the
worshipper into His Heaven *end*
VII

Be it known unto you Very Illustrious Sir Knights Councillors that there lieth beyond all this a supreme
mode by which God not only manifesteth Himself to man but is with him united in most sweet nuptials *end*
But this mystery is not to be known of them that are not yet initiates of the Sanctuary of the Gnosis IX° *end*
But be ye also assured that by these practices preliminary ye shall be led to Godliness and to the Reward
and Favour of the All-One; and ye do fit yourselves for that further advancement ye make yourselves
worthy candidates for the Secret Areopagus of the Illuminati wherein is much made light that is yet dark
to you *end*
VIII

And may the Blessing of our Lord and Father the Sun and the Favour and Fervour of the Lord

S be upon you and prepare you in brain and heart and body wisdom and beauty and might

of creation being within you for the Glory of which this Council is but a figured veil *end*
Hail Sir Knights Councillors and farewell *end* In the Name of BABALON and THE BEAST conjoined of
the Secret Saviour and of IAO *end*

PART THREE

The Secret Instructions of the

Seventh Eight and Ninth Degrees



OF THE SECRET MARRIAGES OF GODS WITH MEN

A Secret Instruction of the Eighth Degree



De Nuptiis Secretis

DEORUM cum HOMINIBUS

Baphomet X° O.T.O *end* from the Throne of Ireland Iona and All the Britains that are in the Sanctuary of
the Gnosis to the Perfectly Illuminated Adepts of the Secret Areopagus of the Eighth Degree Pontiffis
and Epopts of the Illuminati Greeting and Peace *end*
Under the Seal of the Obligation of the VIII° *end*
I

Of Chastity

Dearly Beloved in that war of the Brethren of the Left Hand Path against the Gnosis whose first phase
ended in the establishment of that tyranny and superstition which is called Christianity much Truth was
stolen by the Black Lodge and perverted to its vile uses *end* And most noxious in its corruption is that
castration of man called Chastity the atrophy of those noblest parts of the body which are the proper
organs of Redemption both Gaian and Ouranian *end*
We then who in the Seventh Degree were sworn most solemnly to Chastity in the Inmost as in the
Outermost who have now as Epopts of the Illuminati beheld with our eyes and as Perfect Pontiffs of
our noble Order administered with our members the Initiation whose name is Resurrection unto the
Light we therefore are able to lighten the darkest places of the Earth and to consider wisely what lieth in
the empire of the Evil Ones *end* Read therefore these passages in the forgery called the Epistle of Paul to the



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Romans

Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body that ye should obey the lusts thereof
Neither present your members unto sin as instruments of unrighteousness; but present
yourselves unto God as alive from the dead and your members as instruments of
righteousness unto God *end*
I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh for as ye presented
your members as servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity even so now
present your members as servants to righteousness unto sanctification *end* For when ye were
servants of sin ye were free in regard of righteousness *end* What fruit then had ye at that time
in the things whereof ye are now ashamed *end* For the end of those things is death *end* But now
being made free from sin and become servants to God ye have your fruit unto
sanctification and the end eternal life *end*
Romans VI - and -

Consider also these passages of the Old Testament

And the LORD said unto me Take thee a great tablet and write upon it with the pen of a
man For Maher-shalal-hash-baz; And I will take upon me faithful witnesses to record
Uriah the priest and Zechariah the Son of Jeberechiah *end* And I went unto the prophetess and
she conceived and bare a son *end* Then said the Lord unto me Call his name Maher-shalal-
hash-baz *end*
When the Lord spake at the first by Hosea the LORD said unto Hosea Go take unto thee
a wife of whoredom and children of whoredom for the land doth commit great whoredom
departing from the LORD *end* So he went and took Goher the daughter of Diblaim; and she
conceived and bare him a son *end*
Isaiah VIII -

Hosea I -

And the LORD said unto me Go yet love a woman beloved of her friend and an
adulteress even as the LORD loveth the children of Israel though they turn unto other
gods and love cakes and raisins *end* So I bought her to me for fifteen pieces of silver and an
homer of barley and an half homer of barley And I said unto her Thou shalt abide for me
many days; thou shalt not play the harlot and thou shalt not be any man’s wife so will I
also be toward thee *end*
Hosea III -



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
It is then certain even out of the mouth of the enemy that there is a sacred use even as an abuse of the
Sanctuaries of Life and although there be rites so sacrosanct and so secreted that even to the Perfectly
Illuminated Adepts of the VIII° they may not be disclosed yet to them is due a full declaration of many
Mysteries almost surpassing speech *end*
II

Of the Rites of Blood

It is said that there is a sect of the Jewish Brethren called Chassidim whose practice is the sacrifice of
man *end* Thus preferably a child but also an adult is taken from among the Gentiles and ceremonially slain
so that not a drop of blood is lost lest the spirit of the victim taking refuge in that drop escape the
Exorcist *end* This blood is then consumed as a sacrament or employed for talismanic purposes *end* For once the
spirit of the slain one is sealed up into the spilt and gathered blood it is multiplied in every part thereof
even as in the Mass the Body of Christ is said to be equally in all the myriad consecrated hosts and His
Blood in every drop of consecrated wine everywhere and for all efficacious *end*
Consider this *end*
III

Of Certain Rites Secretly Practised in Russia

There is a body within the Greek Church which holds an esoteric doctrine and practises a Secret Rite *end*
At the meetings of this body the lights being extinguished the worshippers led by the Priest and a
chosen and consecrated Priestess seek out each other by touch and by subtle attraction; then they
consummate the pure charity of their hearts in holy zeal *end*
If by the favour and indwelling of the Holy Ghost the Priestess that is unto this Rite espoused and else
virgin do conceive and bring forth then is the child baptized by its father the Priest for the Purification
by water and for the Consecration by fire is roast and divided among the worshippers for use as a
sacrament as a talisman and as a medicine against all diseases *end* This also is said of the Knights of our
own Holy Order of the Temple that the offspring of any one of them by a virgin was roast and an
unguent made of its fat wherewith to anoint the Magian and Ineffable figure of BAPHOMET *end*
Consider this *end*
IV

Of the Black Mass



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Within the Roman Church have been found ever from the beginning to this day persons and societies
conforming outwardly to that base and materialistic cult inwardly revolting against it; yet often are such
so ignorant of our Light and of our Truth that to them the attainment of Life Liberty and Love seemed
only possible through a profanation of their own Mysteries *end* For they knew not that these Mysteries were
themselves but profanation and corruption of the true and perfect Mysteries of the Adepts *end*
They established therefore a cult whose fundamental formula was the defilement of the consecrated Host *end*
The Priest therefore having made the bread into the Body of Christ as he could theoretically do by virtue
of his Apostolic power did as he thought defile that Body by using it as the object and vehicle of lust *end*
Heroic children of Liberty but thrice blind *end* Samsons that perish with the Philistines *end*
For if the ecclesiastical theory be true in fact they do incur damnation if false verily they lose their
labour *end* But at least they set up Man against the foul demon of the Christians and let this be accounted
unto them for righteousness *end* But see my Brethren Perfectly Illuminated Adepts how great is their error
that they revolt who should be Kings *end* For it is in truth not the apish antics of the Priest that consecrate the
bread but his male power that should make holy all his deeds *end*
Consider of this *end*
V

Of the Sabbath of the Adepts

In the black hours of earth when the Christian superstition with fell blight withered most malignantly the
peoples of Europe when our own Holy Order was dispersed and the sanctity of its preceptories lay
violate there were yet found certain to hold Truth in their hearts and loving Light to bear the Lamp of
Virtue beneath the Cloak of Secrecy *end* And these at certain seasons went at night by ways open or hidden
to heaths and mountains and there dancing together and with strange suppers and spells diverse did call
forth Him whom the enemy called ignorantly Satan and was in truth the Great God Pan or Bacchus or
even that Baphomet whom the Templars worshipped secretly and yet worship as in the VI° all Illustrious
Knights of the Holy Order of Kadosch all Dame Companions of the Holy Grail are taught to do or
BABALON the Beautiful or even Zeus Apollo of the Greeks *end*
And each when first inducted to the revel was made partner of that Incarnate One by the Consummation
of the Rite of Marriage *end*
Consider of this *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
VI

Of Classical Fables

The Ancients of every nation report their heroes to have been born of the marriage of Gods with mortals *end*
As Romulus and Remus begotten of the God Mars upon a vestal Virgin Hercules of Jove Buddha of
Vishnu in the form of a white elephant with six tusks Jesus of Jehovah upon a virgin and many another *end*
Even true Gods were born of mortal mothers as Dionysius of Semele *end*
Also they recount many loves of heaven for earth Diana for Endymion Zeus for Leda Danae Europa
and the rest; even Hades issued from his gloomy kingdom to ravish the maid Persephone *end*
There are also loves of Gods for nymphs Bacchus for the Ariadne Zeus for Io Pan for Syrinx; there is
no end of these *end* And satyrs fawns centaurs dryads a thousand gracious tribes leap lightly and lustfully
through their legends *end*
Again we have the loves of fairies for mankind and the commerce of the Beni Elohim with the daughters
of men; and yet again the marriage of Orpheus with Eurydice a nymph and the fatal nets that Laura
Melusina the Sirens Lilith and many another cast for men *end*
It is even said that to every Neophyte of the Order of A\A\ appeareth a demon in the form of a woman to
pervert him; within Our own knowledge have not less than nine brethren been utterly cast out thereby *end*
There are also vain loves as that of Ixion for Hera of Actaeon for Artemis *end*
Consider of this *end*
VII

Of Certain Greek Rites

Among the peoples of the Balkan Peninsula and especially the Greeks beneath the bush of their false
Christianity is hidden the wheat of Demeter *end* And even as the Muslim trust to be united by death to the
Hur al’ Ayn of Paradise so do these others yet think that earthly marriage is but fornication for that
Death is a nuptial wherein the soul is united to that God or Goddess to whom on earth his lust aspired *end*
Thus even in the embraces of their lovers their hearts were fixed on Artemis or on Aphrodite or on Ares
or on Apollo as the inner tendency urges and the intuition thereof proclaims *end*
Consider of this *end*
VIII



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Of Succubi and Incubi

From all time the life of man has now and again overflowed in sleep without will and only reflected
itself dimly and fantastically by dream into his knowledge *end* Now since naught can be lost on any plane
but only changed in appearance the inner substance of this life-stuff does indeed beget monsters in part
material which the doctors of the Middle Ages called Incubi or Succubi according as they performed the
functions of male or female *end* These too begat children upon women; but not the reverse for the
succubus for all his female function is as male as his brother *end* Of these monstrous lovers some even
became famous on earth; as that one who tempted San Antonio and the angel that wrestled with Jacob at
the place called Paniel *end* Also Merlin was the child of an incubus and thus also were many heroes of old
time begot *end*
Consider of this *end*
IX

Of the Work of Adepts

Not only as a probation and as a preparation for the far greater Key of Magick Art that is given to
Initiates of the Sanctuary of the Gnosis in the IX° but for its own sake and the practical and permanent
value of its effects is a lesser work to be undertaken by Epopts — and how much more by Pontiffs *end* — of
the Illuminati *end*
And this work is threefold *end*
I *end* Devotion to the Highest intensified on all planes until it culminates in Conjugal Union ratified by every
God so firmly that Death itself is the gate to its fullest and permanent enjoyment *end*
And the soul is to beget itself as a child for a new incarnation upon the Body of the Great Goddess *end* As it
is written so be it spoken unto you *end* ‘O thou who hast formulated thy father and made fertile thy mother!’

II *end* Acceptance of the devotion of a lower or partial being such as a nymph or elemental in such wise that
it is thereby redeemed and made a perfect soul through the death which it must pay as the price of union
with man *end*
III *end* The deliberate and well-considered creation of new Orders of Being *end*
X

Of Great Marriages



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
 *end* The supreme means is declared fully in the Publications of the August Fraternity Most Holy the A\A\
Liber XI and Liber DLV *end*
 *end* This other method is suggested *end*
On every occasion before sleep let the Adept figure his goddess before him wooing her ardently in
imagination and exalting himself with all intensity toward her *end*
And let him consider all involuntary movements of the mind as adulteries vile and criminal *end*
Therefore with or without an assistant let him purge himself freely and fully at the end of restraint
trained and ordered unto exhaustion concentrating ever ardently upon the Body of the Great Goddess
and let the Offering be preserved in Her consecrated temple or in a talisman especially prepared for this
practice *end* And let no desire for any other enter the heart *end* Then shall it be in the end that the Great Goddess
will descend and clother Her beauty in veils of flesh surrendering her chaste fortress of Olympus to that
assault of thee O Titan Son of Earth *end* Or at the least this being denied thee yet all thy life in heart and
spirit being Hers thy death shall be the consummation of these ‘betrothals’ an entry into the Closed
Palace of thy Lady *end*
And of such Espousals mayst thou read in Liber CCCCXVIII more especially in the Ninth and in the
Second Aethyrs *end*
It is to be noted in all this that both God and the Soul are male or female as convenience requires *end* See
for a curious example the mystic treatise called the Bagh-i-Muattur *end*
XI

Of Lesser Marriages


This matter is easy for the souls of the elements desire constantly this salvation *end* But let the Adept
beware

 *end* That he choose wisely a reasonable soul docile apt beautiful and in all ways worthy of
love *end*
 *end* That he fall not ever from love of the Great Goddess into love of this inferior but give
only as a master and of his pity knowing that this also is Service to His High Lady above *end*
 *end* That of such familiar spirits he have but four *end* And let him regulate their service
appointing hours for each *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
 *end* That he treat them with kindliness and firmness being on guard against their tricks *end*
This being said it is enough; for to have them is but the pains to call them forth from their homes *end* And
the Spirits of the Elemental Tablets given by Dr *end* Dee and Sir Edward Kelly are the best being very
perfect in their nature and faithful affectioning sic the human race *end* And if not so powerful as they are
less dangerous than the planetary Spirits; for these are more boisterous and by distraction stars are
easily perturbed and afflicted *end* Call them therefore by the Keys of Enoch as is written in the Book ye
know of; and let there be after the Calls an Evocation by the Wand; and let the Marrow of the Wand be
preserved within the pyramids of the letters that make up the name of the Spirit *end*
Now unless ye be well skilled in Art Magick ye will not dare call forth the Three Great Gods of the
whole Tablet or the King Serpent thereof or the Six Seigneurs majestical or even the Gods of the
Calvary Crosses in the lesser angles *end* But the Cherubic rulers yea verily and amen these are your mates;
and ye may yet more safely summon the Lesser assistant angles *end*
And those that are in this Art novices should wiselier call forth only the Trigrammaton of the Sub-
Elements *end*
XII

Of the New and Holy Kingdom

It is written in the Papyrus of Nes-Min that the Sun spake in his name Toum and said

‘.. *end* I copulated with my fist I emitted semen into my shadow I ejaculated into my own mouth I sent
forth issue as Shu I poured myself out as Tefnut *end* Shu and Tefnut .. *end* brought to me my eye .. *end* I wept over
them mankind came into being from the tears which came forth from my eye *end* Shu and Tefnut brought
forth Keb and Nut and Keb and Nut brought forth Osiris and the Blind Horus and Set and Isis and
Nephthys from the belly one after another and they brought forth their multitudes upon this earth.’

And again

‘I copulated with my fist my heart came to me into my hand the semen fell into my mouth *end* I sent forth
issue as Shu I poured myself out as Tefnut from one God I was three Gods....’

Thus then did the Sun formulate Male and Female whose children are Earth and Heaven whose children
are the Five Elements or Tatwas of which all visible things are made *end*
Let then the Adept make two talismans pure Male and Female with no admixture of any lesser
principles; and let him consecrate himself as the Sun and pour out Life upon them vivifying them
therewith *end* Then shall they conjoin making unto themselves a new Heaven and a new Earth whose union
shall breed Elements and multitudes of Beings to Live and Love in Liberty beneath thy Light an house



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
of Virgins singing praises among the flames of Glory wherein the Lord hath opened his mouth; whose
works shall be a song of honour and the praise of your God in your creation *end*
XIII

Of Damnation

Remember dearly beloved perfectly illuminated Adepts of this secret Areopagus that from the
beginning of all the vows of your Initiation have invoked upon you the most fearful penalties of
disobedience *end*
For as soon as ye erect any natural and common thing into a Formula of Magick so soon do ye excite
also the contrary current *end* Thus while every child reads and speaks freely of the Pillars of the Temple of
King Solomon by name the Mason dare not so much as letter them without precaution *end* And while the
private man may speak evil of the King and blaspheme God without risk yet the servant of the King
and the Minister of God must cloke sic themselves with reverence even though it be not in their
hearts for this reason that they have invoked the King and God as sword and shield of their own
authority *end*
To you then if you have dared to use this Force of the Holy Phallus is its abuse fatal and deadly *end*
To the man of earth it matters but little if he suffer nocturnal pollution or indulge in wantonness; to you
that are Adepts it is ruin absolute *end*
For all that Force which passeth from under your control unless so directed and fortified by your Will
that it is but as a loyal soldier faithful unto death is as artillery abandoned that is seized upon by the
enemy and turned against you *end* And because it is of your own substance therefore has it as it were by
nature a link with you a right upon you and all the fortresses that your inheritance of God and your
own Holy Art have built about you are of no force to resist this treasonable assault *end* Be wary therefore
for obsession bodily wasting and disease madness and even murder upon you may be inflicted by the
engines that ye having forged for the service of mankind and for the glory of the Lord leave to the
malignancy of the demon that he may turn them to your own destruction *end*
XIV

A Reproof

Hear then dearly beloved this reproof *end*
First strengthen to the uttermost the power of restraint by daily practice as is taught by the Hindus and
Arabs masters of this science in their books



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Shiva Sanhita

Hathayoga Pradipika

Kama Sutra

Ananga Ranga

The Scented Garden of the Sheikh Nefzawi

and many others *end*
Secondly avoid the dangers of inadvertence by constant and regular practice a of the Greater and b
the Lesser Works of an Epopt and Pontiff of the Illuminati and c of the Mystery of the New Holy
Kingdom *end*
Thirdly sleep always in a consecrated circle or in a room full of holy images before whose glory the
powers of darkness tremble every day *end* Such images are

 *end* The Sun *end*
 *end* The Holy Phallus *end*
 *end* The Great Seal of Babalon *end*
 *end* The Stele of Revealing *end*
 *end* The Great Seal of the O.T.O *end*
 *end* The Great Seal of Baphomet *end*
 *end* The Image of Baphomet./The Image of Babalon *end*
 *end* The Eye within the Triangle *end*
 *end* The Rosy Cross *end*
 *end* The Image of Harpocrates upon the Lotus or standing upon Crocodiles *end*
 *end* The Image of Babalon with the Phallic reference Om mani padme hum *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
 *end* The figure of Isis with Horus *end*
 *end* The Crucifix but only if its solar-phallic significance be most firmly grasped and if it
be a shield of secrecy against the vulgar *end*
 *end* Talismans appropriate to this matter *end*
 *end* A living flame *end*
 *end* The symbols and insignia of the O.T.O *end* which your degree entitles you to bear *end*
Magical rings and neck-jewels should also be worn by night and day *end*
The Rituals of defence and protection should also be practised in perfection *end* All bodily excrements such
as cut nails and hair should be burnt; spittle should be destroyed or exposed to the Sun; the urine and
faeces should be so disposed of that it is unlikely that any other person should obtain possession of them *end*
It is even desirable in theory that linen should not be washed by strangers and that old clothes should not
be given to the poor until some time after the last occasion of wearing them *end*
But at most times these precautions are not necessary; only if engaged in operations of the greatest
importance is it indispensable to observe them *end*
XV

Of the Cunning of this Instruction

Now concerning this charge it may be that certain deem therein to be contained things monstrous and
extravagant; let them consider this as a defect of their own intuition and apprehension and moreover as a
thickness of that Veil that is yet betwixt this Areopagus and the Sanctuary of the Gnosis *end* For perfectly
Illuminated as ye are beloved Brethren think this that there may be a Darkness that is more than all
your Light *end*
XVI

Farewell

Amen and Amen and Amen of Amen *end*
I greet you by the sign I exchange with you the token I whisper the Word even as I received it and in no
other manner *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
I invoke upon you the Light of our Lord the Sun; I bestow upon you the blessing of the Lord

S in the Name ON and in the name AMEN I call down the powers of Life of Love and of

Liberty upon you *end*
And may the Glory of the Sanctuary of the Gnosis shine forth through the Veil thereof and the Pageant
of the Grail-feast pass again before your eyes *end*
Hail Brethren beloved of the Most High hail perfectly Illuminated Adepts of our Secret Areopagus
thrice hail Pontiffs and Epopts of the Illuminati hail and farewell *end*
In the name of Babalon and the Beast conjoined of the Secret Saviour and of IAO *end*
