PART THREE

The Secret Instructions of the

Seventh Eight and Ninth Degrees



‘Weave the circle round him thrice

And close your eyes with holy dread;

For he on honey-dew hath fed *end*
And drunk the milk of Paradise.’

AGAPE vel LIBER C vel AZOTH

Sal Philosophorum

the Book of the Unveiling of the Sangraal wherein it is spoken of the Wine of the Sabbath of The Adepts

Being the Secret Instruction of the Ninth Degree



‘The Sun is the Wine and the Moon is the Cup *end*
Pour the Sun into the Moon.’

Hafiz



PRELIMINARY PRAYER

From thine hand O Lord cometh all Good; from Thee flow down all grace and blessing *end* The Characters
of Nature with Thy fingers hast thou traced but none can read them unless he hath been taught in Thy
school *end* Therefore even as servants look unto the hands of their masters and hand maidens unto the hands
of their mistresses even so do our eyes look unto Thee for Thou alone art our help *end* O Lord our God
who should not extol Thee *end* Who should not praise Thee O Lord of the Universe *end* All is from Thee; all is
of Thee; into Thee all must again re-enter *end* Thou art Lord alone and there is none beside Thee *end* Who shall
then not praise Thee O Lord of the Universe unto Whom there is none like; whose dwelling is heaven
without whose temple is the heart within *end* O God the Vast and the Minute Thou art in all things and all



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
things are in Thee *end* O Nature *end* Thou Self of Nothing *end* For what else can I call Thee *end* In myself I am
nothing but self; in Thee I am that Self of Nothing *end* Live Thou in me and bring me to that self which is in
Thee *end*
A CHARGE OF THE O.H.O *end* TO BAPHOMET

MERLIN by the Grace of GOD TRIUNE and by the favour and appointing of The Secret Master called
to the Service of mankind and exalted among you as the Outer Head of the Order O.H.O *end* unto
Baphomet Supreme and Holy King of Ireland Iona and all the Britains within the Sanctuary of the
Gnosis Most Puissant and Sovereign Commander of the Holy Order of the Temple Grand Master of the
Knights of the Holy Ghost greeting and peace in the Most Sacred and Mysterious Name of the True and
Living GOD Most High and in the Word and in the Holy Ghost *end*
Hearken thou O most Illustrious and Illuminated brother unto my word and give ear unto my counsel
and reproof *end*
Shut it up closely in thine heart and set a seal upon thy lips *end*
Whosoever is worthy to receive it unto him shalt thou reveal it; and unto the faithful shalt thou make it
known *end*
Is there one among the Very Illustrious Sir Knights that are Sovereign Grand Inspectors General who
understandeth my word *end* Is there any within thy Consistory that apprehendeth O.T.O. *end*
Seek then and see; discover the inmost will of each knight and bind him to thee by an oath *end*
Further thou shalt test him to the uttermost; thou shalt pass him through the last of the Ordeals *end*
Then shalt thou initiate him privily into the Ultimate Mystery; thou shalt make him a partaker of the
Final Secret *end*
For in this secret and in this alone resideth the Godhead; yea he that possesseth it is no more man but
GOD *end*
SALUTATION OF BAPHOMET

BAPHOMET by the Grace of GOD TRIUNE and by the favour and appointing of THE O.H.O *end* and The
Secret Master Rex Summus Sanctissimus X° O.T.O *end* of Ireland Iona and all the Britains that are in the
Sanctuary of the Gnosis Lieutenant Commander of the Holy Order of the Temple unto the Very
Illustrious Sir Knights Sovereign Grand Inspectors General of the Ancient and Accepted Rite and of the
° of the Royal Rite of Memphis Perfectly Illuminated of our sublime IX° in the Name of the Father
and of the Son and of the Holy Ghost One God eternal indivisible omnipotent omniscient



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
omnipresent *end*
The favour of God and the Grace of our Lord Jesus Christ and the abiding of the Holy Spirit be with you
now and forever more Amen *end*
Here now the Secret of Secrets the Key of all Magick revealed unto me for your instruction and behoof
by the loving kindness of the O.H.O *end*
LEGE • JUDICA • TACE

OF THE NATURE OF THE ARCANUM

‘I am Alpha and Omega the first and the last I will give unto him that is athirst of the
fountain of the water of life freely *end* He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be
his GOD and he shall be my son.’

Apocalypse

Come unto me that I may declare unto ye the wonder ineffable *end* Know that our beginning is in GOD and
our end in GOD; wherefore this is the Great Work to attain unto the Godhead *end*
Pitiful and of tender love hath He revealed unto the wise men of old time the Way of this Attainment *end*
The Gnostics and Manichees preserved it in their most secret assemblies as they had received it from the
greatest of the Magi of Egypt; nor were the Ophites ignorant of this mystery nor the men that did
worship unto Mithras and the secret is hidden in the fable of Samson; Our Lord Jesus Christ established
it through the mouth of the Beloved Disciple *end*
This was the inmost secret of the Knights of the Temple and the Brethren of the Rose Crosse concealed
it in their College of the Holy Ghost *end* From them and from their successors the Hermetic Brothers of
Light have we received it directly and here declare it openly to you *end*
Now then learn that this secret consists in the knowledge of a peculiar rite an High Mass to be celebrated
in the Temple of the Holy Ghost *end* Are ye not Kings and Priests unto God Very Illustrious Sir Knights
and Perfectly Illuminated brethren *end*
This is the True Sacrament by which ye are partakers of the very Body and Blood of Our Lord Jesus
Christ not in His death but in His resurrection *end* By this are ye made Children of Light Fellows of the
Holy Ghost perfect pure Companions of the Sangreal illustrious Knights of the Sacrosanct Order of
Kadosch *end* By this have ye the GNOSIS; by this are ye counted among the Dwellers of the Sanctuary *end*
Blessed are they that do this commandment that they may have sight of the Tree of Life and may enter



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
it through the Gate into the City *end*
For without are dogs and sorcerers and whoremongers and murderers and idolators and whosoever loveth
and maketh a lie *end*
So sayeth He that is the root and offspring of David and the Bright and Morning Star *end*
And the Spirit and the Bride say Come *end* And let him that is athirst come; and whomsoever will let him
take the water of life freely *end*
Now then here followeth a Reproof *end*
A REPROOF

Sir Knights Brethren and Comrades recall the Vows of your Obedience *end* How is it then that you are ever
dallying with dame or jousting with squire *end* By the Eight Pillars that support this holy house it is not
well Sir Knights *end* Now ye know soothfast that our Law is Joy that by Virtue we deny not manhood but
in this ye err that in your sport ye look not beyond to the Mighty Work of the Vow *end* Is not this the essence
of the Proof *end* The Substance of the Ordeal *end*
Whether therefore ye foin or joust as Saint Paul the good Knight sayeth in his Epistle do all to the glory
of God *end* Even at the moment when the Device of the Demon grippeth at his strongest play the man
aspire fervently toward the Grace of our Lord Jesus Christ considering his crucifixion between two
thieves is not the lance that pierced Him in my charge *end* and giving up the ghost to the Father either by
action or by passion *end*
Say we not ‘Non nobis domine non nobis!’ *end* And again ‘Accendat in nobis Dominus ignem sui amoris et
flammam aeternae caritatis’ *end* That is to say Thy purity not mine; and this is the Descending and
Indwelling of the Holy Ghost *end*
Nay verily Deus est Homo Deus est in Homine Homo est Deus quem creavit Elohim *end* Male and Female
are those therefore as these *end* Therefore in this ye do well and in this ill for that ye arrest aspiration that
ye suffocate and expire even at the moment when elsehow the Threshold should be trodden and the
Shrine unveiled *end*
Behold the Spirit of the Lord is upon me and I prophesy *end*
Unless ye repent then will the Lord root out your Order from its place *end* I the Lord will laugh at your
calamity; I will mock when your fear cometh *end* Ye shall be the scorn of evil men and your reproach shall
be in the mouths of women *end* In the great name of Baphomet do I exhort you that ye turn swiftly to the
Lord if so be that the mercy of the Lion and the Serpent may be upon you in the Name of MEITHRAS
ABRAXAS IAO SABAO *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Go then Sir Knights rejoice in Dame and Squire but let not your Understanding be darkened or your
wisdom be baulked of its effect *end* In Beauty behold the Crown Ineffable and beyond the Crown that
Wonder which awaiteth him that is faithful of his oath and is chaste in the ambush of Life as in the set
field of his Probation *end*
And the blessing of God be upon you in the Name of the Father + and of the Son + and of the Holy
Ghost + Amen *end*
TRACATE OF THE GREAT THING HIDDEN IN THE PALACE OF THE KING

Be it now understood further concerning the interchange of opposites that albeit Man is active and
Woman passive yet Man is Peace and Woman Power *end* And this is called the Hermetic Paradox; and he
that hath ears to hear let him hear *end*
There is therefore one magick act that leadeth into life another that abutteth upon death *end* And the first
ultimateth sic and the second returneth unto itself *end* Yet therefore is the last perfect a true rite of the
Highest too exalted for the vulgar even of our holy and illuminated brethren *end*
And in its profanation it cometh forth from the demon and is manifested in all uncleanness even as it is
written Demon est Deus Inversus *end* Yet is it albeit limited and unable to proceed from life to life the
highest of all means of Grace for as wine is to water so is it unto the others in its exaltation of the soul of
man; and whoso mastereth the same even he is found worthy of rule *end* This was the secret of the strength
of our Grand Master Caius Julius Caesar this of our brother Richard Wagner that was Grand Organist in
Bavaria and of so many others whose fame is eternal without our Order as within that they are as the
Stars of heaven for multitude and glory *end* To this aspire ye above all things; for the True Light abideth
therein yet more intensely than in the Other *end* For he that reverseth the whirlings of matter is greater than
he that worketh in them *end* Woe therefore woe exceeding unto him if failing in strength he be swept away
into the abyss *end*
Awake my Lords be vigilant be stern be austere be on your guard for they that seek to devour you are
about the gate *end*
But of all this it is not here written this is the Book of the Pathway that leadeth unto Life *end*
OF THE ALCHYMISTS

Our illuminated brethren the Alchymists being wise with the wisdom of God and cunning with the
cunning of men did apply themselves more especially to physical magick to the finding of the Medicine
of Metals and the Philosopher’s Stone the Tinctures White and Red and the Elixir of Life *end*
For said they with wealth cometh leisure and with health energy and with long life an extension of



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
time; all these will we devote to the performance of The Great Work *end*
These secrets they indeed possessed and the tradition handed down through centuries hath not been lost *end*
O highly favoured of God *end*
O chosen from among men *end*
O thou on whom the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ hath fallen *end*
It is to thee that We reveal the secret ineffable and not to be divined *end* To thee do We entrust the Arcanum
Arcanorum the Hidden Treasure of the Wise *end* Without it all is cold inertia death; within it Fire Energy
Genius Creation *end* This is the Key to every door in the Kingdom of Heaven; this is the Sceptre of the
Realms that Are *end*
The possession and right use of this secret giveth an hundred powers; yea verily five score is the
numeration of the reward thereof *end* For this Mystery is of Jove himself whose letter is PK; and these are
the initials of our athanor and our cucurbite their names in the language of the Greeks *end*
Yet of all these powers I name but seven the glories of Eulis; the stars upon the foreheads of the
Brothers of Hermetic Light *end*
Luna And of these the first is the building up of one that is not born; verily a child of wonder shall he be *end*
Venus And the second is the harmony and the mastery of one co-eval and co-operative with thee from
eternity twin with thee and thy mate *end*
Mars By the third cometh youth and beauty and energy be thou never so old *end*
Saturn By the fourth is life prolonged at will *end*
Mercury The fifth is the attainment of the Supreme the Magick of Light *end*
Jupiter The sixth guardeth and aideth thee in the world wherein thou workest to high rank and honour
shall it lead thee and from thy hands shall pour forth rivers of blessing yea verily and Amen *end*
Sol And by the seventh thou hast all Light and knowest the Cause of all understanding alike the earthy
and the spiritual soul of Man *end*
Is not this a possession worthier than all the dross of earth *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Is not this a pearl richer than all the treasures of the seas *end*
Is not this a goal for whose attainment thou shouldst fling away every garment *end* A prize to gain which no
training is too tedious no toil too arduous no sacrifice too great *end* Thou hast aspired and thou hast
attained *end* It is this it is this no less that this hour I crown thee withal here in the Sanctuary of the Gnosis
Illustrious Illuminated and now Thrice Holy Brother *end*
OF NATURE

First learn this concerning Nature *end*
The basis of mineral life is Hyle and is dark *end*
The basis of vegetable life is Chlorophyll and is green *end*
The basis of animal life is Blood and is red *end*
The basis of Divine Life is Light whose feeblest reflections are beyond Violet *end*
Thus in our order none may wear any ornament of violet save the O.H.O *end* and his immediate
representatives the M.W.S.G.M.G *end* and M.P.S.G.C *end* of G.L *end* and S.G.C *end* the Most Holy Supreme Kings X°
that rule in every land *end*
OF THE NAME OF GOD

I beseech you to understand Very Illustrious Sir Knights and Perfectly Illuminated Brethren that this
secret dependeth first and last upon the One Most High *end*
He is not one whom our minds may apprehend; and although our hearts dissolve in love we may not
attain to Him for he abideth as the Sun of the Soul that reflecteth Him indeed but absorbeth Him not *end*
Now He is the Father that createth the Word that transmitteth and the Spirit that receiveth as also the
Spirit proceeding from the Father is the Essence that writeth the Father to the Son; and this Mystery is
concealed in many sacred names that have been revealed to you Very Illustrious Sir Knights and
Perfectly Illuminated Brethren of our Ancient Order *end*
Learn therefore now this the third motto of our Supreme Council which it signifieth mystically *end* DEUS
EST HOMO that is GOD IS MAN *end*
The which sayeth that AS ABOVE SO BELOW; AS WITHOUT SO WITHIN *end* There is no part of man
that is not GOD; and there is no part of GOD that hath not its counterpart in man *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Now learn also this that God is never to be known by thee; for all thou knowest is but thy creation as
truly as thou art His *end* Thou knowest Him as thou art He *end*
Now there are Three that bear witness in Heaven the Father the Word and the Spirit; and these Three
are One *end* And there are Three that bear witness on earth; the Spirit the Water and the Blood; and these
Three are One *end*
In that Trinity IAO I is the Father A the Spirit O the Word; and in this A the Spirit M the Water Sh the
Blood; and in all these are  MShICh the Messiah our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ in His death
who gave up the Spirit the Water and the Blood as St *end* John beareth witness in his Evangel *end* Hence is
Jesus Christ Alpha and Omega the symbol of the union of GOD and man *end*
Here then is a second Trinity; GOD GOD-man man *end* And to this God-man our ancient brethren have
given many names *end*
And though this name of Jesus Christ hath been universally blasphemed by Christians yet this Name
hath been acknowledged by the true Brothers of the Rosie Crosse and this which is written of Him in the
Evangels and in the Epistles and the Apocalypse is true if it be interpreted in light by the adepts of the
Stone *end*
For in God-man is our salvation; in Him We are both GOD and man *end* Yet the Testament thereof being
betrayed and given to the multitude hath been profaned; as it is written Cast not your pearls before
swine lest they turn again and rend you *end*
Therefore for their ill guarding of the secrets have the adepts been persecuted these two thousand years *end*
See thou to it Very Illustrious Sir Knights that through no fault of thine the truth be lost *end* Trust not a
stranger; fail not of an heir *end*
OF THE SECRET OF FREEMASONRY

Now of Him is our Lord the Sun Father Creator Preserver and Destroyer One Exalted Perfect Giver
of Life and Death Vicegerent and Viceregent of Heaven; and upon Earth is His representative the Sacred
Eidolon within the Ark of the Covenant of whom even in this place we speak not but in hidden terms for
that He is sacred and secret beyond all that are or may be the Rod wherein Prometheus brought down
Fire from heaven *end*
And either Image and Son of the All-Father undergoeth Death and Resurrection; and the symbols are
cognate; and the Feasts of one and the other have been celebrated throughout all recorded time by the
initiates of all faiths *end* And the vulgar ignorant of this have mingled the two worships appointing the
times of one and the seasons of the other the observances of the second and the ordinances of the first in
the same ritual; wherefore have minds been darkened and understandings confounded *end* Thus at Easter is



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
the Crucifixion or Copulation and nine months later is the Birth of the Child which liveth  years
being a generation of mankind and is crucified *end* Yet is this coming led with the descent of the Sun below
the Equator and His resurrection and again with the daily agony of the Sun *end* Now then our Brethren
having the true Keys of all religion; namely that all cults typify either the Mysteries of Lingam and Yoni
or of Sol Luna and Terra can for themselves interpret all rites create new faiths and new feasts ruling
the world in justice and righteousness under the Supreme and Most Holy King X° that is to them Father
and God *end*
For this is the arcanum of the Hierophants of old that in this cult of the Sun in Heaven and of the Phallus
on Earth all men can unite for that these mysteries are reasonable and true and no man can deny them *end*
This is that which is written ‘Peace on Earth Goodwill toward men!’

And this is the true and final secret of Freemasonry; this Sun is it not the Great Architect of the
Universe the Father of the System the Eidolon of the Macrocosm *end* And this Phallus is it not the Great
Architect of this other Universe of Man the Father of the Race the Eidolon of the Microcosm *end* Is not
this that Truth which is established in the mouth of two witnesses *end* Wherefore be ye vigilant preserving
that Kingdom of God which is within you from defilement chaste unto your Lord that is Light Life
Love and Liberty indeed *end*
Also remember well that in all this instruction no word is wasted; and that by deep and continuous study
of the text may ye enlighten your souls *end*
Now then at last are ye indeed initiates of Freemasonry; now at last are ye worthy to rule and govern the
Rite in the law of Righteousness and Truth giving Light Life Liberty and Love to all men of full age
free and of good report that solicit admission to the Lodge *end*
OF THE MOST HOLY TRINITY

The Most Holy Trinity One and Indivisible is hidden

By our Aryan brethren in the trigram AUM

By our Egyptian brethren in the trigram AuMN

By our Gnostic brethren in the trigram IAO

By our Hebrew brethren in the trigram IHV and AMN

By our Chinese brethren in the trigram TAO and its symbol

By our brethren of the Royal Arch in the tripartite word of their degree



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
By our Rosicrucian brethren in the trigram INR and its symbols

By our Masonic brethren in the tripartite word of their degree of Master

By our Christian brethren in the trigram IHS

By ourselves in many ways secretly; and openly in the trigram O.T.O *end*
Many other hieroglyphs of Him are known to you; but all of these are One; and though He is All and in
All and above All yet there is one aspect of Him on which all insist namely that by which He is one
with our own nature in flesh as in spirit *end*
A SECOND TRACATE ON THE TRINITY

Washed in pure wine and consecrated with the smoke of the Cakes of Light come ye now with holy awe
unto the shrine; come ye trembling and joyous while the veil of the Most Holy Mystery is rent by the
Sword of your Most High Grand Master *end*
Behold the Trinity Most Holy One and Indivisible IAO *end* One is the Most Holy Trinity; and Three are its
Persons or Masks *end* One is its Spirit One its Individuality its Permutation One Ararita *end* It is the Seed that
persisteth in all mutation being Itself immune and omniprehensive IAO SABAO *end*
Now the Father is One erect single eternal *end*
And the Son is One in the likeness of the Father yet in this nature double being God-Man *end* And herein
is a Mystery; for being the Word he is the Spirit going forth from the Father and creating the worlds *end*
And the Spirit is One not begotten but proceeding the seed of which Father and the Son are in very
truth but vehicles and guardians *end* And the nature of the Spirit is Liberty and as the wind He goeth as it
listeth Him to impregnate the worlds *end*
And as the Son is double so is the Spirit double; for He is both male and female *end* For the Dove is the bird
of Venus; yet our ancient brother Marcus Valerius Martialis that was Grand Orator of the Roman Empire
in days of old hath hidden the Sacred Phallus in this image *end* He is the Mother *end* He is the Womb *end* He is the
Sperm that fertilizes the Ovum nay but He is that fertilized and self-living thing which is neither sperm
nor ovum but their marriage the Perfect Tincture the Medicine of Metals the Philosophical Stone the
Universal Medicine the Elixir of Life *end*
He is that Dove that returning to the Ark of Noah bore a branch of olive *end* He is the Eagle of Jupiter He
is the Swan of Brahma *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
From this duplicity of speech hath sprung infinite confusion in the vulgar mind *end* For they understand not
that man is the guardian of the Life of God; woman but a temporary expedient; a shrine indeed for the
God but not the God *end* Thus do they blaspheme who worship the false Trinity of Father-Mother-Son
blind mouths that gape poison let them perish in the Day of Be-with-Us *end*
Moreover the Holy Spirit is the Unity in the Trinity; for the Father and the Son are indeed guardians of
the Quintessence heirs to the Quintessence of the substance of the Quintessence but they are not the
Quintessence itself *end* And this is of the Godhead; but in Earth it is the Son that combineth Father and Spirit
as it were Man and Woman God and Man *end* Nor is this Mystery to be understanded of him who is not
practised and perfect in this Means of Grace that is herein declared unto yevery dear and very
illustrious and very Illuminated Brethren *end*
OF MEDIATION

Now since He is all and all things are referred to Him much confusion hath arisen the Many
overwhelming The One *end*
And herein is the reason whereof and every woman is not a complete image of God in due proportion *end*
Consider these words attentively and understand what they say not *end*
Our brethren in China to confirm a bargain break the stick on which it is written each party keeping
half so that only on the fitting together of the two halves can the covenant be complete *end* So also is the
Kingdom of Heaven *end*
So also is this instruction *end* Unless the other half be in thy mind thou wilt not understand *end*
This then is the Covenant of the Creator dividing that he may unite *end*
In our Lord Jesus Christ is the Great Work accomplished *end*
Here followeth Liber  Cap *end* XXXVI *end*
THE STAR SAPPHIRE

Let the Adept be armed with his Magick Rood and provided with his Mystic Rose *end*
In the centre let him give the L.V.X *end* signs; or if he know them if he will and dare do them and can keep
silent about them the signs of N.O.X *end* being the signs of Puer Vir Puella Mulier *end* Omit the sign I.R *end*
Then let him advance to the East and make the Holy Hexagram saying PATER ET MATER UNUS
DEUS ARARITA *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Let him go round to the South make the Holy Hexagram and say MATER ET FILIUS UNUS DEUS
ARARITA *end*
Let him go round to the West make the Holy Hexagram and say FILIUS ET FILIA UNUS DEUS
ARARITA *end*
Let him go round to the North make the Holy Hexagram and then say FILIA ET PATER UNUS DEUS
ARARITA *end*
Let him then return to the Centre and so to The Centre of All making the ROSY CROSS as he may
know how saying ARARITA ARARITA ARARITA *end*
In this the Signs shall be those of Set Triumphant and of Baphomet *end* Also shall Set appear in the Circle *end*
Let him drink of the Sacrament and let him communicate the same *end*
Then let him say OMNIA IN DUOS DUO IN UNUM UNUS IN NIHIL HAEC NEC QUATUOR
NEC OMNIA NEC DUO NEC UNUS NEC NIHIL SUNT *end*
GLORIA PATRI ET MATRI ET FILIO ET FILIAE ET SPIRITUI SANCTO EXTERNO ET SPIRITUI
SANCTO INTERNO UT ERAT EST ERIT IN SAECULA SAECULORUM SEX IN UNO PER
NOMEN SEPTEM IN UNO ARARITA *end*
Let him then repeat the signs of L.V.X *end* but not the signs of N.O.X.; for it is not he that shall arise in the
Sign of Isis Rejoicing *end*
OF THE GREAT SYMBOL OF GOD

Beware very dear brother lest thou fall into confusion in thy consideration of the Unity; for the first
principle appeareth under opposite forms *end* He is thy Father and thy Mother even as thy conception of
him changeth *end* Now male is opposite to female but in Him is no opposition *end*
Study then the complete symbol; and howsoever thou mayest change He changeth not *end* Go thou from the
abyss to the abyss *end* Thou shalt find him alway Naught and alway Many and alway One and alway All *end*
Now the complete symbol as hath been said is triune; yet often have the wise and holy men of old
glyphed it as Two-in-One leaving the third invisible *end* Such symbols are the Point within the Circle the
Lingam-Yoni the Rose and Cross the divided circle of the Chinese and Cross within the Circle of the
Diamond the Spire and Nave of a Church the triple and eleven fold Cross in the invisible Diamond
which a member of our Supreme Council prefixeth to his signature and many another *end*
And of these symbols every one sheweth forth the Work the uniting in rapture of the divided *end* Conceive



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
of these as

 *end* GOD and Man in Man-GOD

 *end* Subject and Object in Samadhi

 *end* Male and Female in Mankind

or as thou wilt it is all one *end*
OF THE ONE SUBSTANCE

God in Spirit and Truth is One; and One also is God in Matter and Illusion *end*
O Brethren *end* O Illuminated and Illustrious Sir Knights hold this firmly as the sword hilt in the hour of
peril *end*
One is the Essence of God; and One is the Essence of Man *end*
Yet since God is only One because He is Three in One; so man is only One when he is Two-in-One *end*
As God’s Essence abideth in Himself so also with the Essence of man *end*
Yet man not being himself wholly but part of himself this essence is not wholly in him *end*
It is found in perfection only without himself and he can only attain it by virtue of the Sacrament of the
Eucharist *end*
OF THE SACRIFICE OF THE EUCHARIST

Read first in the Authorised Version John IV *end* - and -; VI *end*  and -; VIII *end*  and St *end* Paul
I *end* Cor X *end* - - and -; XII *end*  *end*
The Sacrament is administered under two kinds Bread and Wine *end*
Bread is solid white the fruit of the earth the sustenance of man the Body of Christ the white Tincture *end*
Wine is liquid red the fruit of the vine the cordial of man the Blood of Christ the red Tincture *end*
This divided sacrament is mortal the Great Work is not accomplished therein *end* The life resideth not in
flesh or in blood and though it be the body and blood of God it is not God; for God slain is not God re-



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
arisen *end*
Therefore very Illustrious Sir Knights and my Perfectly Illuminated Brethren I charge ye earnestly to
understand that this sacrament of death availeth little *end*
Ye must partake of the life of our Lord Jesus Christ in His Resurrection; and the Substance of the
Sacrament will be the Elixir of Life itself *end*
It will be One and not Two; neither male nor female neither solid nor liquid *end* It will contain all
possibilities and without it no possibility could be *end*
It is the Fire of Prometheus in the well-tended Lamp of Vesta; it is the Kneph of the Priests of Memphis
the disc of the Sun in the arms of Khephra; and the Serpent entwined about the Egg *end*
Ask of our brethren the Alchemists and of the Adepts of the Rosy Cross *end* The first answer It is nothing
but the Lion with his coagulated blood and the gluten of the White Eagle; it is the Ocean wherein both
Sun and Moon have bathed *end* The others it is the Dew upon the Rose that hath concealed the Cross *end* Ask
of the Ancients they reply that the oldest of the Gods is Saturn *end* Beware lest thou also be deceived *end*
Blessed be He that hath discovered unto us the Arcanum Arcanorum *end* This is the Dissolved Stone; this is
the Elixir of Life this is the Universal Medicine this is the Tincture this is the Potable Gold *end*
Take an Athanor and Cucurbite and prepare a flask for this Wine of the Holy Ghost *end* Thou needest also a
flame for the distillation *end* In the Athanor is thy Lion in the Cucurbite thine Eagle *end* Use first a gentle heat
increasing at last to full flame until the Lion passeth over *end* Pour immediately thy distillation into the flask
prepared for it *end*
OF THE ELIXIR

All being now clear to you very Illustrious Sir Knights and my Illuminated Brethren hasten not to the
Sacrament *end* For this festival is holy; this Wedding is of the Soul with Our Lord Jesus Christ; and thou
must be adorned as it is written the King’s Daughter is all glorious within; her raiment is of wrought
gold *end*
First therefore observe as thou hast sworn the rule of Chastity; for thou must be virgin unto Thy Lord *end*
Second do thou fast worshipping GOD TRIUNE for seven hours before the feast *end*
Third be thou clothed in that One Vestment many-coloured which was bestowed upon thee at thine
initiation *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
Now then entering the privy chapel do thou bestow at least one hour in adoration at the altar exalting
thyself in love toward God and extolling Him in strophe and antistrophe *end*
Then do thou perform the Sacrifice of the Mass *end*
The Elixir being then prepared solemnly and in silence do thou consume it utterly *end*
And in all this thou shalt direct thy whole will unwavering to the particular purpose of the Operation *end*
Otherwise have faith in God that He may apportion its virtue to thy needs *end*
This is the noblest way and yet most dangerous; for thereby thou risketh profanation eating and drinking
damnation to thyself *end*
Remember also this that to obtain the utmost from this work thou needest experience and well guided
practice *end* Even as if thou sowest seeds in ignorance of seasons and of climates and of soils some only
may germinate when the wise husbandman will reap all in perfect harvest; so do thou reflect that the
Eucharist is of such nature that some result will follow for the Grace of God cannot wholly be balked
and fail of its effect yet it will be better daily as thou followest out this path *end* And if thou work with
intelligence and energy thou shouldst attain the Highest Perfection and accomplish the Great Work
before the Earth hath twice fulfilled her orbit *end*
So mote it be *end*
OF RHYTHMIC INCANTATION

This elixir is the germ of life *end* Therefore although the most powerful the most radiant thing that existeth
in the whole Universe being as it were the very Eidolon of our Father the Sun it is also the most delicate
and sensitive of all things *end* During the preparation as at the consummation do thou guard it with flaming
swords set every way to keep its gate; and do thou cherish it and involve therein the Light of the Most
High and the Might of the Forces of thine Operation *end*
And this mayest thou do on this wise *end* First let thine whole work be within the Magick Circle *end* Next let
the powers of incantation as may be appropriate utter themselves forth by spells and invocations *end*
Lastly at the beginning of the work proper and thence throughout let there be One Incantation rhythmic
with the progress of the work *end*
For a Work Venereal

Tu Venus orta mari venias tu filia Patris
Exaudi penis carmina blanda precor
Ne sit culpa nates nobis futuisse viriles
Sed caleat cunnus semper amore meo *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
So for all in such words as thy poetic genius may overshadow thee withal *end*
OF THE LAW

Love is the Law Love under Will *end*
Is not Agape of one numeration with Thelema *end*
The Word of Sin is restriction *end*
Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law *end*
It is also written Take your fill and will of love as ye will when where and with whom ye will *end* But
always unto me... *end* But ecstasy be thine and joy of earth Ever to me *end* to me *end*
I charge you very August Excellent Puissant and Perfect Sovereign Princes of Rose Croix Sir Knights
Companions of the Holy Graal even by your sublime chastity and the vow of stainless manhood that ye
understand these words *end*
Behold *end* I have declared the law; unto you have I revealed it *end* I have manifested the tokens to you; with
you have I exchanged the words *end*
Conquerors of sin and sorrow partakers of the Cup of Blessing initiates of the Supreme Rite warders of
the Ineffable Sanctuary freemen of the City of Truth Saints of the Everlasting Tabernacle *end* I have
discovered unto you the Eucharist of Resurrection *end*
I have shown you the Way *end*
I have spoken unto you the Truth *end*
I have endowed you with the Life *end*
Sons of Heaven and Daughters of Earth children of God and inheritors of immortality the Feast is ready
in the Mansions of my Father *end*
Brothers of Light Life Love and Liberty Illustrious Sir Knights of the Order of Kadosch strike with the
pommels of your swords upon the Gate of this Sanctuary the inmost the unprofaned the shrine which
we have guarded for you through all catastrophies of empire from the days of Enoch until now — knock
and it shall be opened up to you and ye shall enter in and taste that MANNA that cometh down from
Heaven *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
FAREWELL

And now very illustrious Sir Knights and Highly Illuminated Brethren hail and farewell *end*
I salute you secretly as is right I exchange the token I whisper the Word even as I received it and in no
other manner *end* I kiss thrice the hilt of the Sword *end*
I invoke upon you the blessing of GOD TRIUNE in His Most Sacred and Mysterious Name of
Omnipotence Omniscience and Omnipresence; in the name of the Father + and of the Son + and of the
Holy Ghost + take my leave of you *end*
The favour of the True and Living God Most High be upon you *end*
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you *end*
The abiding of the Holy Ghost be within you *end*
Now and for ever more so mote it be Amen *end*


DE TEMPLO

 *end* Oriente *end* Cubiculum *end*
 *end* Occidente *end* Tabula dei invocandi *end*
 *end* Septentrione *end* Sacerdos *end*
 *end* Meridione *end* Ignis cum thuribulo k.t.l *end*
 *end* Centro *end* Lapis quaeratus cum imagine DEI MAXIMA INGENTIS TERRIBILIS
OMNIPOTENTIS SANCTISSIMI et cum ferro tintinnabulo *end* oleo *end* virgo *end* Stet Imago juxta
librum THELEMA *end*
DE CEREMONIO PRINCIPII

Fiat ut in Liber DCLXXI dicitur *end* sed antea virgo lavabitur cum verbis

Aspergo me k.t.l *end* et habilimenta ponat cum verbis



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*

Hic dicat virgo orationes dei operationis *end*

Manibus accendat et ignem et sacerdotem virgo dicens

The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
PART THREE

The Secret Instructions of the

Seventh Eight and Ninth Degrees



OF THE HOMUNCULUS

A Secret Instruction of the Ninth Degree



DE HOMUNCULO EPISTOLA

Baphomet X° O.T.O *end* Rex Summus Sanctissimus to all His Holy and Royal Brethren of the X° upon
earth and to His Viceroys in all the Britains Greeting and Peace *end*
Under the seal of the Obligation of the IX°

CAPITULUM PRIMUM

 *end* The homunculus is a living being in form resembling man and possessing those qualities of man
which distinguish him from beasts namely intellect and power of speech but neither begotten and born
after the manner of human generation nor inhabited by a human soul *end*
 *end* Thus supposing that the re-incarnating Ego enters the foetus at the third month of gestation it would
not serve to remove such foetus from the mother and cause it to live; for it is already human *end* But a
foetus of two months might become homunculus *end*
 *end* A human being can only become homunculus if obsessed by a demon to such an extent that the human
soul is irrevocably expelled to the same degree as in death and freed utterly so that it seeks a new
tenement and is cut off absolutely from the old *end* But even this rare as it must be except in lunacy
involves an extension of the natural meaning of the term homunculus *end*
 *end* In the third chapter we discuss Our method of producing that which if not a true homunculus at least
serves all proper purposes thereunto pertinent *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
CAPITULUM SECUNDUM

 *end* The classical method of making the homunculus is to take the fertilized ova of a woman and to
reproduce as closely as may be without the uterus the normal conditions of gestation therein *end*
 *end* For in the case of ectopic gestation it is clearly possible for the ovum to develop for a considerable
period; and a child of ½ months weighing nine ounces has been known to live for over an hour after
delivery *end* These considerations encourage us *end* Life is indefinitely adaptable and life originally appeared in
a planet bacteriologically sterilized by temperatures of many thousands of degrees Centigrade *end* There is
therefore every reason to hope that starting as we do with the proper First Matter we may be able to
devise conditions of its growth in a ‘culture’ just as we have done in the case of the simpler organisms *end*
As it is written ‘With God all things are possible’; and is not our Motto ‘Deus est Homo’ *end*
 *end* The White Tincture of the Alchemists was in this connection a replica of the Liqor Amnii and their
Red Tincture a substitute for Blood *end*
 *end* Certain truly magical aids to the physiological experiments indicated above have always been held
worthy *end* The Adept must however be left to devise these as in so small a treatise we have no place for a
subject so starry vast as this *end*
CAPITULUM TERTIUM

 *end* We assume that Our Brethren have well studied Our Epistle De Arte Magica Secundum Ritum Gradus
Nonae O.T.O *end* k.t.l *end*
 *end* Before introducing our own method of making the homunculus let us refer to A the theory of
Incarnation and B the method of Evocation invented by us in An VI Sol in Aries April  E.V. *end*
A

For about three months the foetus is empty of any soul *end* It then attracts an Ego of such a nature as a its
own Karma i.e *end* naturae and tendency and b the Karma of the Ego combine to make viable *end* If a
suitable combination is not found the result is either miscarriage still-birth or the birth of an idiot *end*
In the last case the foetus has been obsessed by some dumb non-human spirit or by some human spirit of
exceptional Karma *end* By Karma We mean always nature and tendency and no more although we use
these words in a large sense to include all causes moral as well as physical *end* But we include not any
conceptions of ‘Justice’ and the like in these *end*
If this be accepted then clearly it is possible that a magician might find means a to bar the gate against
any Human Ego and b to cause the Incarnation of some non-human being such as an elemental or



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
planetary spirit of a nature fitted to some desired end *end* Thus one eloquent from an incarnation of Tiriel
or one bold in war from the indwelling of Graphiel *end*
And these will be his chief difficulties a that Man even when discarnate is so spiritually powerful that
to bar him from his urgent need is a task of colossal awe; and b it is necessary to choose a spirit suitable
to the foetus *end* Thus if the babe that is to be were by reason of physical heredity sluggish melancholy and
weak it would be but nugatory to invoke into it a spirit of Nakhiel or Raphael or Haniel or Anael *end*
B

The human soul is all but inexpugnable; yet We have succeeded in the temporary expulsion of a weak
and wandering soul and its replacement *end* For example We once supplanted the soul of a Caliban-
creature a certain deformed and filthy abortion without moral character named Victor Neuburg by a
soul of Isis by a soul of Mars and by a soul of Jupiter in turn so that this quasi-human shape not being a
poet did yet write verses goodly and great in praise of Isis; and not being a prophet did yet foretell most
accurately the wars which even now devastate the earth; and not being generous or wealthy did yet for a
season support many dependants on his bounty *end*
And this we did with no elaboration of thought no Persian apparatus no weariness or trouble at all *end*
Now then do We mark down the Means devised by Us Baphomet for the making of the homunculus *end*
I

Take a suitable woman willing to aid thee in this Work *end* Explain to her fully the precautions to be taken
and the manner of life necessary *end* Let her horoscope be if possible suited to the nature of the
homunculus proposed; as to have an incarnate Spirit of Benevolence let Jupiter be rising in Pisces with
good aspects of Sol Venus and Luna; and with no notable contrary dispositions; or so far as may be
possible *end*
II

Take now a man suitable; if convenient thyself or some other Brother Initiate of the Gnosis; and so far as
may be let his horoscope also harmonize with the nature of the work *end*
III

Let the man and woman copulate continuously but especially at times astrologically favourable to thy
working and that in a ceremonial manner in a prepared temple whose particular arrangement and
decoration is also suitable to thy work *end* And let them will ardently and constantly the success of thy work
denying all other desires *end* Thus proceed until impregnation results *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
IV

Now let the woman be withdrawn and carried away to a place prepared *end*
And this place should be a great desert; for in such do rarely wander any human souls seeking
incarnation *end*
Further let a great circle be drawn and consecrated to the sphere of the work; and let banishing formulae
of the Sephiroth and especially of Kether be done often even unto five or seven times on every day *end*
Outside which great circle let the woman never go *end* Let the mind of the woman be strengthened to resist
all impression except of the spirit desired *end* Let the incense of this spirit be burnt continually; let his
colours and his only be displayed; and let his shapes and his only appear so far as may be in all things *end*
Further let him be most earnestly and continually invoked in a temple duly dedicated the woman being
placed in a great triangle while thou from the circle dost perform daily the proper form of Evocation to
Material Appearance *end* And let this be done twice every day once while she is awake and once while she
is asleep *end*
V

And let the quickening be a feast of the Reception of the Spirit *end* Henceforth ye may omit the Banishings *end*
VI

And during the rest of the Pregnancy let there be the Charge to the Spirit so that the whole period of all
this work is as it were an expansion in terms of life of the Art-formula of Evocation in this manner *end*
Let the woman be constantly educated by words and by books and by pictures of a nature consonant so
that all causes may work together for the defence and sustenance of the Spirit and for its true
development *end*
VII

And let the delivery of the woman be retarded or advanced so far as possible to secure a rising sign
proper to such a child *end*
The child being born must be dedicated purified and consecrated according to the formulae of the
planet element or sign of which it is the Incarnation *end*
VIII



The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
IX

Now then thou hast a being of perfect human form with all powers and privileges of humanity but with
the essence of a particular chosen force and with all the knowledge and might of its sphere; and this
being is thy creation and dependent; to it thou art Sole God and Lord and it must serve thee *end*
Therefore the whole of all that part of Nature whereunto it belongs is thy dominion; and thou art
Magister Octinomous *end*
X

Be wary Brother Adept and choose well thine object and spare not pain and labour in the Beginning of
thy Operation; for to have corn of so subtle a seed is a great thing once; to achieve it twice were the mark
of a primal energy so marvellous that We doubt whether there be one man born in ten times ten thousand
years that hath such wonder-power *end*
XI

Now the Father of All prosper ye my Brethren that dare lay hold upon the Phallus of the All-One and
call forth its streams to irrigate your fields *end*
And may the spirit of Prometheus hearken and the Spirit of Alcides aid your Work *end*
Farewell therefore; in the name of the Secret Master Blessing and Peace from Us Baphomet X° O.T.O *end*
Given from the throne of Ireland Iona and all the Britains in the Sanctuary of the Gnosis this day of Sol *end*
An X  in ^ ° ' "  in & ° ' " Noon Sept *end*   E.V *end*


The Secret Rituals of the O.T.O *end*
A Note on Sources

APPENDIX

These rituals and instructional documents have been compiled from a number of MSS and typescripts in
private ownership *end* The ritual of the Sixth Degree is full of abbreviations and the conjectural restorations
indicated by the enclosure in brackets see pp *end* - {i.e *end* from “Reception First Point” to the end of
the  Degree ritual *end* — Ed.} are taken from a typescript formerly in the ownership of Mr *end* G *end* H *end* Brooke
the well-known private collector; they are not the work of Mr *end* Brooke himself and seem to have been
derived from the work of Frater Volo Intelligere who was at one time a disciple of Aleister Crowley but
was never a member of the O.T.O *end*
I am in complete agreement with these reconstructions *end*

‘Master Therion’ and Aleister Crowley were the same person *end*

sroto_notes

 *end* The last Templar Grand Master burnt at the stake on charges of heresy *end*


sroto_notes

 *end* Lévi’s attitude to the Templars was a curious one; on the one hand he abused them as heretics on the
other he praised them as bearers of ‘the light of the Grail’ *end* It seems likely that he had his own peculiar
interpretation of the mysterious Baphomet allegedly worshipped by the Templars for he wrote of this
deity ‘that all the initiates of the occult sciences .. *end* have adored do adore and always will adore what is
signified by this frightful symbol ...’

 *end* For both a brief outline of Tantrism and some details of Kellner’s possible indebtedness to the
American occultist P *end* B *end* Randolph see my Sexuality Magic and Perversion London Spearman; New
Jersey Citadel Press  *end*

 *end* There is a possible link between both these Rites and the Egyptian Masonry of Cagliostro *end*

widow lived upon a small pension from the initiates of the Theosophically inclined Rite of Co-Masonry *end*

further details of this curious episode see the article ‘Wandering Bishops’ in the occult encyclopedia
Man Myth and Magic *end*
